














































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Uno uwo msululu wa wahenga wa Yesu Kilisto, mwana wa Daudi, mwana wa Ablaham.
Ablaham kamulela Isaka, Isaka kamulela Yakobo, Yakobo kamulela Yuda na ndugu zake.
Yuda kamulela Pelesi na Zela, mamaao kakala Tamali, Pelesi kamulela Heziloni, Heziloni kamulela Alamu,
Alamu kamulela Aminadabu, Aminadabu kamulela Nashoni, Nashoni kamulela Salimoni,
Salimoni kamulela Boazi, mamaake kakala Lahabu, Boazi kamulela Obedi, mamaake kakala Lusi, Obedi kamulela Yese,
Yese kamulela Mndewa Daudi. Daudi kamulela Selemani na mtwanzi yakalile mwehe wa Ulia,
Selemani kamulela Lehoboamu, Lehoboamu kamulela Abiya, Abiya kamulela Asafu,
Asafu kamulela Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati kamulela Yolamu, Yolamu kamulela Uzia,
Uzia kamulela Yotamu, Yotamu kamulela Ahazi, Ahazi kamulela Hezekia,
Hezekia kamulela Manase, Manase kamulela Amoni, Amoni kamulela Yosia,
Yosia kamulela Yekonia na ndugu zake, kipigiti kija viwahamizigwe kuchola Babeli.
Kulawa kipigiti cha kuhamizigwa kuchola Babeli, Yekonia kamulela Shelitieli, Shelitieli kamulela Zelubabeli,
Zelubabeli kamulela Abiudi, Abiudi kamulela Eliakimu, Eliakimu kamulela Azoli,
Azoli kamulela Sadoki, Sadoki kamulela Akimu, Akimu kamulela Eliudi,
Eliudi kamulela Eliazali, Eliazali kamulela Matani, Matani kamulela Yakobo,
Yakobo kamulela Usufu, yakalile mbigalo wa Maliamu mamaake Yesu yakemigwe Kilisto.
Avo kukala na milelo longo dimwe na mine kulawa Ablaham mbaka Daudi, na milelo longo dimwe na mine kulawa Daudi mbaka kipigiti viwahamizigwe kuchola Babeli, na milelo longo dimwe na mine kulawa uhamizo wa kuchola Babeli mbaka mvumbuka ya Kilisto.
Vino vivo mvumbuka ya Yesu Kilisto viikalile. Mamaake, yakemigwe Maliamu, kakala mkasano wa Usufu, ila viwakalile hawanakala hamoja, kaiyona kana inda mkubitila mhiko za Loho wa Mulungu.
Kwavija Usufu, mkasano wake, kakala munhu yalibule uzenzeleganye, na halondile kumgela kinyala hameso ga wanhu, avo kagelegeza kumuleka kinyele.
Ila viyakalile yogelegeza gano, msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kamulawila muna inzozi na kulonga, “Usufu, Mwana wa Daudi, sambiudumbe kumsola Maliamu yawe mtwanzi wako. Kwavija kapata inda mkubitila mhiko za Loho wa Mulungu.
Kolela mwana mbigalo, na gweye komkema twaga jake Yesu, kwavija kowakombola wanhu zake kulawa m'vilozo vao.”
Gano gose galawilila giladi gavikile gaja gayalongile Mndewa kubitila muhokozi,
“Mhambe kopata inda na kolela mwana mbigalo, na twaga jake kokemigwa Imanueli.” Nhegulo yake “Mulungu ka hamoja na tweye.”
Usufu viyalamuke kulawa muutulo, katenda kamba msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga viyamulagize, avo kamsola mkasano wake Maliamu.
Ila hamkwenhukile mbaka viyamulelile mwana mbigalo. Na heyo kamkema twaga jake Yesu.
Yesu kavumbuka mkiwambo cha Betelehemu muisi ya Yudea, mkipigiti cha Mndewa Helode Mkulu. Na wanhu wali na ilimu ya nhondo kulawa haulawilo wa zua weza Yelusalemu,
wauza, “Kahalihi ayo yavumbuke giladi yawe mndewa wa Wayahudi? Kwavija tuyona nhondo yake haulawilo wa zua, avo twiza kumtambikila.”
Mndewa Helode viyahulike vino, kagaya ng'hani mmoyo, heyo hamoja na wanhu wose wa Yelusalemu.
Kawakema wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, kawauza, “Halihi hondayaleligwe Kilisto?”
Wamwidika, “Mkiwambo cha Betelehemu muisi ya Yudea, kwavija vino vivo yandikigwe na muhokozi,
‘Na gweye, Betelehemu, uli muisi ya Yuda, huli mdodo hagatigati ya watawala wa isi ya Yuda, kwavija kulawa kumwako kolawilila mtawala yondayawalongoze wanhu zangu wa Islaeli.’ ”
Abaho, Helode kawakema kinyele waja iwanhu wali na ilimu ya nhondo wamulongele kipigiti kija inhondo viyoneke.
Kawatuma wachole Betelehemu, yolonga, “Gendeni mkaziuzagize goya mbuli za mwana hiyo, na muhamona mnongele, giladi na nie nichole kumtambikila.”
Viwamambukize kumtegeleza mndewa, wachola, na ija inhondo iwakalile wayonile haulawilo wa dizua, iwalongola mbaka viimile hanhu hayakalile imwana.
Viwaiwene inhondo, wadeng'helela ng'hani.
Viwengile mng'anda, wamona imwana hamoja na mamaake Maliamu, wafugama mavindi na kumtambikila. Abaho, wafungula masanduku gao na kumgwelela nhunza za zahabu, ubane, na manemane.
Mulungu kawazuma mnzozi kamba sambiwambwelele Helode. Avo wabweleganya muisi yao mkubitila nzila iyagwe.
Viwacholile, msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kamulawila Usufu mnzozi kalonga, “Lamuka, msole imwana na mamaake mkimbilile Misili. Kaleni hiko mbaka vondanikulongele, kwavija Helode kokwiza kumzahila imwana giladi yamkome.”
Avo Usufu kenuka, kamsola imwana na mamaake ikilo iija, kachola Misili,
ako kuyakalile mbaka Helode viyadanganhike. Giladi kamba gavikile gaja galongigwe na Mndewa kubitila muhokozi, “Nimkema Mwanangu kulawa Misili.”
Helode viyawene kamba kavwiziligwa na iwanhu wali na ilimu ya nhondo, kagevuzika ng'hani. Kalagiza kamba wana wose wa kimbigalo wa kiwambo cha Betelehemu na ng'ambu zake zose, wali na milao mibili kwiza hasi wakomigwe, songela viyalongeligwe na waja iwanhu wali na ilimu ya nhondo mmbuli za ija inhondo kipigiti viilawilile.
Abaho, gavikila gaja galongigwe na muhokozi Yelemia,
“Dizwi dihulikwa ako Lama, kililo na giogio kulu. Laheli kowalilila wanage, halonda kuhembekezwa, kwavija wahaduhu.”
Mndewa Helode viyadanganhike, msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kamulawila Usufu mnzozi ako Misili
kalonga, “Lamuka, msole imwana na mamaake, uchole muisi ya Islaeli, kwavija wose walondile kumkoma imwana wadanganhika.”
Avo Usufu kenuka, kamsola imwana na mamaake, na kubwela muisi ya Islaeli.
Ila Usufu viyahulike kamba Alikelao iyo mtawala wa Yudea kasola hanhu ha tataake Mndewa Helode Mkulu, kadumba kuchola hiko. Na heyo viyazumigwe mnzozi, kanyelenhukila kuisi ya Galilaya.
Kachola, kakala mkiwambo kikemigwe Nazaleti, giladi gavikile gaja galongigwe na wahokozi, “Kokemigwa Mnazaleti.”
Mazua higo Yohana M'batiza keza, yowapetela wanhu mkiwala cha Yudea,
kalonga, “Lekeni vilozo venu, kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga ukwenhuka!”
Kwavija Yohana iyo yalongigwe na muhokozi Isaya, viyalongile, “Munhu kenula dizwi muluwala, yolonga, ‘Itandeni nzila ya Mndewa, Mgoloseleni nzila zake!’ ”
Yohana kavala guo ditendigwe na mijusu ya ngamia na lukumbulu lwa kwembe mchuno chake, na mandia gake gakala nzige na uki.
Wanhu kulawa Yelusalemu, kulawa muisi yose ya Yudea na ng'ambu zose za Mdibonde da Yolodani, wamcholela.
Wavilonga vilozo vao haulongozi wa wanhu, na heyo kawabatiza muna Ulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Yohana viyawawene Mafalisayo na Masadukayo bwando womwizila giladi wabatizigwe, kawalongela, “Mweye wana wa nyoka! Yalihi yawazumile kulukimbila lusango lwa Mulungu londalwize?
Tendeni mbuli zilagusa kamba muleka vilozo venu.
Sambimgelegeze kamba modaha kuikimbila nhaguso ya Mulungu mkulonga, ‘Ablaham iyo muhenga wetu.’ Nowalongela, Mulungu kodaha kusola mabwe gano na kumtendela lukolo Ablaham!
Nhemo ya hana gamasina ga imibiki, na kila m'biki uleka kulela mujo unogile wokanhigwa na kwasigwa muna umoto.
Nie nowabatiza mweye na mazi kulagusa kamba muleka vilozo venu, ila hachugu changu kokwiza yali na mhiko kubanza nie, nie silumbile hata kupapa ng'hwabasa zake. Heyo kowabatiza na Loho wa Mulungu na moto.
Heyo kana kia chake mmakono cha kubetela, giladi yaikunzanye ngano yake kukano na mikumvi yaisome na moto hauzimikaga.”
Abaho, Yesu keza kulawa Galilaya, kachola hana Ulwanda lwa Yolodani giladi yabatizigwe na Yohana.
Ila Yohana kageza kumgomesa, kalonga, “Nie nolondigwa kubatizigwa na gweye, na gweye kokwiza kumwangu?”
Ila Yesu kamwidika, “Leka iwe vino sambi, kwavija tulondigwa kutenda vino giladi kugavikiza gaja gose gayalagize Mulungu.” Avo Yohana katogola.
Bahaja Yesu viyabatizigwe, kalawa muna gamazi. Baho ulanga uvuguka, kamona Loho wa Mulungu yomuhumulukila yalingile kamba hua na kukala uchana yake.
Na dizwi kulawa kuulanga dilonga, “Ino iyo Mwanangu mnogelwa, ninogelwe nayo.”
Abaho, Yesu kalongozwa na Loho wa Mulungu mbaka muluwala giladi yagezigwe na Mwenembago.
Viyamambukize funga ya mazua malongo mane ikilo na imisi, Yesu kona nzala.
Abaho, Mwenembago kamcholela kamgeza yomulongela, “Uhawa gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu, galongele mabwe gano gagaluke mikate.”
Ila Yesu kedika kalonga, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Munhu hawa mgima sama ya mkate wiyeka, ila mkila mbuli ilawa mmulomo wa Mulungu.’ ”
Abaho, Mwenembago kamsola Yesu mbaka Yelusalemu, Wambo Ding'alile, na kumwika hachana hana inhomboti ya Ing'anda ya Mulungu,
kamulongela, “Uhawa gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu, ibwanhe hasi, kwavija yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Mulungu kokulagizila wasenga zake wa kuulanga, wakudang'he mmakono gao, giladi mgulu wako sambiuikwale mdibwe.’ ”
Yesu kamwidika, “Vivija yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Sambiumgeze Mndewa Mulungu wako.’ ”
Abaho, Mwenembago kamsola Yesu mbaka hana ikigongo kitali, kamulagusila ndewa zose za ulumwengu na yenzi zake.
Kamulongela, “Gano gose nokugwelela uhanifugamila mavindi na kunitambikila.”
Abaho, Yesu kamulongela, “Goboka, Mwenembago! Kwavija yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Mtambikile Mndewa Mulungu wako na umsang'hanikile heyo yeiyeka!’ ”
Abaho, Mwenembago kamuleka, na wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga weza na kumsang'hanikila.
Yesu viyahulike kamba Yohana kageligwa mkifungo, kachola kukiwambo cha Nazaleti muisi ya Galilaya. Kasegela Nazaleti, kachola kukala Kapenaumu, kiwambo kikalile behi na Dilamba da Galilaya, muisi za mitala ya Wazabuloni na Wanaftali,
<range>
giladi gavikile gaja galongigwe na muhokozi Isaya,
“Isi ya Zabuloni na isi ya Naftali, nzila ya kuchola m'bahali, mwambu uyagwe wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani, Galilaya, isi ya Wamhazi!
Wanhu wokala mdiziza wona mulangaza mkulu. Na waja wose wokala muisi ya ziza da ifa, mulangaza uwamwemwesa.”
Songela kipigiti kija Yesu kasonga kuwapetela wanhu yolonga, “Lekeni vilozo venu, kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga ukwenhuka!”
Yesu viyakalile yotembela mumgwazo wa Idilamba da Galilaya, kawona wandugu wabili, Simoni yakemigwe Petulo na mdodo wake Endelea. Wakala wotanda nhando zao mdilamba, kwavija wakala waloa somba.
Yesu kawalongela, “Ng'holelezeni, na nie nowatenda muwe waloa wanhu.”
Bahaja wazileka nhando zao, wamkoleleza.
Viyacholile haulongozi kidogo, kawona wandugu wabili wayagwe, Yakobo na mdodo wake Yohana, wanage Zebedayo, wakalile muna ingalawa hamoja na tataao Zebedayo, wozigongomanya nhando zao. Yesu kawakema,
na baho waileka ingalawa na tataao, wamkoleleza.
Yesu kachola kila hanhu m'viwambo va Galilaya, yofundiza muna zing'anda zao za nhambiko na kuupeta Usenga Unogile wa Undewa wa Mulungu, na kuwahonya wanhu wakalile na kila utamu na unyondenyonde.
Mbuli zake zenela muisi yose ya Silia. Wamgalila wanhu wose wakalile wokugula kila utamu, wakalile wokona vihile, wakalile na vinyamkela, wakalile na kisango, na wakalile waholole, na heyo kawahonya.
Dale kulu da wanhu dimkoleleza, wanhu kulawa Galilaya, kulawa kuviwambo longo dimwe vikemigwa Dekapoli, kulawa Yelusalemu, Yudea, na mwambu uyagwe wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Yesu viyadiwene didale da wanhu, kakwela hakigongo, kakala hasi. Wanahina zake wamcholela,
na heyo kasonga kuwafundiza.
“Wamota waja wakumbulu wa loho, kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga uli wao!
Wamota waja wose wali na giogio, kwavija wobwezigwa imioyo!
Wamota waja wali na mioyo iholile, kwavija woihala isi!
Wamota waja wose wali na nzala na ng'hilu ya kutenda ganogile, kwavija wokwigutizwa!
Wamota wali na bazi, kwavija wokonelwa bazi!
Wamota wali na mioyo ing'alile, kwavija womona Mulungu!
Wamota wagombelezi, kwavija wokemigwa wana wa Mulungu!
Wamota awo wogazigwa sama ya kutenda ganogile, kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga uli wao!
“Mmota mweye haja wanhu wahawaliga, na kuwagaza, na kuwavwizila mbuli zose zihile sama yangu.
Deng'heleleni na kutoa ng'henze, kwavija nhunza yenu yowa ng'hulu kuulanga. Kwavija vino vivo wagazigwe wahokozi wawalongole.
“Mweye iwo munyu wa isi. Ila munyu uhagiza kilandu chake, vodahikaze kuutenda unoge kabili? Haunoga mkinhu chochose, ila wokwasigwa hanze na kubojagwa na wanhu.
“Mweye iwo mulangaza wa ulumwengu mokoneka na wanhu wose, kamba viwodaha kuwona mulangaza wa wambo dizengigwe hakigongo.
Haduhu munhu yobwinha kiwenge na kukigubika na kinongo. Ila kokika uchana hakingolobweda, giladi kimmwemwesele kila munhu yali mng'anda.
Vivo na mweye, mulangaza wenu umwemwese haulongozi wa wanhu, giladi wone sang'hano zenu zinogile, na hewo wamuyenzi Tata wenu wa kuulanga.
“Sambimgelegeze kamba niza kugatengula Malagizo ga Musa na mafundo ga wahokozi, ila kugavikiza.
Nowalongela ikweli, mbaka ulanga na isi vondavisegele, haduhu hata helufi imwe ndodo kulawa Mmalagizo ga Musa yondaisegezigwe mbaka mbuli zose zivikile.
Avo, munhu yoyose yoleka kutenda ndagizi imwe ili ndodo, na kuwafundiza wanhu sambiwaitende, munhu iyo kokemigwa mdodo muna Undewa wa Kuulanga. Ila munhu yoyose yondayazitende ndagizi zino na kuzifundiza, munhu iyo kokemigwa mkulu muna Undewa wa Kuulanga.
Kwavija nowalongela, mbuli zenu zilibule uzenzeleganye zihaleka kuzibanza zija za Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, hamdaha kwingila Muundewa wa Kuulanga.
“Muhulika kamba wanhu wa umwaka viwalongeligwe, ‘Sambiukome, na yoyose yondayatende avo kotagusigwa.’
Ila nie nowalongela, munhu yoyose yomonela lusango ndugu yake kotagusigwa, na munhu yoyose yomuliga ndugu yake kolondigwa yagaligwe Kukitala Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi, na munhu yoyose yolonga, ‘Gweye kwa m'bozi’ ka mdihekaheka da kwingila hana umoto wa kuzimu.
Avo, kamba uhalonda kulava nhunza yako hana ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa, na kukumbukila kamba kuna mbuli na ndugu yako,
ileke nhunza yako haulongozi wa ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa, tanhu genda mkailumbe na ndugu yako, abaho, leka ubwele uilave nhunza yako.
“Ilumbe hima na munhu yokutagusa, kipigiti mng'hali mnzila mchola kukitala, giladi sambiyakugale ha mulamula, na mulamula yakugele mmakono ga wemilizi, na wemilizi wakugele mkifungo.
Nokulongela ikweli, hulawa himo mbaka ulihe deni jako jose.
“Muhulika kamba ilongwa, ‘Sambiutende ugoni.’
Ila nie nowalongela, munhu yoyose yomulola mtwanzi mkumsulukila, kesha kutenda nayo ugoni mmoyo wake.
Avo kamba siso jako da ukulume dokutenda utende vilozo, ding'ole ujase kutali nagwe! Vinoga kumwako kwagiza kipindi kimwe cha lukuli lwako kubanza lukuli lwako lose lwasigwe kuzimu.
Na kamba mkono wako wa ukulume wokutenda utende vilozo, ukanhe uwase kutali nagwe! Vinoga kumwako kwagiza kipindi kimwe cha lukuli lwako kubanza lukuli lwako lose luchole kuzimu.
“Vivija ilongigwa, ‘Munhu yoyose yomwasa mtwanzi wake, kolondigwa yamwandikile lupwilili lwa nyasa.’
Ila nie nowalongela kamba, munhu yoyose yomwasa mtwanzi wake, ila tu sama ya kilamso cha ugoni, komtenda mtwanzi hiyo yawe mgoni, na munhu yoyose yomsola mtwanzi hiyo kotenda ugoni.
“Vivija muhulika kamba wanhu wa umwaka viwalongeligwe, ‘Sambiuiduile uvwizi ila ugoge kiduilo chako chuuiduile ha Mndewa.’
Ila nie nowalongela, sambimuiduile kabisa. Sambimuiduilile ulanga, kwavija kicho kigoda cha undewa cha Mulungu,
ama sambimuiduilile isi, kwavija kicho kigoda chake cha kwikila magulu gake, ama sambimuiduilile Yelusalemu, kwavija dijo wambo da Mndewa Mkulu.
Vivija sambiuiduilile pala jako, kwavija hudaha kutenda hata luvili lwako lumwe kuwa luzelu ama lutitu.
Mbuli zenu ziwe ‘Ona’ kamba ihawa ‘Ona’ ama ‘Sio’ kamba ihawa ‘Sio.’ Chochose chondakibanze mbuli zino cholawa ha Mwenembago.
“Muhulika ilongigwa kamba, ‘Siso kwa siso, na zino kwa zino.’
Ila nie nowalongela, sambium'bwelezele mtenda gehile. Munhu yahakutoa kanza da ukulume, muhindusile na diyagwe.
Na munhu yahakugala kukitala na kukusolela shati jako, vivija mulekele na koti jako.
Kamba munhu yahakushulutiza umpapile bahasha yake kilometa imwe, mpapile kilometa mbili.
Munhu yondayakupule, mgwelele, na munhu yoyose yolonda umkalizi, sambiumuhindukile kisogo.
“Muhulika kamba ilongigwa, ‘Mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe, na umwihile mdumuka wako.’
Ila nie nowalongela, wanogele wadumuka zako na muwatambikile waja wose wowagaza,
giladi muwe wana wa Tata wenu wa kuulanga. Heyo yowamwemwesela zua jake wanhu wehile na wanogile, na yowatoela mvula wazenzeleganye na wanhu walibule uzenzeleganye.
Ihawa mowanogela wanhu wose waja wowonogela mweye, mopata nhunza yaki? Kwavija hata wawila kodi wotenda vivo!
Na kamba mowalamsa ndugu zenu weiyeka, kinhu chaki kikulu kimtenda kubanza wayagwe? Hata Wamhazi wotenda vivo!
Avo, sambimuhungule hanhu kamba Tata wenu wa kuulanga viyalekile kuhungula hanhu!
“Iteganyeni, sambimtende mbuli zenu zinogile haulongozi wa wanhu giladi mwoneke na hewo, kwavija muhatenda hivo ham'bokela nhunza kulawa ha Tata wenu wa kuulanga.
“Uhamwing'ha mkumbulu, sambiumulongele munhu yoyose mkutoa mhalati, kamba viwotenda videlenya muna zing'anda za nhambiko na mzinzila, giladi watogoligwe na wanhu. Nowalongela ikweli, wanhu hiwo wesha kubokela nhunza yao.
Ila uhamwing'ha mkumbulu, hata mkono wako wa ukumoso sambiuvitange kitendigwa na mkono wako wa ukulume,
avo nhunza yako yowa mkifiso. Abaho, Tataako, yolola kija kitendeke mkifiso, kokugwelela nhunza.
“Muhatambika, sambimuwe kamba videlenya! Kwavija hewo wonogelwa kutambika kuno wemile wima muna zing'anda za nhambiko na mzinzilamhanda, giladi woneke na wanhu. Nowalongela ikweli, wesha kubokela nhunza yao.
Ila uhatambika, ingila mdigati jako, hinda ulwivi, na tambika ha Tataako yali mkifiso. Abaho, Tataako, yolola kija kitendeke mkifiso, kokugwelela nhunza.
“Muhatambika, sambimulonge mbuli bwando zilibule nhegulo ha Mulungu, kamba viwotenda Wamhazi, kwavija wogelegeza kamba wohulikwa sama ya mbuli zao kuwa bwando.
Sambimuilinge nao, kwavija Tata wenu kovitanga chumulonda hata mng'hali hamunampula.
Avo tambikeni kamba vino, ‘Tata wetu wa kuulanga, twaga jako diyenzigwe,
Undewa wako wize, chuulonda kitendeke muisi kamba viili kuulanga.
Utugwelele mandia getu ga kila zua.
Vigele kumgongo vilozo vetu, kamba tweye vituwagela kumgongo wanhu watutendile mbuli zihile.
Sambiutugele mkugezigwa, ila utukombole kulawa ha Mwenembago. Kwavija Undewa, na mhiko, na yenzi vako gweye gunge na gunge. Amina.’
“Kwavija kamba muhawagela kumgongo wanhu wawatendile mbuli zihile, vivija na Tata wenu wa kuulanga kovigela kumgongo vilozo venu.
Ila kamba hamuwagela kumgongo wanhu wawatendile mbuli zihile, vivija na Tata wenu wa kuulanga havigela kumgongo vilozo venu.
“Muhafunga, sambimnyunguale kamba viwotenda videlenya, kwavija wosinalika giladi watogolwe na wanhu kamba wafunga. Nowalongela ikweli, wesha kubokela nhunza yao.
Uhafunga, suluza kihanga chako abaho bakaza mavuta pala jako,
giladi wanhu sambiwavitange kamba kufunga. Ila Tataako yoleka koneka, kovitanga. Na Tataako, yolola kija kitendeke mkifiso, kokugwelela nhunza.
“Sambimwiikile ngama muisi, aho hana ivimhungu na ng'hangaga hondawabanange, na wabavi wobena wokwingila na kwiba.
Ila ikeni ngama kuulanga, kulibule vimhungu na ng'hangaga wondawabanange, na wabavi hawabena na kwingila na kwiba.
Kwavija hanhu haili ngama yako, vivija na moyo wako baho hondaukale.
“Siso dijo kiwenge cha lukuli. Ihawa siso jako gima, lukuli lwako lose lomema mulangaza.
Ila siso jako dihabanangika, lukuli lwako lose lomema ziza. Na kamba mulangaza uli mgati yako wowa ziza, avo ziza hijo dowa kulu!
“Haduhu munhu yodaha kuwasang'hanikila wandewa wabili, kwavija komwihila imwe na kumnogela iyagwe, ama komnanahila imwe na kum'beza iyagwe. Hudaha kumsang'hanikila Mulungu kuno usang'hanikila mali.
“Avo nowalongela, sambimuigazile ugima wenu, kamba mje choni ama mung'we choni, ama ng'huli zenu, kamba m'vale choni. Ugima hauzamile kubanza mandia? Na lukuli haluzamile kubanza vivalo?
Waloleni ndege wa kuulanga, hawahanda, hawahuna, na hawakunzanya mmakano, na Tata wenu wa kuulanga kowagwelela mandia. Avo, mweye mzama ng'hani kubanza ndege.
Yalihi mmwanza wenu mkuigaza yodaha kuiyongezela saa dimwe da ugima wake?
“Habali muigazila vivalo? Loleni malua ga kumgunda vigokula, hagasang'hana ama kuitendela vivalo.
Nowalongela kamba hata Selemani na yenzi yake yose havazigwe vinogile kamba dimwe da malua gano.
Ihawa kamba Mulungu kodivaza jani da kumgunda, dija lelo dabaho na mayo dokwasigwa muna umoto, vino heyo haleka kuwavaza vinogile mweye wanhu muli na nhamanila ndodo?
“Avo sambimuigaze mkulonga, ‘Toja choni?’ ama ‘Tong'wa choni?’ ama ‘Tovala choni?’
Kwavija Wamhazi wovizahila vinhu vino vose, na Tata wenu wa kuulanga kovitanga kamba movilonda vinhu vino vose.
Ila uzahileni tanhu Undewa wa Mulungu na ndagizi zake, na vinhu vino vose mogweleligwa.
Avo sambimuigazile mayo, kwavija mayo yowa na migayo yake yenyego. Mgayo wa zua dimwe wotosha kwa zua dimwe.”
“Sambimuwataguse wayagwe, na Mulungu hawatagusa mweye,
kwavija kamba vimuwatagusa wayagwe, vivo na Mulungu vondayawataguse mweye, na mhima iija yondamuwapimile wayagwe, iyo mhima yondampimilwe mweye.
Habali ukilola kikupi msiso da ndugu yako, na huchona kibanzi kili msiso jako mwenyego?
Kodaha vilihi kumulongela ndugu yako, ‘Beta nikulave kikupi mdisiso jako,’ kuno gweye kuna kibanzi mdisiso jako?
Gweye kidelenya! Songa tanhu kulava kibanzi msiso jako mwenyego, giladi udahe kulola goya, abaho, leka ulave kikupi msiso da ndugu yako.
“Sambimuwagwelele umbwa vinhu ving'alile, kamba muhatenda avo, wowahindukila na kuwadega, na sambimuwasile mitumbi lulu zenu, kamba muhatenda avo, wozibojaga.
“Puleni, mogweleligwa. Zahileni, movumbula. Toeni hodi, movugulilwa.
Kwavija yoyose yopula kogweleligwa, na yoyose yozahila kovumbula, na yoyose yotoa hodi kovugulilwa.
Ama yalihi mmwanza wenu, kamba mwanage yahampula mkate, komgwelela dibwe?
Ama yahampula somba, komgwelela nyoka?
Ihawa mweye mtenda mbuli zihile, movitanga kuwagwelela wanenu vinhu vinogile, avo, Tata wenu wa kuulanga kabanza ng'hani kuwagwelela vinhu vinogile waja wose wompula!
“Avo, chochose chumulonda mtendeligwe na wanhu, na mweye muwatendele vivo, kwavija gano gago mafundo ga Malagizo ga Musa na wahokozi.
“Ingileni mkubitila lwivi lusisili, kwavija lwivi lugazi na zila gazi dilongoza kuubananzi, na wondawengile kubitila zila hijo wowa bwando.
Ila lwivi lusisili na inzila yakibabani ilongoza kuugima, na wanhu wondawayone wowa wadodo.
“Iteganyeni na wahokozi wa uvwizi, womwizileni kunze walingile kamba ng'hondolo, ila mgati mbwizi wodumbiza.
Mowatambula kubitila sang'hano zao. Vino wanhu wobawa zabibu muna imizomola, ama tini muna imingemba?
Avo, m'biki unogile wolela mujo unogile, ila m'biki wihile wolela mujo wihile.
M'biki unogile haudaha kulela mujo wihile, na m'biki wihile haudaha kulela mujo unogile.
Na m'biki wowose uleka kulela mujo unogile wokanhigwa na kwasigwa muna umoto.
Avo, mowatambula kubitila sang'hano zao.
“Sio kila munhu yonikema, ‘Mndewa, Mndewa’ yondayengile muna Uundewa wa Kuulanga, ila heyo yogatenda gaja goyolonda Tataangu wa kuulanga.
Mdizua da nhaguso wanhu bwando wonilongela, ‘Mndewa, Mndewa! Hatuhokole mditwaga jako, na mditwaga jako tuwinga vinyamkela, na kutenda mizonza bwando?’
Abaho, nowalongela, ‘Siwatangile mweye. Segeleni hamwangu, mweye watenda gehile!’
“Avo munhu yoyose yohulika mbuli zangu na kuzisang'hana kolinga na munhu yali na nzewele yozenga ng'anda yake uchana ya dibwe.
Mvula itoa, nyanda zitula, na beho dibuma na kuitoa ng'anda hiyo, ila haitulike, kwavija msingi wake uzengigwa mdidibwe.
“Ila munhu yoyose yohulika mbuli zangu na kuleka kuzisang'hana kolinga na munhu m'bozi yozenga ng'anda yake mmisenga.
Mvula itoa, nyanda zitula, na beho dibuma na kuitoa ng'anda hiyo, nayo itulika, na nhulika yake ikala ihile ng'hani!”
Yesu viyamambukize kulonga gano, didale da wanhu dikanganya mafundo gake,
kwavija hafundize kamba wafundiza zao wa Malagizo ga Musa, ila kafundiza kamba munhu yali na udaho.
Yesu viyahumuluke kulawa mkigongo, madale makulu ga wanhu gamkoleleza.
Na munhu yakalile na dikulu kamwizila na kamfugamila mavindi, kalonga, “Mndewa, uhalonda, kodaha kunihonya.”
Yesu kagolosa mkono wake, kamkwasa, kamulongela, “Nolonda, uhonyigwe!” Bahaja kahonyigwa utamu wake.
Abaho, Yesu kamulongela, “Tegeleza, sambiumulongele munhu, ila genda ukailaguse ha mkulu wa nhambiko, abaho ukalave nhosa kamba viyalagize Musa, giladi wanhu wose watogole kamba kuhona.”
Yesu viyengile Kapenaumu, mkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma kamwizila, kamuyalalila
na kulonga, “Mndewa, mtumigwa wangu katambalala ukae, kaholola, mtamu ng'hani.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokwiza kumuhonya.”
Ija imkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma kamwidika, “Mndewa, nie silumbile gweye wingile mng'anda yangu, ila longa mbuli tu, na mtumigwa wangu kohona.
Kwavija nie mwenyego na munhu nikigwe hasi ya udaho, nna asikali hasi yangu. Nomulongela imwe, ‘Genda!’ na heyo kochola, na nomulongela iyagwe, ‘Izo!’ na heyo kokwiza. Na nomulongela mtumigwa wangu, ‘Tenda vino!’ na heyo kotenda.”
Yesu viyahulike vino, kakanganya na kuwalongela waja wakalile womkoleleza, “Nowalongela ikweli, sinamona munhu yoyose muisi ya Islaeli yali na nhamanila ng'hulu kamba ino.
Nowalongela kamba wanhu bwando wokwiza kulawa haulawilo wa zua na hauswelo wa zua na wokala hana ulusona hamoja na Ablaham, Isaka, na Yakobo Muundewa wa Kuulanga.
Ila Wana wa Undewa wokwasigwa hanze mdiziza, ako kondawalile na kugegedula meno.”
Abaho, Yesu kalonga na ija imkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma, “Genda, yotendeka kamba vija vuutamanile.” Na kipigiti kikija mtumigwa wake kahona.
Yesu viyavikile hakae ha Petulo, kam'vika mama mkwe yake Petulo kawasa mulusazi mtamu wa homa.
Kamkwasa mkono wake, na homa imulawa, abaho kenuka na kusonga kumsang'hanikila.
Viivikile ichungulo, wamgalila wanhu bwando wakalile na vinyamkela, na heyo kawawinga ivinyamkela mkuwakomhokela, na kawahonya wanhu wose wakalile watamu.
Giladi gavikile gaja galongigwe na muhokozi Isaya, “Heyo mwenyego kausola unyondenyonde wetu na kavipapa vitamu vetu.”
Yesu viyadiwene didale da wanhu domzunguluka, kawalagiza wanahina zake wachole mwambu uyagwe wa dilamba.
Mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa kamcholela, kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, nokuwinza kokose kuuchola.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Mbwizi wana mhango, na ndege wa kuulanga wana mvulu, ila nie, Mwana wa Munhu, kabule hanhu ha kutambalika pala jake.”
Mwanahina iyagwe kamulongela, “Mndewa, nileke tanhu nyhole hazike tataangu.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Ng'hweleleza nie, waleke wadanganhike wazike wadanganhike wayao.”
Abaho, Yesu kakwela muingalawa hamoja na wanahina zake.
Bahaja dilawila kukuzumbi kulu mdilamba, avo mawimbi gaimemeza mazi ingalawa. Ila Yesu kakala yawasile.
Wanahina zake wamcholela wamulamusa, walonga, “Mndewa, tukombole! Todanganhika!”
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye wanhu muli na nhamanila ndodo, habali mkona bwembwe?” Abaho, kenuka na kudikomhokela dibeho na gamawimbi, na kukala hapozike.
Wanahina zake wakanganya, walonga, “Ino iyo munhu wa vilihi? Hata beho na mawimbi vomuhulika!”
Yesu viyavikile mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba hana iisi ya Gadala, kaiting'hana na wanhu wabili wali na vinyamkela wakalile wolawa mmapanga. Wakala wodumbiza ng'hani mbaka hakukalile na munhu yadahile kubita nzila iyo.
Waguta nyangi, walonga, “Kotulonda choni, Mwana wa Mulungu? Kwiza kutugaza kipigiti king'hali hakinavika?”
Behi na aho kukala na dale kulu da mitumbi wodila.
Vinyamkela wamuyalalila Yesu, walonga, “Uhatuwinga, tuleke tuchole tukengile mdidale dija da mitumbi.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Gendeni!” Avo walawa, wachola kuwengila mitumbi. Baho dale jose da imitumbi dihumulukila kubonde mdigema, dingila mdilamba na kudanganhika mmazi.
Waja iwanhu wakalile wowachunga imitumbi wakimbila, wachola hana ikiwambo na kuwalongela wanhu mbuli zose, hamoja na gaja gawalawilile waja wanhu wakalile na vinyamkela.
Avo, wanhu wose wa ikiwambo kija walawa, wamcholela Yesu, na viwamuwene, wamuyalalila yahalawe muisi yao.
Yesu kakwela muingalawa, kaloka na kuvika mkiwambo chake.
Wanhu wayagwe wamgalila munhu yaholole, yatambalale mulusazi. Yesu viyaiwene nhamanila yao, kamulongela ija imunhu yaholole, “Gangamala, mwanangu! Vilozo vako vigeligwa kumgongo.”
Abaho, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakalile baho wailongela wenyego kwa wenyego, “Munhu ino kofukula!”
Yesu kavitanga vija viwakalile wogelegeza, kalonga, “Habali mgelegeza vihile mmioyo yenu?
Dilihi dibuhile ng'hani, kulonga, ‘Vilozo vako vigeligwa kumgongo,’ ama kulonga, ‘Ima wima utembele?’
Nolonda m'vitange kamba, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nna udaho wa kuvigela kumgongo vilozo va wanhu muisi.” Abaho, kamulongela ija imunhu yaholole, “Ima wima, papa lusazi lwako, uchole ukae yako!”
Ija imunhu kema wima, na kuchola ukae.
Wanhu viwonile gano, wakanganya na kudumba, na kumuyenzi Mulungu yawagwelele wanhu udaho kamba uja.
Yesu viyakalile yochola kulawa haja, kamona munhu yokemigwa Matayo yakalile muna ing'anda yake ya kulihila kodi, na heyo kamulongela, “Ng'holeleza.” Matayo kenuka, kamkoleleza.
Yesu na wanahina zake wakala woja mandia ga ichungulo hakae ya Matayo. Wawila kodi bwando na wene vilozo wayagwe weza na kuja hamoja na hewo.
Mafalisayo viwonile gano, wawauza wanahina zake, “Habali mkulufunzi wenu yoja na wawila kodi na wene vilozo wayagwe?”
Yesu viyahulike vino, kalonga, “Wanhu wagima hawamulonda mganga, ila waja wali watamu wawo womulonda.
Gendeni mkaifundize nhegulo ya ulonzi uno, ‘Nolonda bazi na sio nhosa.’ Kwavija sizile kuwakema wanhu walibule vilozo, ila wanhu wali na vilozo.”
Abaho, wanahina wa Yohana M'batiza wamcholela Yesu, wamuuza, “Habali tweye na Mafalisayo tofunga, ila wanahina zako hawafunga?”
Yesu kawedika, “Wahenza wa mulawilamhambe wodaha vilihi kulila kipigiti viwali hamoja na heyo? Ila kipigiti chokwiza, mulawilamhambe vondayasegezigwe kulawa kumwao, leka na hewo wafunge.
“Haduhu munhu yogela kidanga cha kivalo cha sambi muna ikivalo cha umwaka, kwavija ikidanga choikunza na kuchongeza ikizonzo cha ikivalo cha umwaka.
Na wanhu hawagela divai ya sambi muna ivibuyu vitendigwe na kwembe va umwaka. Kamba wahatenda avo, ivibuyu vitendigwe na kwembe votulika, na idivai yokwitika, na ivibuyu vitendigwe na kwembe vobanangika. Ila divai ya sambi yogeligwa muna ivibuyu vitendigwe na kwembe va sambi, na vose vowa vigima.”
Yesu viyakalile yolonga vino, mkulu imwe wa ng'anda ya nhambiko kamcholela, kamfugamila mavindi, kamulongela, “Mndele wangu sambisambi kadanganhika, ila izo umwikile mkono wako na heyo kowa mgima.”
Avo Yesu hamoja na wanahina zake, wenuka, wamkoleleza.
Baho mtwanzi yakalile na utamu wa kutumika mkipigiti cha milao longo dimwe na mibili kamwizila Yesu kukisogo, abaho, kalukwasa lugigo lwa kivalo chake.
Kwavija kakala yoilongela mwenyego, “Ihawa nihagoga tu valo jake, nohona.”
Yesu kahinduka kamona, kamulongela, “Mndele, gangamala! Nhamanila yako ikuhonya.” Kipigiti kikija mtwanzi ija kahona.
Yesu viyavikile hakae ya ija imkulu wa ng'anda ya nhambiko, na viyawawene wotoa mhalati, na wanhu bwando wolila ng'hani,
kalonga, “Segeleni! Mndele ino hadanganhike, ila kawasa!” Abaho, wanhu wose wamseka.
Didale da wanhu vidilavigwe kunze, Yesu kengila mng'anda, kamgoga mkono ija imndele, na heyo kenuka.
Mbuli zino zenela hanhu hose muisi ija.
Yesu viyakalile yochola kulawa haja, vimbugumbugu wabili wamkweleleza, woguta nyangi, “Tonele bazi, Mwana wa Daudi!”
Yesu viyengile mng'anda, waja vimbugumbugu wamcholela, na Yesu kawauza, “Motogola kamba nie nodaha kuwahonya mweye?” Wedika, “Ona, Mndewa!”
Abaho, kagakwasa meso gao, kalonga, “Mtendeligwe kamba vija vumtamanila!”
Na meso gao gagubuligwa. Yesu kawazuma ng'hani, kawalongela, “Sambimmulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ino!”
Ila hewo wachola na kubwililisa mbuli za Yesu kila hanhu muisi ija.
Wanhu viwakalile wosegela, wamgalila munhu yakalile bubui yali na kinyamkela.
Kinyamkela viyawingigwe, ija imunhu kasonga kulonga, na wanhu wose wakanganya, walonga, “Hatunachona kinhu kamba kino muisi ya Islaeli!”
Ila Mafalisayo walonga, “Kowinga vinyamkela na mhiko za mkulu wa vinyamkela.”
Yesu kachola mmiwambo na m'viwambo vose, yofundiza mzing'anda zao za nhambiko, youpeta Usenga Unogile wa Undewa wa Mulungu, na kuhonya kila utamu na unyondenyonde.
Viyadiwene didale da wanhu, kawonela bazi, kwavija wakala wogaya na wabule munhu wa kuwataza, kamba ng'hondolo walibule mchunga.
Abaho, kawalongela wanahina zake, “Va kuhuna vimema ila wahunaji wadodo.”
Avo mpuleni mwene mgunda, yawagale wahunaji wahune vakuja vake.
Yesu kawakema wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili na kuwagwelela udaho wa kuwinga vinyamkela na kuhonya kila utamu na unyondenyonde.
Gano gago matwaga ga watumigwa wa Kilisto longo dimwe na wabili, wa mwanduso Simoni, yakalile yokemigwa Petulo, na ndugu yake Endelea, Yakobo na ndugu yake Yohana wanage Zebedayo,
Filipo na Batolomayo, Tomaso na Matayo muwila kodi, Yakobo mwanage Alufayo, Tadayo,
Simoni, yakalile yokemigwa Mgombeleza Isi ya Islaeli, na Yuda Isikalioti, yamuhonzile Yesu.
Yesu kawalagiza wano longo dimwe na wabili, kawalongela, “Sambimchole muisi ya Wamhazi ama kwingila mkiwambo cha Wasamalia,
ila gendeni ha ng'hondolo wapotele, awo wali wanhu wa Islaeli.
Ako kumchola, peteni mulonga, ‘Undewa wa Kuulanga ukwenhuka!’
Honyeni watamu, zuseni wadanganhike, wahonyeni watamu wa dikulu, wingeni vinyamkela. Mgweleligwa bule, laveni bule.
Sambimsole hela yoyose mmikwiji yenu,
sambimsole mkoba wa mwanza, ama koti da ikabili, ama ng'hwabasa, ama fimbo. Kwavija msang'hana kolondigwa yagweleligwe kitumetume chake.
“Vondamwingile mdiwambo ama mkiwambo, zahileni munhu yowatogola, giladi mkale hamwake mbaka vondamsegele.
Vondamwingile muna ing'anda ija walamseni wanhu wa ng'anda ija.
Na kamba wanhu wa ng'anda hiyo wahawabokela, walekeleni tindiwalo jenu, ila kamba hawawabokela, tindiwalo jenu diwabwelele mweye.
Ihawa munhu yoyose hawabokela mweye ama kuzitegeleza mbuli zenu, muhalawa muna ing'anda hiyo ama mkiwambo hicho, kung'unheni timbwisi dinanahile mmagulu genu, kamba usindila ulagusa kamba hewo wenyego waulema Usenga wa Mulungu.
Nowalongela ikweli, yodahika wanhu wa viwambo va Sodoma na Gomola koneligwa bazi mdizua da nhaguso kubanza wanhu wa kiwambo hicho!
“Tegelezeni! Nie nowatuma kamba ng'hondolo mdidale da mbwizi, muwe na nzewele kamba nyoka na muwe na moyo uholile kamba hua.
Iteganyeni na wanhu, kwavija wowagala mweye kukitala, na wowalanha mbalati muna zing'anda zao za nhambiko.
Mogaligwa ha wakulu wa isi na wandewa sama yangu nie, giladi munilavile usindila kumwao na ha Wamhazi.
Vondamgaligwe mkitala, sambimgelegeze kamba mulonge choni ama mulonge vilihi, kwavija kipigiti kicho mogweleligwa mbuli ya kulonga.
Kwavija sio mweye wondamulonge, ila Loho wa Tata wenu iyo yondayalonge kubitila mweye.
“Ndugu komuhonza ndugu yake giladi yakomigwe, na tata komuhonza mwanage, na wana wowahonza watata zao na wamama zao, na kuwatenda wakomigwe.
Mokwihilwa na wanhu wose sama ya twaga jangu. Ila yondayazaganye mbaka hakimambukizo, iyo yondayakomboligwa.
Wahawagaza mkiwambo kimwe, kimbilileni mkiwambo kiyagwe. Nowalongela ikweli, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nokwiza kipigiti hamnamambukiza kubita m'viwambo vose va Islaeli.
“Mwanahina ham'banza mkulufunzi wake, na nyakadala ham'banza mndewa wake.
Yotosha mwanahina kuwa kamba mkulufunzi wake, na nyakadala kuwa kamba mndewa wake. Ihawa mkulu wa ng'anda kokemigwa Belizebuli, haibanza ng'hani wanhu wa ng'anda yake kukemigwa matwaga gehile ng'hani!
“Avo sambimuwadumbe wanhu wano, kwavija haduhu kinhu kigubikigwe chondakileke kugubuligwa, ama kifisigwe chondakileke kutangigwa.
Kiniwalongela mdiziza, kipeteni hamulangaza, na kimuhulika kinyong'onywa, kipeteni mwa wanhu wose.
Sambimuwadumbe waja wose wokoma lukuli, ila hawadaha kukoma loho, mdumbeni Mulungu yodaha kubananga vose lukuli na loho na kuvasa kuzimu.
Vitongwa vibili haviuzigwa na hela ndodo? Ila hata kitongwa kimwe hakilagala hasi kamba Tata wenu halondile.
Na hata mvili zose zili mmapala genu zipetwa.
Avo sambimdumbe, mweye mnogeligwa ng'hani na Mulungu kubanza vitongwa bwando!
“Munhu yoyose yonitogola haulongozi wa wanhu, vivija na nie nomtogola haulongozi wa Tataangu yali kuulanga.
Ila munhu yoyose yonilema haulongozi wa wanhu, vivija na nie nomulema haulongozi wa Tataangu yali kuulanga.
“Sambimgelegeze kamba niza kugala tindiwalo muisi. Bule, sizile kugala tindiwalo, ila zele.
Kwavija niza kugala uhasama ha munhu na tataake, mndele na mamaake, mkemwana na mama mkwe yake,
na wadumuka wa munhu iwo waja wali mng'anda yake.
“Munhu yoyose yomnogela tataake ama mamaake kubanza nie, hadaha kuwa mwanahina wangu, vivija yomnogela mmhale wake ama mndele wake kubanza nie, hadaha kuwa mwanahina wangu.
Na munhu yoleka kusola msalaba wake na kunikoleleza, hadaha kuwa mwanahina wangu.
Munhu yogeza kuukombola ugima wake kowagiza, ila munhu yowagiza ugima wake sama yangu koukombola.
“Munhu yowabokela mweye konibokela nie, na munhu yonibokela nie kom'bokela ija yanhumile nie.
Munhu yoyose yom'bokela muhokozi kwavija viyali muhokozi, kobokela nhunza kamba iija iyobokela muhokozi. Na munhu yoyose yom'bokela munhu yanogile kwavija viyali munhu yanogile, kobokela nhunza kamba iija iyobokela munhu yanogile.
Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yolava hata kikasi cha mazi ga uzizimi ha munhu imwe wa wano wadodo kwavija viyali mwanahina wangu, haleka bule kubokela nhunza yake.”
Yesu viyamambukize kuwagwelela malagizo wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili, kahalawa haja, kachola kufundiza na kuwapetela wanhu mmiwambo ya isi ya Galilaya.
Yohana M'batiza viyakalile mkifungo, kazihulika sang'hano za Kilisto, avo kawalagiza wanahina zake wachole kumwake,
wakamuuze, “Gweye iyo ija yokwiza, ama tumulolele iyagwe?”
Yesu kawedika, “Gendeni mkamulongele Yohana mbuli zimuhulika na kuzona,
vimbugumbugu wolola, mbetembete wotembela, wene dikulu wohonywa, vinziwi wohulika, wadanganhike wozuka, na wakumbulu wopeteligwa Usenga Unogile.
Kamota munhu ija nie nilekile kuwa king'hwaso kumwake!”
Wanahina wa Yohana viwacholile, Yesu kasonga kudilongela didale da wanhu mbuli ya Yohana, yolonga, “Mchola kulola choni mkiwala? Ludete vulutigiswa na beho?
Mchola kulola choni? Mchola kumulola munhu yavalile vivalo vinogile? Wanhu wovala vivalo vinogile wokala mming'anda ya kindewa!
Mchola kulola choni? Muhokozi? Ona, nowalongela, yummuwene kana ukulu kubanza muhokozi.
Yohana iyo munhu Nyandiko Zing'alile zimulonga, ‘Nomulagiza msenga wangu yakulongole, yondayaitande nzila yako.’
Nowalongela ikweli, mmwanza wa wanhu wose waleligwe na watwanzi, haduhu yali mkulu kubanza Yohana M'batiza. Ila munhu yali mdodo kubanza wose muna Undewa wa Kuulanga iyo mkulu kubanza heyo.
Songela kipigiti cha Yohana M'batiza mbaka sambi, Undewa wa Kuulanga wokwingilwa na mhiko, na wanhu wali na mhiko wogeza kuusamha.
Kwavija wahokozi wose wahokola na Malagizo ga Musa gahokola mbaka kipigiti cha Yohana.
Na kamba motogola, Yohana iyo yalongigwe na wahokozi kamba iyo Eliya yondayeze.
Yali na magwiti na yahulike.
“Vino niwalinganyize na choni wanhu wa mazua gano? Walinga na wana wakalile hadibugano da soko na kuwakema wayagwe,
‘Tuwatoela ngoma ya lusona lwa zengele, ila mweye ham'vinile! Twimba vawembaga hauzisi, ila mweye hamulilile!’
Kwavija Yohana viyezile halulukile kuja na kung'wa na hewo walonga, ‘Kana kinyamkela!’
Mwana wa Munhu keza yoja na kung'wa, na hewo wolonga, ‘Munhu ino mmelo na mng'waji, mbwiga wa wawila kodi na wene vilozo wayagwe!’ Ila munhu kokoneka kana nzewele sama ya sang'hano zake.”
Abaho, Yesu kasonga kuwakomhokela wanhu wa miwambo ija mgati yake iyatendile mizonza yake bwando kwavija wanhu zao hawalondile kuleka vilozo vao.
“Kojona Kolazini! Kojona Betisaida! Ihawa mizonza itendeke kumwenu kamba ihatendeke Tilo na Sidoni, wanhu zao wahalekile vilozo vao umwaka mkuvala magunia na kukiibakaza mitozi!
Ila nowalongela, yodahika Tilo na Sidoni koneligwa bazi mdizua da nhaguso kubanza mweye!
Na gweye Kapenaumu! Kokiinula mwenyego mbaka kuulanga? Kohumuluswa mbaka kuzimu! Ihawa mizonza itendeke kumwako kamba ihatendeke Sodoma, kiwambo hicho kihakalile baho mbaka lelo!
Ila nowalongela, yodahika Sodoma koneligwa bazi mdizua da nhaguso kubanza mweye!”
Kipigiti kija Yesu kalonga, “Nokugwaa hewela, Tata, Mndewa wa kuulanga na isi, kwavija kuwafisa mbuli zino wanhu wali na nzewele na wasomile, ila kuwagubulila wana wadodo.
Ona, Tata, kwavija vino vivo vuulondile vitendeke.
“Vinhu vose nigweleligwa na Tataangu. Haduhu munhu yomtanga Mwana ila Tata, na haduhu munhu yomtanga Tata ila Mwana na munhu yoyose Mwana yolonda kumgubulila.
“Izoni kumwangu mweye mose mdonhile na mpapa mibahasha mikulu, na nie nowagwelela mhumulo.
Ifungeni nila yangu, na mwiifunze kumwangu, kwavija nie nihola mmoyo na nikiihumulusa, na mweye mopata mhumulo mmioyo yenu.
Kwavija nila yangu hailumiza na bahasha yangu ibuha.”
Kipigiti kija Yesu kakala yobita mmigunda ya ngano Mdizua da Mhumulo. Wanahina zake wona nzala, avo wasonga kufyola zisota za gamakungwi ga ngano na kudafuna.
Mafalisayo viwawawene, wamulongela Yesu, “Lola, wanahina zako wotenda gagomeswe kutendigwa Mdizua da Mhumulo!”
Yesu kawedika, “Hamsomile kija chayatendile Daudi kipigiti heyo na wayage viwakalile na nzala?
Kengila mdihema da Mulungu, na heyo na wayage waija imikate ilavigwe nhosa, mbuli igomeswe na Malagizo ga Musa heyo ama wayage kuija, ila wakulu wa nhambiko weiyeka.
Ama, hamsomile muna Gamalagizo ga Musa kamba wakulu wa nhambiko wotenda mbuli zigomesigwe kutendigwa Mdizua da Mhumulo muna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, na hawoneka na Mulungu kamba wotenda mbuli ihile?
Nowalongela, hano hana mkulu kubanza Ng'anda ya Mulungu.
Ila kamba muhaitangile nhegulo ya ulonzi uno, ulonga, ‘Nolonda bazi na sio nhosa,’ sambimuwataguse wanhu walibule vilozo.
Kwavija, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nene Mndewa hata Mdizua da Mhumulo.”
Yesu kahalawa hanhu haja, kengila muna ing'anda yao ya nhambiko,
na muja kukala na munhu yaholole mkono. Kuno wozahila kilamso cha kumtagusa, wamuuza, “Malagizo ga Musa gotogoza kumuhonya munhu Mdizua da Mhumulo?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Munhu yalihi mmwanza wenu yali na ng'hondolo imwe yengile mdikolongo Mdizua da Mhumulo, yondayaleke kumgoga na kumulava hanze?
Munhu kazama mianza mingahi kubanza ng'hondolo! Avo, Malagizo ga Musa gotogoza kutenda ganogile Mdizua da Mhumulo.”
Abaho, kamulongela ija imunhu yaholole umkono, “Golosa mkono wako.” Avo kaugolosa, na uwa mgima, kamba uja uyagwe.
Ila, Mafalisayo walawa kunze na kwika zundo wone vija vondawamkome Yesu.
Yesu viyavitangile kamba wamwikila zundo da kumkoma, kahalawa hanhu haja, na wanhu bwando wamkweleleza. Na heyo kawahonya wanhu wose wakalile watamu,
na kuwalagiza sambiwamulonge heyo iyo yalihi.
Mbuli zino zivikiza kija kilongigwe na muhokozi Isaya,
“Ino iyo mtumigwa wangu inimsagule, inimnogele, moyo wangu unogelwa nayo. Nomgwelela Loho wangu, na heyo koipeta nhaguso yangu ha Wamhazi.
Hagomba na munhu ama kuguta nyangi, haduhu munhu yondayadihulike dizwi jake mzinzila za m'viwambo.
Halubena ludete luveduke, ama kuuzima utambi ulava yosi. Mbaka vondayagatende gaja galibule uzenzeleganye gahume,
na Wamhazi woditamanila twaga jake.”
Abaho, wamgalila munhu yali na kinyamkela yakalile kimbugumbugu na bubui, na Yesu kamuwinga ikinyamkela, avo ija imunhu kadaha kulonga na kulola.
Wanhu wose wakanganya na kulonga, “Vodahika ino kuwa Kilisto, Mwana wa Daudi?”
Mafalisayo viwahulike vino, walonga, “Munhu ino kowinga vinyamkela na udaho wa Belizebuli tu, mkulu wa vinyamkela.”
Yesu kazitanga ngelegeza zao, kawalongela, “Undewa wowose uhaigola mmadalemadale, gogomba genyego kwa genyego, undewa hiwo haugendelela. Na wambo jojose ama mulango uhaigola mmadalemadale, gogomba genyego kwa genyego, mulango hiwo hawima.
Ihawa Mwenembago kowinga vinyamkela, kokiigola mwenyego, avo, undewa wake wodahaze kwima?
Na kamba nowinga vinyamkela na udaho wa Belizebuli, wanhu zenu wowinga vinyamkela na udaho waki? Avo, hewo wao wondawawataguse!
Ila kamba nowinga vinyamkela na Loho wa Mulungu, avo, Undewa wa Mulungu uwezila.
“Ama kodahaze munhu kwingila muna ing'anda ya munhu yali na mhiko na kum'bokonya vinhu vake, kamba hamfungile tanhu, leka yadahe kum'bokonya vinhu vili mng'anda yake?
“Munhu yoyose yalekile kuwa hamoja na nie, konibeza, na munhu yoyose yalekile kukunzanya na nie, kopwililisa.
Nowalongela, vilozo vose na ufukuzi wose wogeligwa kumgongo, ila ufukuzi wa kumfukulila Loho wa Mulungu haugeligwa kumgongo.
Munhu yoyose yonilonga vihile nie, Mwana wa Munhu, vodahika kugeligwa kumgongo, ila munhu yoyose yomulonga vihile Loho wa Mulungu havidahika kugeligwa kumgongo, muulumwengu uno ama kuulumwengu ukwiza.
“M'biki uhanoga na mujo wake wonoga, na m'biki uheha vivija na mujo wake wokwiha. Kwavija m'biki wotangigwa sama ya mujo wake.
Mweye wana wa nyoka! Modahaze kulonga kinhu kinogile na ihawa mweye wenyego mwiha? Kwavija munhu kolonga gaja gaumemeze moyo wake.
Munhu yanogile kolava ganogile kulawa muna ingama ya moyo wake unogile, na munhu yehile kolava gehile kulawa muna ingama ya moyo wake wihile.
“Nowalongela kamba, mdizua da nhaguso wanhu wolava mheta ya kila mbuli ihile iwailongile.
Kwavija kubitila mbuli zako kopeteligwa ganogile, na kubitila mbuli zako kotagusigwa.”
Abaho, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, tolonda tone mizonza kulawa kumwako.”
Yesu kedika kalonga, “Wanhu wa mulelo wihile na uleka kumtamanila Mulungu wolonda kilaguso! Ila hawagweleligwa kilaguso, ila kilaguso cha muhokozi Yona.
Kamba vija Yona viyakalile muna iinda ya isomba mkulu ng'hani mazua madatu, vivija nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nokala muna umoyo wa iisi mazua madatu.
Mdizua da nhaguso wanhu wa Ninawi wokwima na wanhu wa mulelo uno na kuwatagusa mweye, kwavija hewo waleka vilozo vao viwamuhulike Yona viyakalile yopeta. Na hano hana mkulu kubanza Yona!
Mdizua da nhaguso Malikia wa Kusi kokwima na wanhu wa mulelo uno na kuwatagusa mweye, kwavija heyo keza kulawa kuzisota za iisi giladi yategeleze ng'hungwe ya Selemani. Na hano hana mkulu kubanza Selemani!
“Kinyamkela yahamulawa munhu, kochola kubitila hanhu hanyalile yozahila hanhu ha kuhumula, ila hahapata.
Abaho, kolonga, ‘Nobweleganya kung'anda yangu kunilawile.’ Yahabwela na kuivika ing'anda yabule kinhu, ifagiligwa, na kuhambigwa,
kochola kuwasola vinyamkela wayagwe saba wehile kubanza heyo mwenyego, wokwingila na kukala himo. Na hali ya munhu hiyo yokwiha ng'hani kubanza ija ya haichanduso. Vino vivo vondaiwe ha wanhu wa mulelo uno wihile.”
Yesu viyakalile yang'hali yolonga na dale da wanhu, mamaake na ndugu zake wema hanze, walonda kulonga nayo.
Munhu imwe kamulongela, “Mamaako na ndugu zako wema hanze, wolonda kulonga nagwe.”
Yesu kamwidika ija imunhu yamulongele, “Mamaangu iyo yalihi? Na ndugu zangu wawo walihi?”
Kuno yowalinga kidole wanahina zake kalonga, “Wano wao mamaangu na ndugu zangu!
Kwavija munhu yoyose yogatenda goyolonda Tataangu wa kuulanga iyo ndugu yangu, lumbu jangu na mamaangu.”
Zua didija Yesu kalawa muna ing'anda, kakala hamgwazo wa idilamba.
Dale kulu da wanhu dimzunguluka, avo kakwela na kukala muna ingalawa. Na didale da wanhu dima mumgwazo wa idilamba.
Kawalongela vinhu bwando mmahala. “Mulimi kachola kuhanda mbeyu.
Viyakalile yozihanda, ziyagwe zilagalila mnzila, na ndege weza wazija.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mmabwe kukalile na ulongo mdodo. Avo zota himahima kwavija ulongo ukala mdodo.
Ila zua vidilawile diilukuza imiche na kwavija mizizi yake haingile hasi ng'hani imiche inyala.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mmizomola, imizomola ikula na kuizingiliza imiche.
Ila mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila muulongo unogile, ziyagwe zilela mia, ziyagwe zilela malongo sita, na ziyagwe zilela malongo madatu.
Yali na magwiti na yahulike.”
Abaho, wanahina wamcholela Yesu wamuuza, “Habali ulonga na wanhu mmahala?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye mgweleligwa nzewele za kuzitanga nyong'onyo za Undewa wa Kuulanga, ila hewo hawagweleligwe.
Munhu yali na kinhu kokongezelwa na kowa navo bwando, ila munhu yalibule kinhu hata kija ikidodo chayalinacho kobokigwa.
Kilamso cha kulonga nao mmahala kicho kino, kamba wolola ila hawona kinhu, na wotegeleza ila hawahulika ama hawavitanga.
Uhokozi wa Isaya uvikila kumwao, ‘Kuhulika mohulika, ila ham'vitanga, kulola molola, ila ham'vimanya,
kwavija wanhu wano wana mioyo midala, magwiti gao wagatenda sambigahulike, na meso gao wafing'hiliza. Ila kamba meso gao gahalolile, na magwiti gao gahahulike, wahavitangile mmioyo yao, na kunihindukila nie, nihawahonyile.’
“Ila gamota meso genu, kwavija golola, na magwiti genu, gohulika.
Nowalongela ikweli, wahokozi na wanhu bwando walibule uzenzeleganye wasulukila kugona gano gomgona mweye, ila hawagonile, na wasulukila kugahulika gano gomuhulika mweye, ila hawagahulike.
“Tegelezeni nhegulo ya dihala da mulimi.
Munhu yoyose yohulika Usenga wa Undewa wa Kuulanga ila hautanga, Mwenembago kokwiza na kuusamha uja Usenga uhandigwe mmoyo wake, zino zizo mbeyu zilagalile mnzila.
Mbeyu zilagalile mmabwe zizo Usenga uyahulike munhu, na baho koubokela mkudeng'ha.
Ila kwavija ukala na mizizi midodo, avo wokala mkipigiti kiguhi. Na kiheza kipigiti cha mgayo ama kugazigwa sama ya Usenga wa Mulungu, baho kobwela kukisogo.
Mbeyu zilagalile mmizomola, zizo zimbuli ziyahulike munhu, ila bwembwe da ulumwengu uno na unogelo wa mali wozizingiliza na kuzitenda sambizilele.
Ila mbeyu ilagalile muulongo unogile iyo munhu yaihulike imbuli na kuitanga, abaho, kalela mijo bwando, imwe kalela mia, iyagwe malongo sita, na iyagwe malongo madatu.”
Yesu kawalongela hala diyagwe, “Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na munhu yahandile mbeyu inogile mumgunda wake.
Ila wanhu wose viwakalile wawasile, mdumuka wake keza kahanda lolo muingano, abaho, kachola.
Ija ingano viyotile na kusonga kufumula, idilolo disonga koneka.
Nyakadala wa ija mwene mgunda keza kamulongela, ‘Mndewa, huhandile mbeyu zinogile mumgunda wako? Dilolo dilawa kwahi?’
Kamwidika, kamulongela, ‘Mdumuka iyo yatendile vino.’ Abaho, ija inyakadala kamuuza, ‘Kolonda tweye tuchole tukading'ole dilolo?’
Kamulongela, ‘Bule, kwavija kipigiti vondamding'ole dilolo, moding'ola hamoja na ingano.
Leka ingano na idilolo vose vikule hamoja mbaka kipigiti cha kuhuna. Na kipigiti hicho nowalongela wahunaji, tanhu dilundizeni idilolo, mdifunge makinzamakinza mkadisome moto, abaho, ilundizeni ingano mkaike kukano jangu.’ ”
Yesu kawalongela hala diyagwe, “Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na mbeyu ya haladali yaaisolile munhu na kuihanda mumgunda wake.
Mbeyu ndodo kubanza zose, ila ihakula yowa mche mkulu kubanza miche yose mkihati na hata kuwa biki kulu. Avo ndege wa kuulanga wokwiza na kuzenga mvulu mmatambi gake.”
Yesu kawalongela hala diyagwe, “Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na mela dodo diyasolile mtwanzi na kuditibuliza muna ivibaba vidatu va usage mbaka tonge jose dilulumuka.”
Yesu kawalongela wanhu bwando mbuli zino zose mmahala, hawalongele kinhu chochose bila mahala.
Giladi gaja galongigwe na muhokozi gavikile, “Nounanula mulomo wangu nilonge mmahala, Nilonge gaja gafisike songela ulumwengu vuulumbigwe.”
Abaho, Yesu kadileka didale da wanhu, kengila mng'anda. Wanahina zake wamkwenhukila wamulongela, “Tulongele nhegulo ya dihala da idilolo da kumgunda.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Imunhu yahandile imbeyu inogile iyo nie, Mwana wa Munhu,
umgunda uwo ulumwengu, na imbeyu inogile iyo wana wa Undewa wa Kuulanga, na idilolo dijo wanhu wa Mwenembago,
na imdumuka yahandile idilolo iyo Mwenembago. Gakuhuna gago zua da kimambukizo, na iwahunaji wao wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga.
Kamba vija idilolo vidilundizwe na kusomigwa moto, vivo vondaiwe muna dizua da kimambukizo.
Nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nowalagiza wasenga zangu wa kuulanga wavikunzanye na kuvilava hanze ya Undewa wake vija vose viwatenda wanhu watende vilozo, na waja wose watenda vilozo
na kuwasa mditanuli da moto. Ako kowa na kililo na kugegedula meno.
Abaho, wanhu wamnogele Mulungu wonang'hazika kamba zua Muundewa wa Tataao. Munhu yali na magwiti na yahulike!
“Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na ngama ifisigwe mumgunda. Na munhu imwe viyaiwene, kaifisa kabili, mkudeng'ha kachola kuguza vinhu vake vose viyalinavo, na kuugula mgunda uja.
“Vivija, Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na mchuluzi yozahila lulu zinogile,
na viyaiwene lulu imwe ya hela bwando, kachola na kuguza vinhu vake vose viyalinavo, na kuigula.
“Vivija, Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na nhando itandigwe m'bahali na kunamata somba wa namna zose.
Inhando viimemile, waikwekwesa waigala mhwani, abaho, wakala hasi na kuwabagula iwasomba, wanogile waweka muna imigelo na wehila wawasa.
Vivo vondaiwe mdizua da kimambukizo, wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga wokwiza na kuwabagula wanhu wehile kulawa mwa wanhu watendile ganogile,
na kuwasa wanhu wehile mditanuli da moto. Ako kowa na kililo na kugegedula meno.”
Yesu kawauza, “Movitanga vinhu vino vose?” Wamwidika, “Ona.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Avo mfundiza yoyose wa Malagizo ga Musa yafundizigwe mbuli za Undewa wa Kuulanga kalinga na mwene ng'anda yolava vinhu va sambi na va umwaka kulawa muna ingama yake.”
Yesu viyamambukize kulonga mahala gano, kahalawa hanhu haja,
kabwela hana ikiwambo chake kikemigwa Nazaleti. Kasonga kuwafundiza wanhu muna zing'anda zao za nhambiko, avo, wakanganya na kulonga, “Kaipata kwahi ng'hungwe ino na mhiko za kutenda mizonza?
Ino sio mwana wa salamala? Na mamaake hakemigwa Maliamu? Na ndugu zake sio kina Yakobo, Usufu, Simoni, na Yuda?
Na lumbu zake wose hawali hano hamoja na tweye? Avo munhu ino kazipata kwahi mhiko na nzewele zino zose?”
Avo hawanogelwe nayo. Ila Yesu kawalongela, “Muhokozi kohishimilwa kila hanhu, ila mkiwambo chake mwenyego na mng'anda yake mwenyego.”
Avo hatendile mizonza bwando hanhu haja kwavija wakala wabule nhamanila.
Kipigiti kija Helode Antipa, mtawala wa Galilaya, kahulika mbuli za Yesu,
avo kawalongela watumigwa zake, “Ino iyo Yohana M'batiza, kazuka kulawa mwa wanhu wadanganhike, kileka mana mhiko za kutenda mizonza zosang'hanika mgati yake.”
Kwavija Helode kakala yamgogile Yohana, kamfunga nzabi na kumgela mkifungo sama ya Helodia, mtwanzi wa mkulu wake yokemigwa Filipo.
Kwavija Yohana kakala yomulongela Helode, “Kutenda gagomeswe na Malagizo ga Musa kumsola Helodia!”
Helode kalonda kumkoma Yohana, ila kawadumba wanhu kwavija wakala wampetile kamba Yohana kakala muhokozi.
Muna dizua da lusona lwa ng'humbukila ya mvumbuka ya Helode, mndele wa Helodia kavina haulongozi wa iwahenza. Helode kanogelwa,
kamduilila na kamulongela kamba komgwelela kinhu chochose chondayapule.
Kuno yoswagizwa na mamaake, kalonga, “Nigwelele pala da Yohana M'batiza bahano muna ulungo!”
Mndewa kona giogio ng'hani, ila sama ya kiduilo chayaiduile na sama ya iwahenza wakalile haja, kalagiza yagweleligwe,
avo kalagiza pala da Yohana dikanhigwe muja mkifungo.
Pala jake digaligwa mulungo na kugweleligwa imndele, na heyo kamgalila mamaake.
Wanahina wa Yohana weza na kulusola lukuli lwake na kuluzika. Abaho, wachola kumulongela Yesu gaja galawilile.
Yesu viyahulike mbuli za Yohana, kanyelenhuka kulawa hanhu haja kakwela mngalawa kachola hanhu halibule wanhu. Ila wanhu viwahulike, walawa m'viwambo wamkoleleza na magulu.
Yesu viyahumuluke muna ingalawa, kawonela bazi na kuwahonya wanhu zao wakalile watamu.
Viivikile ichungulo wanahina wamcholela wamulongela, “Zua diswa na hano twa mkiwala, avo walongele iwanhu wachole m'viwambo wakaigulile mandia.”
Yesu kawedika, “Hawalondigwa wachole, wagweleleni mweye kinhu cha kuja!”
Na hewo wamulongela, “Hano twabule kinhu ila mikate mitano na somba wabili viiyeka.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vigaleni hano hamwangu.”
Kawalagiza wanhu wakale hasi muluzondo, abaho, kaisola imikate mitano na iwasomba wabili, kalola kuulanga, na kumuheweza Mulungu. Abaho kaimogola imikate, kawagwelela wanahina, na wanahina wawagwelela iwanhu.
Wose waja na kwiguta. Abaho wanahina wadondola vidanga va imikate na iwasomba visigale, wamemeza vigelo longo dimwe na vibili.
Mheta ya wanhu wadile imikate wakala wambigalo alufu tano, uhaleka watwanzi na wana.
Abaho, Yesu kawalagiza wanahina wakwele muna ingalawa wamulongole mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba, kipigiti heyo vayakalile yowalaga wanhu.
Viyamambukize kuwalaga, kakwela hakigongo yeiyeka kutambika. Na zua vidiswele, Yesu kakala hiko yeiyeka.
Ila kipigiti kino ingalawa ikala kutali na iisi inyalile, ikunhizwa na mawimbi kwavija beho dikala dolawa kuulongozi wa ingalawa.
Mkipigiti cha nzogolo zikwika Yesu kawacholela wanahina zake, yotembela uchana ya igamazi.
Wanahina viwamuwene yotembela uchana ya igamazi, wona bwembwe, walonga, “Mzimu!” Waguta nyangi kuno wogudema.
Bahaja Yesu kawalongela, “Gangamaleni! Iyo nene, sambimdumbe!”
Petulo kamulongela, “Mndewa, kamba iyo gweye, nilagize nitembele uchana ya gamazi nize kumwako.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Izo!” Avo Petulo kahumuluka muna ingalawa, na kutembela uchana ya gamazi, na kumcholela Yesu.
Ila viyadiwene dibeho, kadumba, na kusonga kudidimila muna gamazi, kaguta nyangi yolonga, “Mndewa, nikombole!”
Bahaja Yesu kagolosa mkono wake, kamgoga kamulongela, “Gweye uli na nhamanila ndodo! Habali usinha?”
Na viwakwelile muna ingalawa, dibeho dinyamala.
Wose wakalile muna ingalawa wamtambikila walonga, “Kweli gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu!”
Viweshile kuloka idilamba, wavika kuna iisi ya Genesaleti.
Wanhu wa hiko viwamtangile Yesu, wabwililisa mbuli zake m'viwambo vose vili mmambwegambwega, na wamgalila wanhu wose wakalile watamu.
Wamuyalalila kamba yawaleke wanhu wakalile watamu wakwase lugigo lwa guo jake, na wose walukwasile wahona.
Abaho, Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa kulawa Yelusalemu wamcholela Yesu, wamuuza,
“Habali wanahina zako hawaziwinza nzoela za wahenga zetu? Kwavija wahalonda kuja hawasuluza makono gao!”
Yesu kawedika, “Na mweye habali muileka ndagizi ya Mulungu sama ya nzoela yenu?
Kwavija Mulungu kalonga, ‘Wahishimile tataako na mamaako,’ na ‘Munhu yoyose yomulonga vihile tataake ama mamaake, yakomigwe.’
Ila mweye molonga kamba, mduhu mbuli munhu yahamulongela tataake ama mamaake kamba, ‘Sidaha kuwagwelela kinhu chochose kwavija niiduila kamba vinhu vinilondile kuwagwelela mweye nivilave ha Mulungu,’
Avo, mmbuli zino mowalongela wanhu sambiwawahishimile watata na wamama zao. Avo muizabuza mbuli ya Mulungu sama ya kuiwinza nzoela yenu.
Videlenya mweye, muhokozi Isaya kahokola goya yowalonga mweye haja viyalongile,
‘Mulungu kalonga, “Wanhu wano wonihishimila nie mmilomo yao, ila mioyo yao yakutali na nie.
Wonitambikila nie bule, kwavija wofundiza mafundo ga wanhu kamba Malagizo gangu!” ’ ”
Abaho, Yesu kadikema didale da wanhu na kudilongela, “Tegelezeni na kuvitanga!
Haduhu kinhu chondakingile mmulomo wa munhu chondakimtende yanyolodoke, ila munhu konyolodoswa na mbuli zilawa mmulomo wake.”
Abaho, wanahina wamcholela wamulongela, “Kuvitanga kamba Mafalisayo wehilwa viwazihulike mbuli zuulongile?”
Yesu kawalongela, “M'biki wowose hauhandigwe na Tataangu wa kuulanga wong'oligwa.
Walekeni! Hewo wawo vilangizi vimbugumbugu wowalongoza vimbugumbugu wayao. Na kamba kimbugumbugu yahamulongoza kimbugumbugu miyage, wose wolagalila mdikolongo.”
Petulo kamulongela, “Tulongele nhegulo ya hala dino.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vivija na mweye mng'hali hamnavitanga?
Ham'vitanga kamba kinhu chochose kingila mmulomo, chokwingila mmunda, abaho, cholawa hanze ya ulukuli?
Ila mbuli zilawa mmulomo, zolawa muna umoyo, na mbuli zino zizo zimtenda munhu yanyolodoke.
Kwavija kulawa mmoyo zolawa ngelegeza zihile, kukoma, ugoni, ushalati, ubavi, usindila wa uvwizi, na kuilonga vihile.
Gano gago gomtenda munhu yanyolodoke, ila kuja bila kusuluza makono, hakumtenda munhu yanyolodoke.”
Yesu kahalawa hanhu haja, kachola kuziisi za Tilo na Sidoni.
Na mtwanzi imwe Mkanaani, kulawa muisi ija, kamcholela. Kenula dizwi, kamulongela, “Mndewa, Mwana wa Daudi, nyonela bazi! Mndele wangu kogazigwa ng'hani na kinyamkela.”
Ila Yesu hamwidike. Wanahina zake wamcholela wamuyalalila, wolonga, “Muleke yachole! Kwavija kotutoela nyangi kuchugu chetu!”
Yesu kalonga, “Nie nitumigwa sama ya ng'hondolo wapotele wa isi ya Islaeli.”
Ija mtwanzi kamcholela Yesu na kumfugamila mavindi kamulongela, “Mndewa, nhaza!”
Yesu kedika, “Havilumbile kusola mandia ga wana na kuwasila umbwa.”
Ija mtwanzi kamulongela, “Ona, Mndewa, ila hata umbwa woja mandia gasigale galagale hasi kulawa haimeza ya mndewa wao.”
Abaho, Yesu kamulongela, “Gweye mtwanzi, nhamanila yako ng'hulu! Na iwe kumwako kamba vuulonda.” Na kipigiti kikija mndele wake kahona.
Yesu kahalawa haja, kabita mumgwazo wa Idilamba da Galilaya. Kakwela hakigongo, kakala hasi.
Wanhu bwando wamcholela, wamgalila walemale, vimbugumbugu, mbetembete, bubui, na wayagwe bwando, na kuweka haulongozi wa Yesu, na heyo kawahonya.
Wanhu wakanganya viwawawene mabubui wolonga, walemale wahonyigwa, mbetembete wotembela, na vimbugumbugu wolola. Wamuyenzi Mulungu wa Islaeli.
Yesu kawakema wanahina zake kawalongela, “Nowonela bazi wanhu wano, kwavija wakala na nie mazua madatu na sambi wabule kinhu cha kuja kisigale. Na nie silonda niwaleke wachole na nzala, sambiweze kusinduka mnzila.”
Wanahina zake wamulongela, “Kwahi kondatupate mandia ga kuwegutiza wanhu bwando kamba wano mkiwala kino?”
Yesu kawauza, “Mikate mingahi imulinayo?” Wamulongela, “Mikate saba na visomba vidogodogo.”
Avo Yesu kawalagiza waja iwanhu wakale hasi.
Kaisola imikate saba na ivisomba, kamuheweza Mulungu, abaho, kaimogola na kuwagwelela wanahina, na wanahina wadigwelela didale da wanhu.
Wose waja na kwiguta. Abaho, wanahina wadondola vidanga va imikate na ivisomba visigale, wamemeza migelo saba.
Wanhu wose wadile wakala wambigalo alufu nne uhaleka watwanzi na wana.
Yesu viyeshile kudilaga didale da wanhu, kakwela muna ingalawa, kachola kuisi ya Magadani.
Mafalisayo na Masadukayo wamcholela Yesu, wamgeza mkumulonda yawalagusile kilaguso kulawa kuulanga.
Yesu kawedika, “Ihavika ichungulo, molonga, ‘Kowa na mchesa, kwavija ulanga mdung'hu.’
Na imitondo molonga, ‘Lelo kowa na mvula, kwavija ulanga una udung'hu na utitu.’ Mweye movitanga kuzuza vinhu vikoneka kuulanga, ila hamudahile kuzuza vilaguso va vipigiti vino!
Mulelo wihile na uleka kumtamanila Mulungu! Wolonda kilaguso! Ila hawagweleligwa kilaguso, ila kilaguso cha muhokozi Yona.” Abaho, Yesu kawaleka, kachola.
Wanahina viwavikile mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba, wavitanga kamba waisemwa kusola mikate.
Yesu kawalongela, “Loleni na muiteganye na mela da Mafalisayo na Masadukayo.”
Wailongela wenyego kwa wenyego, wolonga, “Kalonga vino kwavija tuleka kusola mikate.”
Yesu kagatanga gaja gawakalile wolonga, na heyo kawalongela, “Mweye wanhu muli na nhamanila ndodo, habali mulongelela mbuli za kuwa bule mikate?
Mng'hali hamnavitanga? Muisemwa ija imikate mitano iwadile wambigalo alufu tano, na mkunzanya vigelo vingahi vimemile?
Ama ija imikate saba iwadile wambigalo alufu nne, na mkunzanya migelo mingahi imemile?
Vilihi ham'vitanga kamba sikalile nilonga na mweye mmbuli ya mikate? Iteganyeni na mela da Mafalisayo na Masadukayo!”
Abaho, wavitanga kamba Yesu hakalile yowazuma waiteganye na mela da kugela mmikate, ila waiteganye na mafundo ga Mafalisayo na Masadukayo.
Yesu kachola kuisi ili behi na wambo da Kaisalia Filipi, kawauza wanahina zake, “Wanhu wolonga kamba Mwana wa Munhu iyo yalihi?”
Wamwidika wamulongela, “Wayagwe wolonga Yohana M'batiza, wayagwe wolonga Eliya, na wayagwe wolonga Yelemia ama imwe wa wahokozi.”
Yesu kawauza, “Ila na mweye molonga nie iyo yalihi?”
Simoni Petulo kamwidika, “Gweye iyo Kilisto, Mwana wa Mulungu yali na ugima.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Kumota Simoni, mwana wa Yohana! Kwavija haduhu munhu yakugubulile gano, ila Tataangu wa kuulanga.
Nokulongela kamba gweye iyo Petulo, na mdibwe dino nodizenga kanisa jangu, na mhiko za kuzimu hazidaha kudihuma.
Nokugwelela vivugulilo va Undewa wa Kuulanga, chochose chondaukifunge muna iisi, chofungigwa kuulanga. Na chochose chondaukifungule muna iisi, chofunguligwa kuulanga.”
Abaho, Yesu kawazuma wanahina zake kamba sambiwamulongele munhu yoyose kamba heyo iyo Kilisto.
Songela kipigiti kija Yesu kasonga kuwalongela wanahina zake, “Nolondigwa nichole Yelusalemu, na hiko nogazigwa na wavyele, na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Nokomigwa, ila gahabita mazua madatu nozuka kulawa mkudanganhika.”
Petulo kamsola kamgala hamgwazo na kusonga kumkomhokela yolonga, “Sambiiwe vino, Mndewa! Mbuli hiyo haikulawila gweye!”
Yesu kahinduka kamulongela Petulo, “Bwela kuchugu changu, Mwenembago! Gweye kwa king'hwaso kumwangu nie, kwavija hugelegeza ga Mulungu, ila kogelegeza ga wanhu.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Kamba munhu yahalonda kuwa mwanahina wangu, yaibele mwenyego, yaidikwe msalaba wake yanikoleleze.
Munhu yoyose yahalonda kuukombola ugima wake, kowagiza, na munhu yoyose yowagiza ugima wake sama yangu nie, koukombola.
Kinhu chaki kinogile munhu chondayakipate kamba yahaupata ulumwengu wose, na kuwagiza ugima wake uli muloho? Ama kinhu chaki chondayalave giladi yabwezelwe ugima wake uli muloho?
Kwavija nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nokwiza na wasenga zangu wa Mulungu wa kuulanga muna iyenzi ya Tataangu, abaho, nomuliha kila munhu kamba vija viyasang'hane.
Nowalongela ikweli, hana wanhu wayagwe wemile hano hawadanganhika mbaka vondawanyone nie Mwana wa Munhu, nikwiza muna Uundewa wangu.”
Vigabitile mazua sita Yesu kawasola Petulo, Yakobo, na Yohana ndugu yake Yakobo kakwela nao kukigongo kitali weiyeka.
Yesu kagaluka haulongozi wao, na kihanga chake kinang'hazika kamba zua, na vivalo vake vikala vizelu kamba mulangaza.
Bahaja, walawililwa na Musa na Eliya, wolonga na Yesu.
Petulo kamulongela Yesu, “Mndewa, vinoga tweye tukale hano! Na uhalonda nozenga vizewe vidatu, kimwe chako, kimwe cha Musa, na kiyagwe cha Eliya.”
Viyakalile yang'hali yolonga, wingu zelu diwagubika, na dihulikwa dizwi kulawa mdiwingu dilonga, “Ino iyo Mwanangu yanogele, mtegelezeni heyo!”
Wanahina viwahulike vino, wagwa kingubanguba, wona bwembwe ng'hani.
Yesu kawacholela, abaho, kawakwasa kawalongela, “Gandamukeni, sambimdumbe!”
Na viwalolile uchana, hawamuwene munhu yoyose ila Yesu yeiyeka.
Viwahumuluke haikigongo, Yesu kawalagiza yolonga, “Sambimmulongele munhu yoyose gaja gamgawene, mbaka nie, Mwana wa Munhu, vondanizuke kulawa mkudanganhika.”
Abaho, wanahina wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wolonga kamba tanhu Eliya yeze?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kweli, Eliya kokwiza kwika goya vinhu vose.
Ila nowalongela, Eliya keza kesha, na hewo hawamtambule, ila wamtendela vija viwalondile. Vivija na heyo Mwana wa Munhu kogazigwa mmakono gao.”
Abaho, wanahina wavitanga kamba kakala yowalongela mbuli za Yohana M'batiza.
Viwavikile hana ididale da wanhu, munhu imwe kamcholela Yesu kamfugamila mavindi,
kamulongela, “Mndewa, monele bazi mmhale wangu, kwavija kana kisango na kugazika ng'hani. Mianza bwando kalagalila hamoto ama mgamazi.
Nimgala ha wanahina zako, ila walemelwa kumuhonya.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye wanhu mwihile, mulibule nhamanila, nokala na mweye mbaka zua jaki? Nowazaganya mbaka zua jaki? Mgaleni hano hamwangu!”
Yesu kamkomhokela ija ikinyamkela, na ikinyamkela kamulawa immhale, na heyo kipigiti kikija kahona.
Abaho, wanahina wamwizila Yesu kinyele, wamuuza, “Habali tweye tulemelwa kumuwinga?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kwavija muhungukilwa na nhamanila! Nowalongela ikweli, kamba muhawa na nhamanila ndodo kamba mbeyu ya haladali, modaha kukilongela kigongo kino, ‘Segela hano uchole haja!’ Na ikigongo chosegela. Haduhu kinhu chochose chondamulemelwe kutenda!”
Ila kinyamkela kamba ino havidahika kulawa, ila mkutambika na kufunga.
Wanahina viwaiting'hane hamoja ako Galilaya, Yesu kawalongela, “nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nogeligwa mmakono ga wanhu,
wonikoma, ila gahabita mazua madatu nozuka.” Wanahina wanyunguala ng'hani.
Yesu na wanahina zake viwavikile Kapenaumu, wawila kodi wa Ng'anda ya Mulungu wamcholela Petulo wamuuza, “Mkulufunzi wako kalihaga kodi ya Ng'anda ya Mulungu?”
Petulo kawedika, “Ona, kalihaga.” Petulo viyengile mng'anda, Yesu kakala waichanduso kulonga nayo, “Simoni, gweye kokonaze? Wandewa wa isi wowila kodi kulawa ha wanhu walihi? Kulawa ha wenekae ama kulawa ha wahenza?”
Petulo kamulongela, “Kulawa ha wahenza.” Abaho, Yesu kamulongela, “Kulonga goya, kwavija wenekae hawalondigwa kuliha kodi.
Giladi sambituwagevuze, avo genda hana dilamba ukase nduwano, abaho, msole somba yondayalongole kunamata, na uhaunanazula mulomo wake, kovika hela, abaho, isole ukanilihile nie na gweye mwenyego.”
Kipigiti kija wanahina wamcholela Yesu wamuuza, “Yalihi yali mkulu kubanza wose muna Uundewa wa Kuulanga?”
Yesu kamkema mwana mdodo, abaho, kamwika haulongozi wao,
kalonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, ihawa hamulonda kugaluka na kulinga kamba wana wadodo, hamdaha kwingila muna Uundewa wa Kuulanga.
Munhu yoyose yokiihumulusa kamba mwana ino, iyo mkulu kubanza wose muna Uundewa wa Kuulanga.
Na munhu yoyose yom'bokela mwana mdodo kamba ino mtwaga jangu, konibokela nie.
“Ihawa munhu yoyose yahamtenda imwe wa wanhu wano wadodo yatende vilozo, vihanogile munhu hiyo yafungigwe msingo yake dibwe kulu da kusiginhila na kwasigwa mkilindi cha bahali.
Ulumwengu wojona sama ya ving'hwaso viwatenda wanhu wengile m'vilozo! Kwavija ving'hwaso havidahika kuleka kulawilila, ila kojona munhu ija yotenda ving'hwaso vilawilile!
“Ihawa mkono wako ama mgulu wako wokutenda utende vilozo, ukanhe, uwase kutali na gweye! Vinoga wingile muna ugima wa digunge kuno ulemale ama uli mbetembete, kubanza kuwa na makono mabili ama magulu mabili, abaho, wasigwe muna umoto wa digunge.
Na kamba siso jako dokutenda utende vilozo, ding'ole, ujase! Vinoga wingile muna uugima wa digunge na siso dimwe, kubanza kuwa na meso mabili, abaho, wasigwe muna umoto wa kuzimu.
“Teganyeni! Sambimumzabuze imwe wa wanhu wano wadodo. Nowalongela kamba, wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga wali hamoja nao mazua gose wa behi na Tataangu wa kuulanga.
Kwavija Mwana wa Munhu keza kuwakombola waja wapotele.
“Mokonaze, kamba munhu yahawa na ng'hondolo mia, abaho, ng'hondolo imwe yahapotela, vino hawaleka waja ng'hondolo malongo tisa na tisa wasigale mkigongo na kuchola kumzahila ija ng'hondolo imwe yapotele?
Nowalongela ikweli, kamba yahamona, komdeng'hela ng'hani kubanza waja ng'hondolo malongo tisa na tisa walekile kupotela.
Vivija na Tata wenu wa kuulanga halonda hata munhu imwe wa wano wadodo yapotele.
“Ihawa ndugu yako kakutenda gehile, genda ukamulongele kija kinhu kihile chayakutendile muli wabili mwiyeka. Na kamba kokutegeleza, kumpata kabili ndugu yako.
Ila kamba hakutegeleze, msole munhu imwe ama wabili wayagwe hamoja na gweye, giladi mmbuli za wasindila wabili ama wadatu kila kinhu kitangigwe.
Na kamba hawategeleze, walongele wanhu wamtogole Kilisto, na vivija yahalema kuwategeleza, avo umone kamba Mmhazi na muwila kodi.
“Nowalongela ikweli, chochose chondamkifunge muna iisi, chofungigwa kuulanga. Na chochose chondamkifungule muna iisi, chofunguligwa kuulanga.
“Vivija, nowalongela ikweli, kamba wabili mmwanza wenu muna iisi wahaitogolela mmbuli ya kinhu chochose chowopula, wotendeligwa na Tataangu wa kuulanga.
Kwavija hawali wabili ama wadatu waiting'hane mtwaga jangu, na nie na hamoja nao.”
Abaho, Petulo kamcholela Yesu kamuuza, “Mndewa, kamba ndugu yangu yahanitenda vilozo, nimgele kumgongo mianza mingahi? Hata mianza saba?”
Yesu kamulongela, “Sikulongela mianza saba, ila mianza malongo saba mala saba.
Kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na mndewa imwe yalondile kuwakagula watumigwa zake wakalile wamkopile hela.
Viyasongile kukagula, kagaliligwa munhu yakalile yowilwa talanta alufu longo dimwe.
Ija imtumigwa hakalile na cha kuliha, avo mndewa kalagiza kamba yaguzwe heyo na mtwanzi wake na wanage na kila kinhu kiyali nacho, giladi yalihe hela ziyakalile yowilwa.
Avo ija imtumigwa kamfugamila mavindi kamuyalalila kamulongela, ‘Mndewa, nyalize, nokuliha hela zako zose!’
