Mndewa wa imtumigwa ija kamonela bazi, avo kamgela kumgongo deni jake jose, abaho, kamuleka yachole.
“Abaho, ija imunhu viyacholile, kaiting'hana na mtumigwa miyage yakalile yomuwila dinali mia. Kamgoga na kusonga kumfida msingo, kalonga, ‘Nilihe deni jangu!’
Ija imtumigwa miyage kamfugamila mavindi kamuyalalila kamulongela, ‘Nyalize, nokuliha deni jako jose!’
Ila heyo kalema, avo kachola, kamgela mkifungo mbaka vondayalihe hela zose ziyakalile yowilwa.
Watumigwa wayage viwawene gaja galawilile, wona giogio, avo wachola, wamulongela mndewa wao mbuli zose zilawilile.
Abaho, ija imndewa kamkema kamulongela, ‘Gweye kwa mtumigwa wihile! Nie nikugela kumgongo deni jako jose kwavija vuuniyalalile.
Vino hulondigwe na gweye kumonela bazi mtumigwa miyago kamba nie vinikonele bazi?’
Mndewa wake kona lusango, avo kamgoga, kamgela mkifungo mbaka vondayalihe dideni.
“Vino vivo Tataangu wa kuulanga vondayawatende mweye ahaja munhu mmwanza wenu yahalema kumgela kumgongo ndugu yake, kulawa mmoyo wake.”
Yesu viyamambukize kulonga mbuli zino, kalawa Galilaya kachola kuna iisi ya Yudea mwambu uyagwe wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Wanhu bwando wamkweleleza, na heyo kawahonya hiko.
Mafalisayo wamcholela na kumgeza mkumuuza, “Malagizo ga Musa gomtogoza munhu kumwasa mtwanzi wake mmbuli yoyose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Vino, hamsomile Mzinyandiko Zing'alile? Ahaja hazilonga kamba haichanduso Mulungu kawalumba mtwanzi na mbigalo.
Na heyo kalonga, ‘Mkilamso kino mbigalo kowaleka tataake na mamaake na kuilumba na mwehe wake, na wabili wano wowa lukuli lumwe.’
Avo sio wabili, ila lukuli lumwe. Kwavija kiyalumbile Mulungu, haduhu munhu yondayakimamazule.”
Mafalisayo wamuuza, “Habali Musa kalonga Mmalagizo gake kamba munhu kodaha kumgwelela mtwanzi wake lupwilili lwa nyasa na kumwasa?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Musa kawatogoza muwase watwanzi zenu sama ya udala wa mioyo yenu. Ila haikalile vino songela haichanduso.
Nowalongela kamba, mbigalo yoyose yomwasa mtwanzi wake na kumsola mtwanzi iyagwe, kotenda ugoni. Ila munhu yahamwasa mtwanzi wake sama ya kutenda ugoni kodaha kusola mtwanzi iyagwe.”
Wanahina zake wamulongela, “Ihawa vino vivo ili ha mbigalo na mtwanzi wake, vinoga kuleka kusola.”
Yesu kawedika kawalongela, “Sio wanhu wose wodaha kuitogola mbuli ino, ila ha waja wose wagweleligwe motelo ino na Mulungu.
Kwavija hana vibohola wali hivo songela viwavumbuke, na hana vibohola watendigwe na wanhu, na wayagwe woleka kusola sama ya Undewa wa Kuulanga. Munhu yodaha kugabokela gano, yagabokele.”
Abaho, wana wadodo wagaligwa ha Yesu giladi yawekile makono na kuwatambikila, ila wanahina wawakomhokela waja wawagalile.
Yesu kalonga, “Walekeni wana wadodo weze kumwangu, sambimuwagomese, kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga uli wa wanhu wali kamba wano.”
Avo, kawekila makono gake kuwamoteza, abaho, kachola.
Baho mmhale imwe kamcholela Yesu kamuuza, “Mkulufunzi, nitende kinhu chaki kinogile giladi ningile muugima wa digunge?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Habali uniuza mbuli ya kinhu kinogile? Hana imwe yeiyeka iyo yanogile. Uhalonda kwingila muugima wa digunge, zigoge ndagizi za Mulungu.”
Ija immhale kauza, “Ndagizi zaki?” Yesu kamwidika, “Sambiukome, sambiutende ugoni, sambiwibe, sambiulave usindila wa uvwizi,
wahishimile tataako na mamaako, na mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe kamba vuukinogela mwenyego.”
Ija immhale kedika, kamulongela, “Gano gose nigagoga, nisigaza kinhu chaki?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Uhalonda sambiuhungule hanhu, genda kaguze vinhu vako, abaho, zihela uwagwelele wakumbulu, avo kowa na ngama kuulanga, abaho, izo unikoleleze.”
Ija immhale viyahulike vino, kachola kuno yokona giogio, kwavija kakala mgoli.
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Nowalongela ikweli, yowa vidala mgoli kwingila muna Undewa wa Kuulanga.
Nowalongela mwanza uyagwe, vibuha ngamia kubita mkizonzo cha shindano, kubanza mgoli kwingila Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Wanahina viwahulike vino, wakanganya ng'hani na kuuza, “Avo, yalihi yodaha kukomboligwa?”
Yesu kawalola kalonga, “Mwa wanhu mbuli ino haidahika, ila ha Mulungu mbuli zose zodahika.”
Abaho, Petulo kedika, kalonga, “Tweye tuleka kila kinhu tukukoleleza gweye, avo, kwiza topata choni?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, mweye mose mung'holeleze nie, muna uulumwengu wa sambi, Mwana wa Munhu vondayakale mkigoda chake cha undewa kili na yenzi, vivija na mweye mokala m'vigoda va undewa longo dimwe na vibili, muitagusa mitala longo dimwe na mibili ya Islaeli.
Na munhu yoyose yoleka ng'anda ama ndugu ama lumbu ama tata ama mama ama wana ama migunda sama yangu, kobokela mianza mia na kuuhala ugima wa digunge.
Ila wanhu bwando wali wa haichanduso, wowa wa haikimambukizo, na wanhu bwando wali wa haikimambukizo, wowa wa haichanduso.
“Kwavija Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na munhu yalawile ulukwili kuchola kuzahila wanhu wa kusang'hanika mumgunda wake wa mizabibu.
Waitogolela yawalihe dinali mdizua dimwe, abaho, kawatuma kusang'hanika mumgunda wake wa mizabibu.
Mkipigiti cha saa ndatu kachola kabili, kawona wanhu wayagwe wemile hadisoko walibule sang'hano ya kutenda,
avo kawalongela, ‘Na mweye gendeni mkasang'hanike mumgunda wa mizabibu, nowaliha kilondigwa kulihigwa.’
Avo wachola. Mkipigiti cha saa sita na saa tisa kachola kabili, katenda vivija.
Na mkipigiti cha saa longo dimwe na imwe, kachola na kuwavika wanhu wayagwe wema, avo kawauza, ‘Habali mwimile hano songela imitondo bila kutenda sang'hano yoyose?’
Waja wanhu wamulongela, ‘Kwavija haduhu munhu yatugwelele sang'hano ya kutenda.’ Ija imunhu kawalongela, ‘Gendeni na mweye mkasang'hanike mumgunda wa mizabibu.’
“Viivikile ichungulo, mwene mgunda kamulongela salange wake, ‘Wakeme wasang'hana, abaho, walihe maliho gao, songa na waja wasongile kusang'hanika ichungulo, abaho, umambukizile na waja wasongile kusang'hanika imitondo.’
Na waja wose wasongile kusang'hanika ichungulo, kila munhu kalihigwa dinali.
Viwezile waja wasongile kusang'hanika imitondo, wagiza kamba wolihigwa dinali bwando, ila vivija na hewo walihigwa dinali imwe kila munhu.
Wabokela dinali zao, abaho, wasonga kumtwanganikila mwene mgunda,
walonga, ‘Wanhu wano wa ikimambukizo wasang'hanika saa dimwe diiyeka, ila kuwaliha kamba vuutulihile tweye tusang'hanike mdizua kali na kugaya misi yose!’
“Mwene mgunda kamwidika munhu imwe mmwanza wao, kalonga, ‘Mbwiga, sikutendele kinhu chochose kihile! Hatuitogolele kusang'hanika mdizua dimwe kwa dinali imwe?
Sola maliho gako uchole. Nisagula kumgwelela ino waikimambukizo kamba vinikugwelele gweye.
Vino sidaha kutenda vija vinilonda na hela zangu mwenyego? Ama kokona migongo kwavija vinili na moyo unogile?’
“Avo, wali wa haikimambukizo wowa wa haichanduso, na wali wa haichanduso wowa wa haikimambukizo.”
Yesu viyakalile yochola Yelusalemu, mnzila kawasola wanahina longo dimwe na wabili hamgwazo weiyeka, na kuwalongela,
“Tochola Yelusalemu, na Mwana wa Munhu kogeligwa mmakono ga wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Womtagusa kudanganhika,
abaho, kogeligwa mmakono ga Wamhazi, womtendela uponela, womulanha mbalati, na womuwamba mumsalaba, ila mdizua da ikadatu kozuka.”
Abaho, mama wa wana wa Zebedayo kamcholela Yesu hamoja na wanage, kamfugamila mavindi giladi yapule kinhu.
Yesu kamulongela, “Kolonda choni?” Ija imtwanzi kamwidika yolonga, “Lagiza kamba wanangu wano wabili, imwe yakale mkono wako wa ukulume na iyagwe yakale mkono wako wa ukumoso muna Undewa wako.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hammanyile kinhu chumpula. Modaha kuking'wela kikasi cha mgayo kinilondigwa kuking'wela nie?” Wamwidika walonga, “Todaha.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Moking'wela kikasi cha migayo kining'wela nie, ila kukala kumkono wangu wa ukulume na wa ukumoso sio sang'hano yangu. Ila hanhu aho wekiligwa waja wose watandiligwe na Tataangu.”
Wanahina wayagwe longo dimwe viwahulike vino, wawonela lusango Yakobo na Yohana.
Ila Yesu kawakema hamoja kawalongela, “Movitanga kamba wandewa wa Wamhazi wowatawala na mhiko, na wakulu zao wana udaho mwa wanhu zao.
Sambiiwe vino kumwenu. Ila munhu yoyose mmwanza wenu yahalonda kuwa mkulu, kolondigwa yawe mtumigwa wenu.
Na munhu yoyose mmwanza wenu yahalonda kuwa waichanduso, kolondigwa yawe nyakadala wenu.
Kwavija Mwana wa Munhu hezile kusang'hanikilwa, ila kusang'hanikila wayagwe, na kulava ugima wake giladi yawakombole wanhu bwando.”
Yesu na wanahina zake viwasegele Yeliko, wanhu bwando wamkweleleza.
Haja kukala na vimbugumbugu wabili wakalile hamgwazo wa inzila, na viwahulike kamba Yesu kobita, wenula dizwi, walonga, “Mndewa, Mwana wa Daudi, tonele bazi!”
Didale da wanhu diwakomhokela na kuwalongela wanyamale. Ila wagendelela kwinula dizwi, wolonga, “Mndewa, Mwana wa Daudi, tonele bazi!”
Yesu kema, abaho, kawakema kawauza, “Molonda niwatendele choni?”
Wamulongela, “Mndewa, tolonda tulole!”
Yesu kawonela bazi, kagakwasa meso gao. Bahaja wadaha kulola, abaho, wamkweleleza.
Yesu na wanahina zake viwakalile behi na kuvika Yelusalemu, wavika mkiwambo cha Betifage hana Ikigongo cha Mizaituni, Yesu kawatuma wanahina zake wabili,
kawalongela, “Gendeni hana ikiwambo kili haulongozi wenu, baho mom'vika mhunda yafungigwe hamoja na mwanage. Wafunguleni, abaho, munigalile.
Na kamba munhu yoyose yahawauza, mulongeleni kamba, ‘Mndewa kowalonda.’ Na himahima kowagwelela.”
Gano galawilila giladi gavikile gaja galongigwe na muhokozi, yolonga,
“Mulongele mndele wa Sayuni, ‘Lola, Mndewa wako kokwizila! Kahola moyo na kapapigwa na mhunda, mwana wa mhunda.’ ”
Avo, wanahina wachola na watenda kamba Yesu viyawalongele.
Wamgala imhunda na mwana wa mhunda, watandika vivalo vao uchana yao, abaho, Yesu kakala uchana ya imwana mhunda.
Dale kulu ng'hani da wanhu janzanza vivalo vao mnzila, na wayagwe wakanha mikuti ya mitende na kuyanzanza mnzila.
Dale da wanhu dikalile dimulongole na wose wakalile wamsondolele wenula dizwi walonga, “Yatogolwe Mwana wa Daudi! Kamota ayo yokwiza mditwaga da Mndewa! Nhogolwa uchana kuulanga!”
Yesu viyengile Yelusalemu, wambo jose dikala mumzahimzahi, na wanhu wauza, “Ino iyo munhu yalihi?”
Didale da wanhu diwalongela, “Ino iyo Yesu, muhokozi kulawa Nazaleti mkiwambo cha Galilaya.”
Yesu kengila mdikonhi da Ing'anda ya Mulungu na kuwawinga wanhu wose wakalile muja woguza na kugula. Kazihindula meza za wavunja hela na vigoda va wose wakalile woguza njiwa,
kawalongela, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Ng'anda yangu yokemigwa ng'anda ya nhambiko.’ Ila mweye moitenda fisilo da wabavi!”
Vimbugumbugu na walemale wamcholela kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, na heyo kawahonya.
Ila wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa viwonile vinhu va mkanganyo viyatendile, na wana wotoa nyangi kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu wolonga, “Yatogolwe Mwana wa Daudi!” wona lusango.
Wamulongela, “Kowahulika wano vowolonga?” Yesu kawalongela, “Ona! Hamsomile gaja gandikigwe Mzinyandko Zing'alile, golonga, ‘Wana wadodo na ving'hele, wokwimba nyila za nhogolwa’?”
Kawaleka, kachola hanze ya idiwambo mbaka Betania, kawasa hiko.
Imitondo ng'hani Yesu viyakalile mnzila yobwela mdiwambo, kona nzala.
Kawona mtini hamgwazo wa inzila, kaukwenhukila, ila honile chochose uchana yake ila mijani iiyeka. Abaho, kaulongela, “Sambiulele mujo milao yose!” Bahaja umtini unyala.
Wanahina viwawene vino wakanganya, wauza, “Habali umtini unyala himahima?”
Yesu kawedika, yolonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, kamba muhawa na nhamanila bila kusinha mmioyo yenu, sio kamba modaha kutenda kija kitendigwe mumtini uno, ila vivija modaha kukilongela kigongo kino, ‘Goboka, uiyase m'bahali,’ na yotendeka.
Kamba muhawa na nhamanila, chochose chondampule mkutambika, mogweleligwa.”
Yesu viyengile muna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu wamcholela kipigiti viyakalile yofundiza, wamuuza, “Kotenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi? Na yalihi yakugwelele udaho uno?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vivija na nie nowauza mbuli, na kamba muhanilongela nhegulo yake, na nie nowalongela kamba notenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi.
Mbatiza ya Yohana ilawa kwahi? Ilawa ha Mulungu ama ilawa ha wanhu?” Wakiiuza wenyego kwa wenyego, walonga, “Tuhalonga, ‘Ulawa ha Mulungu,’ kotuuza, ‘Habali hamumtogole?’
Ila tuhalonga, ‘Ulawa ha wanhu,’ towadumba wanhu kwavija wanhu wose wotogola kamba Yohana kakala muhokozi.”
Avo wamwidika Yesu, “Hatuvitanga.” Abaho, na heyo kawalongela, “Na nie siwalongela kamba notenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi.
“Mweye mokonaze? Kukala na munhu imwe yakalile na wana wabili. Kamcholela ija imkulu kamulongela, ‘Mwanangu, lelo genda ukasang'hanike mumgunda wa mizabibu.’
Ija imwana kamwidika kamulongela, ‘Sichola,’ ila mkipigiti kidodo kagelegeza mmoyo wake, abaho, kachola.
Abaho, kamcholela imdodo kamulongela vivija. Na heyo kamwidika kalonga, ‘Ona, nochola, tata,’ ila hacholile.
Yalihi mmwanza wa wano wabili yatendile gamnogele tataake?” Wamwidika wamulongela, “Ija imkulu.” Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, wawila kodi na watenda ugoni ndwanga wowalongola kwingila muna Undewa wa Mulungu.
Kwavija Yohana M'batiza keza kumwenu mnzila ilibule uzenzeleganye, na mweye hamumtogole, ila wawila kodi na watenda ugoni ndwanga wamtogola. Na hata vimgawene gano, hamulekile vilozo venu na kumtogola.
“Tegelezeni hala diyagwe, kukala na munhu yakalile na mgunda wa mizabibu, kauzengela konhi na kuhimba lwingila lwa kukamulila zabibu na kuzenga ulingo. Abaho, kawapangiza walimi, kachola isi ya kutali.
Kipigiti cha kuhuna zizabibu vikivikile, kawatuma nyakadala zake ha iwalimi wakamsolele fungu jake da izizabibu.
Iwalimi wawanwang'hula waja iwanyakadala, imwe wamtoa, iyagwe wamkoma, na iyagwe wamtoa na mabwe mbaka kadanganhika.
Abaho, ija imunhu kawatuma mwanza uyagwe nyakadala wayagwe bwando kubanza waja wa ichanduso, na iwalimi wawatendela vivija kamba viwawatendele waja wa ichanduso.
Hakimambukizo, kamulagiza mwanage ha iwalimi, yolonga, ‘Kwa vovose womuhishimila mwanangu.’
Ila iwalimi viwamuwene imwana, wailongela wenyego kwa wenyego, ‘Ino iyo muhazi. Izoni tumkome, abaho, tusole uhazi wake!’
Avo wamsola na kumwasa hanze ya umgunda wa mizabibu na kumkoma.
“Avo mwene mgunda yeheza, kowatenda choni iwalimi?”
Wamulongela, “Kowakoma wanhu waja wehile, na kuwagwelela umgunda walimi wayagwe wondawamgwelele zabibu mkipigiti cha kuhuna.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hamsomile Zinyandiko Zing'alile? ‘Dibwe dilemigwe na wazenzi digaluka dibwe da kutamanilwa ng'hani kubanza mabwe gose. Mndewa iyo yatendile mbuli ino, nayo iwa mkanganyo mmeso getu!’
“Avo nowalongela, Undewa wa Mulungu wosegezigwa kumwenu na kugweleligwa wanhu wayagwe wondawatende gamnogele Mulungu.
Munhu yodilagalila dibwe dino kobeneka vidangavidanga, na munhu yoyose yondadimulagalile domsiginha lipilipi.”
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na Mafalisayo viwahulike hala da Yesu, wavitanga kamba kowalonga hewo,
avo wazahila nzila ya kumgoga. Ila wadumba didale da wanhu kwavija wakala womtogola Yesu kamba muhokozi.
Yesu kawalongela mmahala mwanza uyagwe, yolonga,
“Undewa wa Kuulanga ulinga na mndewa yatandile lusona lwa zengele lwa mwanage.
Kawatuma nyakadala zake wakawakeme waja wagonekigwe mulusona lwa zengele, ila walema kwiza.
Abaho, kawatuma nyakadala wayagwe, kawalongela, ‘Walongeleni wanhu wose wagonekigwe kamba nitanda mandia gangu. Ng'ombe zangu iwakulu na iwadodo wanonile wesha kuchinjigwa, na kila kinhu kisasaligwa. Izoni hana ulusona lwa zengele!’
Ila hawasinhuke. Wachola na zao, imwe kachola kumgunda, na iyagwe kachola kuuchuluzi wake.
Wayagwe wawagoga nyakadala zake, wawaliga na kuwakoma.
Ija imndewa kona lusango, avo kawatuma asikali zake wawabanange waja wakomaji na kudisoma wambo jao.
Abaho, kawalongela nyakadala zake, ‘Lusona lwa zengele lusasaligwa, ila wanhu wagonekigwe hawalumbile kuvika.
Avo gendeni mzinzilamhanda za mkiwambo mkawagoneke wanhu wondamuwawene weze kulusona lwa zengele.’
Avo waja iwanyakadala wachola muna zinzila za mkiwambo na kuwalundiza wanhu wose wawavikile, wanogile na wehile, na dibugano da lusona lwa zengele dimema wahenza.
“Ila ija imndewa viyengile kuwalola iwahenza, kamona munhu haja yalekile kuvala vivalo va lusona lwa zengele.
Kamuuza, ‘Mbwiga, kwingilaze hano bila vivalo va lusona lwa zengele?’ Ija imunhu kanyamala.
Abaho, imndewa kawalongela watumigwa, ‘Mfungeni makono na magulu, abaho, mmwase kunze mdiziza. Ako kowa na kililo na kugegedula meno.’
“Kwavija wanhu bwando wagonekigwe, ila wasaguligwe wadodo.”
Mafalisayo waiting'hana hamoja na kumwikila zundo Yesu giladi wamnamate mzimbuli zake.
Avo, wawatuma wanahina zao hamoja na wanhu wa Helode, wolonga, “Mkulufunzi! Tuvitanga kamba gweye kwa munhu ulibule uzenzeleganye na kowafundiza wanhu ikweli ya gaja goyolonda Mulungu, bila kudumba gowogelegeza wanhu wayagwe, kwavija hulola ukulu wa munhu yoyose.
Tulongele, gweye kogesaze? Malagizo ga Musa gotogoza kuliha kodi ha Kaisali ama gogomesa?”
Ila Yesu kazitanga ngelegeza zao zihile, kalonga, “Videlenya mweye! Habali mgeza kunikila vitega?
Nilagusileni ihela ya kuliha kodi!” Na hewo wamgalila ihela,
abaho, kawauza, “Kihanga kino na twaga dino va munhu yalihi?”
Wamwidika, “Va Kaisali.” Avo Yesu kawalongela, “Mulonga goya, avo ga Kaisali mgweleleni Kaisali, na ga Mulungu mgweleleni Mulungu.”
Viwahulike vino, wakanganya, avo wamuleka, wachola na zao.
Zua didija Masadukayo, awo wolonga kamba haduhu mzuso, wamcholela Yesu, wamuuza,
“Mkulufunzi! Musa katulongela kamba, kamba munhu yahadanganhika bila kuleka mwana, ndugu yake kolondigwa yamsole ija ikizuka giladi yamulelele mwana ndugu yake yadanganhike.
Avo kukala na ndugu saba mmwanza wetu, waichanduso kasola mtwanzi, abaho, kadanganhika bila kulela nayo mwana, abaho, ikizuka kamulekela ndugu yake.
Na ija waikabili gamulawilila gagaja, na waikadatu, na waja wose saba.
Hakimambukizo, na ija imtwanzi kadanganhika.
Avo mdizua da mzuso, imtwanzi ija kowa mtwanzi wa munhu yalihi? Kwavija wanhu wose saba wakala wamsolile.”
Yesu kawedika kawalongela, “Mweye muhonyela! Kwavija hamzitangile Zinyandiko Zing'alile ama mhiko za Mulungu.
Kwavija mdizua da mzuso, wanhu hawasola ama kusoligwa, ila wolinga kamba wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga.
Mmbuli ya mzuso wa wanhu wadanganhike, hamsomile Mzinyandiko Zing'alile kija kimulongeligwe na Mulungu?
‘Nie iyo Mulungu wa Ablaham, na Isaka, na Yakobo.’ Heyo iyo Mulungu wa wanhu wagima na sio Mulungu wa wanhu wadanganhike.”
Didale da wanhu vidihulike gano, wakanganya mafundo gake.
Ila Mafalisayo viwahulike kamba Yesu kawavudaliza Masadukayo, waiting'hana hamoja.
Na munhu imwe mmwanza wao, yakalile mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa, kamgeza mkumuuza,
“Mkulufunzi, ndagizi ilihi ili ng'hulu Mmalagizo ga Musa?”
Yesu kamwidika kamulongela, “ ‘Mnogele Mndewa Mulungu wako na moyo wako wose, na loho yako yose, na nzonzi zako zose.’
Ino iyo ndagizi ili ng'hulu na iyo ya ichanduso.
Na ino iyo ndagizi ya ikabili, ‘Mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe kamba vuukiinogela mwenyego.’
Malagizo gose ga Musa na mafundo ga wahokozi gotamanila ndagizi zino mbili.”
Mafalisayo viwaiting'hane hamoja, Yesu kawauza,
“Mweye moigelegezaze mbuli ya Kilisto? Iyo mwana wa munhu yalihi?” Wamwidika wamulongela, “Iyo Mwana wa Daudi.”
Yesu kawauza, “Avo, vilihi Daudi kubitila mhiko za Loho wa Mulungu komkema Kilisto, ‘Mndewa’?
Kwavija kalonga, ‘Mndewa kamulongela Mndewa wangu, “Kala kumkono wangu wa ukulume mbaka vondaniweke wadumuka zako hasi ya magulu gako.” ’
Ihawa Daudi komkema Kilisto, ‘Mndewa,’ yodahikaze kuwa mwanage?”
Haduhu munhu yadahile kumwidika mbuli yoyose, na kulawa zua dija haduhu munhu yagezile kumuuza mbuli yoyose.
Abaho, Yesu kalonga na didale da wanhu na wanahina zake,
“Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wana udaho wa kugatapita Malagizo ga Musa.
Avo, gatendeni na kugagoga gaja gose gowowafundiza mweye, ila sambimtende vija vowotenda hewo, kwavija hewo hawagatenda gaja gowofundiza.
Wowafungila wanhu mibahasha mikulu na kuwadikwa mmaega, ila hewo wenyego hawalonda hata kugolosa kidole waipape.
Wotenda mbuli zao zose giladi woneke na wanhu. Avo, wofudika mifundo mikulu mgati yandikigwe Nyandiko za Malagizo ga Musa uchana mwa ikihanga na mmakono! Na wokwika minyemvule mitali ng'hani mmikanzu yao!
Wonogelwa kukala m'vigoda va haulongozi mulusona na kukala m'vigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za nhambiko,
na kulamsigwa na hishima mmasoko na kukemigwa, ‘Mkulufunzi.’
Ila mweye sambimkemigwe ‘Mkulufunzi,’ kwavija muna mkulufunzi imwe, na mweye mose mwa kinhu kimwe kamba ndugu.
Na sambimumkeme munhu yoyose ‘tata’ muisi, kwavija Tataenu iyo imwe yali kuulanga.
Ama sambimkemigwe ‘Vilangizi,’ kwavija muna kilangizi imwe, iyo Kilisto.
Yali mkulu mmwanza wenu yawe mtumigwa wenu.
Ila yoyose yokiinula kohumuluswa, na yoyose yokiihumulusa kokwinuligwa.
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, mweye videlenya! Moluhinda lwivi lwa Undewa wa Kuulanga haulongozi wa wanhu, na mweye wenyego hamwingila ama hamuwatogoza kwingila waja wolonda kwingila!
Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, mweye videlenya! Mowabulunya vizuka na kutenda nhambiko nhali za uzenzeleganye. Avo nhaguso yenu yowa ng'hulu ng'hani!
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, videlenya! Mofunga mwanza kuchola muisi inyalile na m'bahali giladi kumzahila munhu imwe yawinze nhamanila yenu. Na muhampata, momtenda yawe mwana wa kuzimu mianza mibili kubanza mweye wenyego.
“Mojona, vilangizi vimbugumbugu! Mweye mulonga, ‘Ihawa munhu yahaiduilila Ng'anda ya Mulungu, jaga bule. Ila munhu yahaiduilila zahabu ya muna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kakiifunga na ikiduilo chake.’
Mweye vimbugumbugu wabozi! Kilihi kili kikulu, izahabu ama Ing'anda ya Mulungu iitenda izahabu ing'ale?
Vivija mulonga, ‘Ihawa munhu yahaiduilila kilingo cha kulavila nhosa, jaga bule. Ila munhu yahaiduilila nhunza ili hachana ya ikilingo hicho, kakiifunga na ikiduilo chake.’
Mweye vimbugumbugu! Kilihi kili kikulu, inhunza ama ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa kiitenda inhunza ing'ale?
Avo, heyo yoiduilila ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa, kaiduilila ikilingo hicho hamoja na kila kinhu kili hachana yake.
Na heyo yoiduilila Ng'anda ya Mulungu, kaiduilila Ing'anda hiyo hamoja na Mulungu yokala himo.
Na heyo yoiduilila ulanga, kakiiduilila kigoda cha undewa cha Mulungu hamoja na ija yakikalile.
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, videlenya! Kwavija molava zaka za vinhu va kulungila mandia na mboga kamba vija matepo ga kunung'hila, binzali, na jila. Ila muleka mafundo makulu ga Malagizo ga Musa, kamba vija bazi, nhamanila, na kuwa bule uzenzeleganye. Gano gago mulondigwa kutenda, na bila kuleka gaja gayagwe.
Mweye vilangizi vimbugumbugu! Molenguza nzuguni, ila momeza ngamia!
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, videlenya! Mweye mwa kamba munhu yosuluza hanze ya kikasi na sahani, ila mgati vimema vinhu m'vipatile muubavi na ugila.
Gweye Mfalisayo kimbugumbugu! Tanhu suluza mgati mwa ikikasi, abaho, vivija na hanze chong'ala!
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, videlenya! Kwavija mulinga na mapanga gabakazigwe chokaa, hanze gokoneka mazelu ila mgati gamema mizege na vinhu vose vihile.
Vivo na mweye, kunze mokoneka na wanhu kamba mnoga, ila mgati mmema udelenya na mbuli zihile.
“Mojona, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, videlenya! Mozenga mapanga ga wahokozi na kugahamba mapanga ga wanhu wanogile.
Abaho, molonga, ‘Kamba tuhawile baho mkipigiti hicho cha wahenga zetu, sambituilumbe nao mkuwakoma wahokozi.’
Avo, mweye wenyego mosindila kamba mweye mwa lukolo lwa wanhu waja wawakomile wahokozi!
Avo, mambukizileni gaja gawasongile wahenga zenu!
Mweye nyoka, wana wa nyoka! Moikimbila vilihi nhaguso ya kuzimu?
Avo, nowalagizila wahokozi, wanhu wali na nzewele, na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Ila wayagwe mowakoma na kuwawamba mumsalaba, na wayagwe mowalanha mbalati mzing'anda zenu za nhambiko na kuwawinga kulawa kiwambo kimwe mbaka kiwambo kiyagwe.
Nhaguso ya mulopa wa wanhu wose watendile ganogile muisi iwapate mweye, kulawa mulopa wa Abeli mbaka mulopa wa Zakalia, mwanage Balakia, mumkomile hagatigati ya Ing'anda ya Mulungu na ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa.
Nowalongela ikweli, nhaguso ya wakomaji wano wose yowapata wanhu wa mulelo uno!
“Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu! Gweye uwakoma wahokozi na kuwatoa na mabwe waja watumigwe kumwako! Mianza mingahi nilonda kuwakunzanya hamoja wanago kamba nguku viyowafagatila wanage hasi ya mbawa zake, ila hutogole!
Na ng'anda yako yolekigwa na yowa ukiwa.
Nokulongela, hunyona nie kabili mbaka vondaulonge, ‘Kamota ayo yokwiza mditwaga da Mndewa.’ ”
Yesu kalawa Kung'anda ya Mulungu, na viyakalile yochola wanahina zake wamcholela giladi wamulagusile ng'anda zizunguluke Ing'anda ya Mulungu.
Yesu kalonga, “Mozona ng'anda zino zose? Nowalongela ikweli, haduhu hata dibwe dimwe dondadisigale uchana ya diyagwe, dondadileke kubomoligwa.”
Yesu viyakalile yakalile Hakigongo cha Mizaituni, wanahina wamcholela weiyeka, wamulongela, “Tulongele, zua jaki vondagalawilile gano, na choni chondakiwe kilaguso cha wizilo wako na idizua da kimambukizo?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Teganyeni, munhu sambiyawagize.
Kwavija wanhu bwando wokwiza mtwaga jangu, wolonga, ‘Nie iyo Kilisto!’ Na wowagiza wanhu bwando.
Mohulika ng'hondo na singilimo za ng'hondo, ila sambimdumbe. Kwavija vinhu kamba vino volondigwa vilawilile, ila ikimambukizo hakinavika.
Isi yogomba na isi iyagwe, na undewa wouvamhila undewa uyagwe. Yolawila nzala na mgudemo wa isi kila hanhu.
Gano gose gowa kamba mwanduso wa usungu wa kulela mwana.
“Abaho, mogogigwa giladi mgazigwe na kukomigwa. Na wanhu wose wa isi zose wowehila sama yangu nie.
Kipigiti kija wanhu bwando woileka nhamanila yao, na kukiihonza na kukiihila wenyego kwa wenyego.
Abaho, wahokozi bwando wa uvwizi wolawilila, na kuwagiza wanhu bwando.
Sama ya kongezeka mbuli zihile, noge da wanhu bwando dohuha.
Ila yondayananahile mbaka hakimambukizo, iyo yondayakomboligwe.
Na Usenga uno Unogile wa Undewa wa Mulungu wopetigwa kila hanhu muulumwengu wose giladi uwe usindila ha wanhu wa isi zose, abaho, ikimambukizo cha isi leka kize.”
Munhu yondayasome yaitange nhegulo yake! Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Muhachona ‘Kinhu Kinyolodoke Kigala Ubananzi’ kilongigwe na muhokozi Danieli kima Hanhu Hang'alile Ng'hani Muing'anda ya Mulungu,
avo, awo wali Yudea wakimbilile m'vigongo.
Munhu yoyose yali mkiswili cha ng'anda yake sambiyahumuluke hasi na kusola kinhu chochose kulawa mng'anda yake.
Munhu yoyose yali kumgunda sambiyabwele kusola kivalo chake.
Wojona watwanzi wali na inda na watwanzi wali na ving'hele mmazua higo!
Tambikeni giladi ng'himbila yenu sambiiwe mkipigiti cha kihuhe ama mkipigiti cha Zua da Mhumulo!
Kwavija wowa mgayo mkulu, haunapata kulawilila songela kulumbigwa kwa ulumwengu mbaka sambi, na haulawila kabili mgayo kamba hiwo.
Na kamba kipigiti kija sambikihunguzwe na Mulungu, haduhu munhu yahadahile kukombolwa, ila sama ya wanhu wasaguligwe na Mulungu, kipigiti hicho kihunguzwa.
“Abaho, kamba munhu yoyose yahawalongela, ‘Lola! Kilisto kahano,’ ama ‘Kahaja!’ Sambimtogole.
Kwavija makilisto wa uvwizi na wahokozi wa uvwizi wolawila, wotenda vilaguso na mizonza mikulu giladi kamba vihadahika wawagize hata wanhu wasaguligwe na Mulungu.
Tegelezeni! Niwalongela nisha mbuli zino kipigiti king'hali hakinavika.
“Avo kamba wanhu wahawalongela, ‘Kamkiwala!’ Sambimchole, ama wahalonga, ‘Kakugati!’ Sambimtogole.
Kwavija kamba lumwemwe vulumwemwesa kulawa haulawilo wa zua na koneka mbaka kuuswelo wa zua, na Mwana wa Munhu vivo vondayoneke kipigiti vondayeze.
“Hohose hali na mtufi baho hondawaiting'hane vimhungu.
“Bahaja ikipigiti cha mazua ga mgayo vondakimale, zua doziziwala, mulenge haulava mulangaza wake, nhondo zolagala kulawa kuulanga, na mhiko za kuulanga zokwekwesigwa kulawa hazikalile.
Abaho, kilaguso cha Mwana wa Munhu chokoneka kuulanga, na wanhu wa isi zose wolila ahaja vondawanyone nie Mwana wa Munhu nikwiza muna gamawingu ga kuulanga na mhiko na yenzi ng'hulu.
Kowalagiza wasenga zake wa kuulanga wali na mhalati ilava dizwi kulu, na wowakunzanya wanhu zake wasaguligwe na Mulungu kulawa ng'ambu zose za ulumwengu.
“Muifundize mum'biki wa mtini. Matambi gake gahasonga udeke wa kuzuka na kulava matepo, movitanga kamba vuli da mmabehi.
Vivija na mweye, muhazona mbuli zino zose, m'vitange kamba ka mmabehi kwiza.
Nowalongela ikweli, wanhu wa mulelo uno hawadanganhika mbaka mbuli zino zose zilawilile.
Ulanga na isi vose vobita, ila mbuli zangu hazibita.
“Haduhu munhu yoditanga zua ama saa, si wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga, ama Mwana, ila Tata yeiyeka.
Kwiza kwa Mwana wa Munhu kowa kamba mkipigiti cha Nuhu.
Kwavija mmemelo wa mazi vuukalile haunalawila, wanhu wakala woja na kung'wa, wasola na kusoligwa, mbaka zua dija Nuhu viyengile muisafina,
hawakitangile kija kilondile kulawilila, mbaka mmemelo wa mazi vuwizile na kuwakoma wanhu wose. Na vino vivo vondayeze Mwana wa Munhu.
Mkipigiti hicho, wambigalo wabili wolima mumgunda, imwe kosoligwa na iyagwe kolekigwa.
Watwanzi wabili wotwanga, imwe kosoligwa na iyagwe kolekigwa.
“Avo goneleleni, kwavija hamuditanga zua dondayeze Mndewa wenu.
Ila m'vitange kamba, kamba mwene ng'anda yahakitangile kipigiti chondayeze m'bavi, yahagonelele na sambiyaileke ng'anda yake ibomoligwe.
Avo, na mweye muisasale, kwavija Mwana wa Munhu kokwiza mkipigiti hamkitangile.
“Yalihi mtumigwa mwende na m'bala, mndewa wake yamtendile salange wa watumigwa wali mng'anda yake yondayawagwelele mandia gao mkipigiti kilondigwa?
Kamota mtumigwa ija mndewa wake yahabwela yom'vika yotenda vino!
Nowalongela ikweli, komtenda yawe mkulu wa vinhu vake vose.
Ila kamba ija imtumigwa yehile koilongela mwenyego, ‘Mndewa wangu kokawa kubwela,’
na kusonga kuwatoa watumigwa wayage na kuja na kung'wa na wang'wa ugimbi.
Abaho, mndewa wa imtumigwa ija kokwiza mdizua yalekile kudigelegeza na saa yalekile kuitanga.
Abaho, komkanha vidangavidanga imtumigwa ija na kumwika mdidale dimwe na videlenya. Ako kowa na kililo na kugegedula meno.
“Kipigiti kija Undewa wa Kuulanga wolinga na wandele longo dimwe wasolile viwenge vao na kuchola kum'bokela mulawilamhambe.
Wandele watano wakala wabozi na watano wakala wabala.
Waja iwabozi wasola viwenge vao, bila kugela mavuta mgati yake.
Ila waja iwabala wasola viwenge vao hamoja na via va mavuta.
Kwavija mulawilamhambe kakawa kwiza, wose wakukila na kuwasa.
“Kilo kikulu kukala na nyangi, ‘Mulawilamhambe kavika! Laweni mkam'bokele!’
Abaho, waja iwandele wose walamuka na kuvigongomanya viwenge vao.
Abaho, waja iwabozi wawalongela waja iwabala, ‘Tugweleleni mavuta genu, kwavija viwenge vetu vofa.’
Waja iwabala wawalongela, ‘Hagatutosha tweye na mweye. Ila gendeni ha wachuluzi mkagule.’
Viwakalile mnzila wochola kugula mavuta, mulawilamhambe kavika. Na waja watano wakalile waisasale wengila hamoja nayo mulusona lwa zengele, abaho, lwivi luhindigwa.
“Kipigiti waja iwandele wabozi viwezile, wakemelela, walonga, ‘Mndewa, Mndewa! Tuvugulile!’
Mulawilamhambe kawalongela, ‘Nowalongela ikweli! Siwatanga mweye.’
“Avo, goneleleni, kwavija hamditanga zua ama saa yondanibweleganye.
“Kipigiti kija Undewa wa Kuulanga wolinga na munhu yochola mwanza, kawakema watumigwa zake na kuwatenda wemilizi wa vinhu vake.
Kila munhu kagweleligwa kulingana na vija viyadahile, imwe kagweleligwa talanta tano na iyagwe talanta mbili na iyagwe talanta imwe. Abaho, ija imunhu kachola mwanza wake.
Ija imtumigwa yagweleligwe talanta tano, baho kachola kuzitendela uchuluzi talanta zake, na kapata talanta tano ziyagwe.
Vivija na ija yagweleligwe talanta mbili, kapata talanta mbili ziyagwe.
Ila ija imtumigwa yagweleligwe talanta imwe, kachola kuhimba lwingila, abaho, kaifisa italanta ya mndewa wake.
“Vikibitile kipigiti kitali, ija imndewa wa waja iwatumigwa kabwela na kutenda mheta ya talanta zao.
Ija imtumigwa yagweleligwe talanta tano, kagala talanta tano ziyagwe, kalonga, ‘Mndewa, kunigwela talanta tano, hano hana talanta tano ziyagwe zinipatile!’
Mndewa wake kamulongela, ‘Kutenda goya mtumigwa unogile na ulibule uzenzeleganye! Na kwavija hutendile uzenzeleganye m'vinhu vidodo, avo nokutenda uwe mwimilizi wa vinhu bwando. Izo udeng'he hamoja na nie, mndewa wako!’
“Vivija na ija imtumigwa yagweleligwe talanta mbili keza kalonga, ‘Mndewa, kunigwelela talanta mbili, hano hana talanta mbili ziyagwe zinipatile.’
Mndewa wake kamulongela, ‘Kutenda goya mtumigwa unogile na ulibule uzenzeleganye! Na kwavija hutendile uzenzeleganye m'vinhu vidodo, avo nokutenda uwe mwimilizi wa vinhu bwando. Izo udeng'he hamoja na nie, mndewa wako!’
“Abaho, ija imtumigwa yagweleligwe talanta imwe keza kalonga, ‘Mndewa, nivitanga kamba gweye kwa munhu mdala, kohuna vija huvihandile, na kokunzanya haja haulekile kumiza mbeyu.
Avo nidumba, nichola kuifisa talanta yako hasi muisi. Avo talanta yako ino hano.’
“Mndewa wake kamulongela, ‘Gweye mtumigwa mwavu na mkoka! Kuvitanga kamba nie nohuna vija sivihandile na nokunzanya haja hanilekile kumiza?
Kulondigwa talanta yangu ukaike benki, vinibwelile nihaivikile talanta yangu na kija chongezeke.
Avo, m'bokeni italanta, abaho, mumgwelele ija imtumigwa yali na talanta longo dimwe.
Kwavija munhu yali na kinhu kokongezelwa, na kowa navo bwando. Ila munhu yalibule kinhu, hata kija ikidodo chayalinacho kobokigwa.
Ino mtumigwa mwavu, mwaseni hanze hana diziza. Ako kowa na kililo na kugegedula meno.’
“Mwana wa Munhu vondayeze muna iyenzi yake, hamoja na wasenga wose wa Mulungu wa kuulanga, kokala mkigoda chake cha undewa.
Na wanhu wa isi zose woilundiza haulongozi wake. Abaho, kowabagula kamba mchunga voyowabagula ng'hondolo na menhe.
Ng'hondolo koweka ng'ambu yake ya ukulume, na menhe ng'ambu yake ya ukumoso.
Abaho, Mndewa kowalongela waja wali ng'ambu yake ya ukulume, ‘Izoni, mweye mmotezwe na Tataangu! Muuhale Undewa mtandiligwe songela vuulumbigwe ulumwengu.
Kwavija nikala na nzala munigwelela mandia, nikala na ng'hilu muning'weza, nikala muhenza munibokela,
nikala bule vivalo munivaza, nikala mtamu mwiza kunyuguza, na nikala mkifungo mwiza kunitembelela.’
“Abaho, waja wanhu walibule uzenzeleganye womwidika, ‘Mndewa, zua jaki vitukuwene kukala na nzala tukugwelela mandia, ama kukala na ng'hilu tukung'weza?
Zua jaki vitukuwene kukala muhenza tukubokela, ama kukala kwabule vivalo tukuvaza?
Zua jaki vitukuwene kukala mtamu ama kukala mkifungo, twiza kukutembelela?’
Abaho, Mndewa kowalongela, ‘Nowalongela ikweli, kinhu chochose kimumtendele munhu imwe wa wano ndugu zangu wadodo, munitendela nie!’
“Abaho, kowalongela waja wanhu wali ng'ambu yake ya ukumoso, ‘Segeleni hamwangu, mweye mdukumizwe na Mulungu! Gendeni hana umoto wa digunge yekiligwe Mwenembago na vinyamkela zake!
Kwavija nikala na nzala hamunigwelele mandia, na nikala na ng'hilu hamuning'weze,
nikala muhenza hamunibokele, nikala bule vivalo hamunivazile, nikala mtamu na nikala mkifungo hamwizile kunitembelela.’
“Vivija na hewo womwidika, ‘Mndewa, zua jaki vitukuwene kukala na nzala, ama kukala na ng'hilu, ama kukala muhenza, ama kukala bule vivalo, ama kukala mtamu, ama kukala mkifungo, na tweye hatukutazile?’
Abaho, Mndewa kowalongela, ‘Nowalongela ikweli, vumulekile kumtendela mbuli zino imwe wa wano ndugu zangu wadodo, hamunitendele nie.’
Avo wanhu wano wokwingila muinhaguso ya digunge, ila waja walibule uzenzeleganye wokwingila muugima wa digunge.”
Yesu viyamambukize kufundiza mbuli zino zose, kawalongela wanahina zake,
“Movitanga kamba gahabita mazua mabili lowa Lusona lwa Pasaka, na Mwana wa Munhu kogogigwa giladi yawambigwe mumsalaba.”
Abaho, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu waiting'hana mding'anda da kindewa da Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko, yokemigwa Kayafa.
Weka zundo mkuzahila nzila ya uzenzeleganye ya kumgoga Yesu giladi wamkome.
Walonga, “Sambitutende mbuli ino mkipigiti cha lusona giladi sambikilawilile kiyahiyahi mwa wanhu.”
Yesu kakala Betania kung'anda ya Simoni ayo yakalile na utamu wa dikulu.
Kipigiti Yesu viyakalile yoja hana imeza, keza mtwanzi imwe, yakalile na nyhupa ya alabasta ili na mavuta ga kunung'hila ga hela bwando, kamcholela Yesu kamwitila mpala jake.
Wanahina viwawene gano, wona lusango, walonga, “Ubananzi uno wa choni?
Mavuta gano gahaguzigwe na hela bwando, abaho, zihela wahagweleligwe wakumbulu!”
Ila Yesu viyazitangile ngelegeza zao, kawalongela, “Habali mumgaza mtwanzi ino? Kanhendela kinhu kinogile ng'hani.
Wakumbulu mokala nao mazua gose, ila nie sikala na mweye mazua gose.
Viyanitile mavuta gano mulukuli lwangu, kanisasala na mazisi.
Nowalongela ikweli, hanhu hohose hondaupetigwe Usenga uno Unogile muulumwengu wose, kija chayatendile mtwanzi ino cholongwa mkumkumbukila heyo.”
Abaho, imwe wa wanahina longo dimwe na wabili, yakemigwe Yuda Isikalioti, kachola ha wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko
kawauza, “Monigwelela choni kamba nihamgela Yesu mmakono genu?” Avo wamgwelela vidanga malongo madatu va hela.
Kulawa haja Yuda kasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumgela mmakono gao.
Muna dizua da mwanduso wa Lusona lwa Mikate Ilibule Mela, wanahina wamcholela Yesu wamuuza, “Kwahi kuulonda tukakutandile mandia ga Pasaka?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Gendeni mdiwambo, mom'vika munhu, abaho, mulongeleni, ‘Mkulufunzi kolonga, “Kipigiti kiyakisagule Mulungu sama yangu nie kikwenhuka. Nie na wanahina zangu toja mandia ga Pasaka mng'anda yako.” ’ ”
Wanahina watenda kamba Yesu viyawalagize, abaho, wagatanda mandia ga Pasaka.
Viivikile ichungulo, Yesu kakala hana imeza hamoja na wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili.
Viwakalile woja, Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, imwe mmwanza wenu konihonza.”
Wanahina wona giogio, na wasonga kumuuza imweimwe, “Nie, Mndewa?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ayo yozanhika mkate mkia hamoja na nie iyo yondayanihonze.
Mwana wa Munhu kodanganhika kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzimulonga. Ila kojona munhu ija yondayamuhonze Mwana wa Munhu! Vihanogile munhu hiyo sambiyaleligwe!”
Yuda, yakalile yolonda kumuhonza, kamuuza, “Nie, Mkulufunzi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Gweye kulonga vino.”
Viwakalile woja, Yesu kasola mkate, kaumoteza, abaho, kaumogola, kawagwelela wanahina zake, kalonga, “Soleni mje, kwavija uno uwo lukuli lwangu.”
Abaho kasola kikasi, kalonga hewela, kawagwelela wanahina zake, kalonga, “Ing'weni, mose,
kwavija uno uwo mulopa wangu uli usindila wa lagano da Mulungu na wanhu zake, witike sama ya wanhu bwando giladi wageligwe kumgongo vilozo vao.
Nowalongela, sing'wa kabili mulelo uno wa zabibu mbaka zua dija vondaniung'we wa sambi hamoja na mweye Muundewa wa Tataangu.”
Viweshile kwimba, wachola hana Ikigongo cha Mizaituni.
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela, “Kilo ya lelo, mweye mose mong'himbila, kamba viyandikigwe Mnyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Nomtoa imchunga, na didale da ng'hondolo dopwililika.’
Ila nihazuka, nowalongola kuchola Galilaya.”
Petulo kalonga, “Hata kamba wose wahakukimbila, nie sikukimbila bule!”
Yesu kamulongela Petulo, “Nokulongela ikweli, kilo ya lelo, nzogolo yang'hali hanakwika, konibela mianza midatu.”
Petulo kamulongela, “Hata kamba kudanganhika, nidanganhike hamoja na gweye! Sikubela bule!” Na wanahina wose wasigale walonga vivo.
Abaho, Yesu kachola hamoja na wanahina zake hanhu hakemigwe Getisemane, kawalongela, “Kaleni hano, nie nichole haja kutambika.”
Kawasola Petulo na waja iwana wabili wa Zebedayo, kasonga kona giogio na kugazika.
Abaho, kawalongela, “Moyo wangu una giogio ng'hani behi na kudanganhika. Kaleni hano mgonelele hamoja na nie.”
Kachola hamwande kidogo, katambalala kingubanguba, katambika, yolonga, “Tataangu, vihadahika, kikasi kino cha migayo kinisegele! Ila sio kamba vinilonda nie, ila kamba vuulonda gweye.”
Abaho, kawabwelela waja iwanahina, kawavika wawasa. Kamuuza Petulo, “Mulemelwa kugonelela hamoja na nie hata saa dimwe?
Goneleleni, mtambike, giladi sambimwingile mkugezigwa. Kwavija loho yolonda, ila lukuli lutepweta.”
Yesu kachola mwanza wa ikabili, katambika, yolonga, “Tataangu, kamba havidahika kikasi kino cha migayo kinisegele ila mbaka niking'wele, gaja guulonda gatendeke.”
Viyabweleganye mwanza uyagwe, kawavika wawasa, kwavija meso gao gakala na utulo.
Avo kawaleka, kachola kutambika mwanza wa ikadatu, yolonga mbuli zizija.
Abaho, kawabwelela wanahina kawalongela, “Mng'hali wasa na kuhumula? Saa ivika ya Mwana wa Munhu kugeligwa mmakono ga wanhu wene vilozo.
Lamukeni, tuchole! Loleni, munhu yonihonza ka habehi!”
Yesu viyakalile yang'hali yolonga, Yuda, imwe wa iwanahina longo dimwe na wabili, keza. Kailongoza hamoja na dale kulu da wanhu wapapile mizele na mimbwego. Wakala watumigwe na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu.
Imunhu yomuhonza kawagwelela utango, kawalongela, “Ija yondanimnonele, iyo heyo. Mgogeni!”
Baho Yuda kamcholela Yesu, kalonga, “Nokulamsa, Mkulufunzi!” Abaho, kamnonela.
Yesu kamulongela, “Mbwiga, tenda chuuwinzile!” Abaho, waja iwanhu weza, wamgoga Yesu na kumfunga.
Imwe wa waja wakalile na Yesu kasomola zele jake na kumkanha gwiti nyakadala wa Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko.
Yesu kamulongela, “Bweza zele jako muna iyala yake, kwavija wose wotamanila zele wodanganhika na zele.
Mokwagiza kamba sidaha kumulongela Tataangu yanigalile sambisambi madale gabanza longo dimwe na mabili ga wasenga zake wa kuulanga?
Ila zovikila vilihi Nyandiko Zing'alile zilonga kamba vino vivo vilondigwa ilawilile?”
Kipigiti kikija Yesu kadilongela didale da wanhu, “Mwiza na mizele na mimbwego kunigoga kamba nie na m'bokonyi? Mazua gose nikala nifundiza kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, na mweye hamunigogile.
Ila gano gose galawilila, giladi Nyandiko Zing'alile za wahokozi zivikile.” Abaho, wanahina wose wamuleka, wakimbila.
Waja wamgogile Yesu wamsola wamgala ha Kayafa, Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko, kuwaiting'hane wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wavyele wa wanhu.
Petulo kamkoleleza kutalitali mbaka kudikonhi da ing'anda ya Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko. Kengila na kukala hasi hamoja na wemilizi giladi yachone chondakilawilile.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko hamoja na Ikitala chose Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi wazahila usindila wa uvwizi giladi wamkome Yesu.
Walawilila wasindila bwando wa uvwizi, ila hawapatile mbuli yoyose. Hakimambukizo, walawilila wanhu wabili
walonga, “Munhu ino kalonga, ‘Nie nodaha kuibomola Ng'anda ya Mulungu na kuizenga mmazua madatu.’ ”
Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kenuka kamulongela Yesu, “Kwabule kinhu cha kwidika? Usindila waki uno woolava wanhu wano wokutagusa gweye?”
Ila Yesu kanyamala. Abaho Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kamuuza, “Nokuduiza ha Mulungu yali mgima, tulongele kamba gweye iyo Kilisto, Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Yesu kamwidika kalonga, “Gweye kulonga vino. Ila nowalongela, kulawa kipigiti kino monyona nie Mwana wa Munhu nikalile ng'ambu ya ukulume ya Ukulu, nikwiza muna gamawingu ga kuulanga!”
Abaho, Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kadega vivalo vake kalonga, “Kafukula! Habali tulonda wasindila wayagwe? Avo muhulika ufukuzi wake!
Mogelegeza vilihi?” Wamwidika, “Kolondigwa yakomigwe!”
Abaho, wamtemela mate mkihanga chake, wamtoa, na wayagwe wamtoa makofi,
walonga, “Gweye Kilisto, zuza! Yalihi yakutoile?”
Petulo viyakalile yakalile hasi hanze ya idikonhi, mtumigwa imwe wa kitwanzi wa Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kamcholela kamulongela, “Na gweye kwa hamwe na Yesu wa Galilaya.”
Ila Petulo kabela haulongozi wa wanhu wose, kamulongela, “Sikitanga chuulonga.”
Viyakalile yolawa hanze ya idikonhi, mtumigwa iyagwe wa kitwanzi kamona na kuwalongela wanhu wakalile haja, “Munhu ino kakala hamwe na Yesu wa Nazaleti.”
Petulo kabela mwanza uyagwe mkuiduila, kalonga, “Simtanga munhu ino!”
Kipigiti kidodo hamwande, wanhu wemile haja wamcholela Petulo wamulongela, “Tokona na gweye kwa mmwanza wao, kwavija hata ulonzi wako ulinga na hewo!”
Abaho, Petulo kasonga kuidukumiza na kuiduila, yolonga, “Simtanga munhu ija!” Kipigiti kikija nzogolo keka.
Petulo kakumbukila vija Yesu viyamulongele, “Nzogolo yang'hali hanakwika, konibela mianza midatu.” Kalawa hanze kalila ng'hani.
Imitondo ng'hani, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wose na wavyele wa wanhu wamwikila zundo Yesu giladi wazahile nzila ya kumkoma.
Wamfunga, wamsola, na kumgala ha Pilato, mndewa wa Yudea kulawa Loma.
Abaho, Yuda, ija yamuhonzile Yesu, viyawene kamba Yesu katagusigwa kudanganhika, kona giogio na kuvibweza vija vidanga malongo madatu va hela ha wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu.
Kalonga, “Nitenda vilozo mkumuhonza munhu yakalile bule mbuli yoyose ihile!” Na hewo wamulongela, “Avo tweye tutendeze? Na lwako mwenyego!”
Avo Yuda kazibwanha zihela muna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, abaho, kalawa hanze ya idikonhi da Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kachola kuibota.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wazidondola zihela, walonga, “Hela zino za mulopa zigomesigwa na Malagizo ga Musa kwikigwa muna ingama ya Ng'anda ya Mulungu.”
Avo, walamula kamba hela zija wagule mgunda wa munhu imwe yakalile muumbi giladi hawe hanhu ha kuzikila wahenza.
Avo mbaka lelo mgunda uja wokemigwa, “Mgunda wa Mulopa.”
Abaho, gavikila gaja galongigwe na muhokozi Yelemia, “Wasola vidanga malongo madatu va hela, kiasi kikigwe na wanhu wa Islaeli sama yake,
na zihela wazigulila mgunda wa munhu imwe yakalile muumbi, kamba Mndewa viyanilagize.”
Yesu kema haulongozi wa Pilato, mndewa wa Yudea kulawa Loma, na Pilato kamuuza, “Gweye iyo mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamulongela, “Gweye iyo ulonga avo.”
Ila wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu viwakalile womtagusa, halongile kinhu chochose.
Abaho, Pilato kamuuza, “Huhulika mbuli bwando zowokutagusa?”
Ila Yesu hedike hata mbuli imwe, avo Pilato kakanganya ng'hani.
Mkipigiti cha Lusona lwa Pasaka, mndewa wa Yudea kulawa Loma kakala na nzoela ya kumfungulila mfungigwa imwe ija wanhu iwamulondile.
Kipigiti kija kukala na mfungigwa imwe yatangigwe ng'hani na wanhu sama ya kutenda gehile yokemigwa Balaba.
Avo, dale da wanhu vidiiting'hane, Pilato kawauza, “Yalihi yummulonda niwafungulile? Balaba, ama Yesu yokemigwa Kilisto?”
Kwavija Pilato kavitanga kamba wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu wamgala Yesu kumwake sama ya migongo.
Pilato viyakalile mkigoda cha nhaguso, mtwanzi wake kamtumila usenga, kamulongela, “Sambiumtende kinhu chochose munhu hiyo yalibule vilozo, kwavija lelo nigaya ng'hani mnzozi sama yake.”
Ila wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wavyele wa wanhu wadiswagiza didale da wanhu dimpule Pilato yawafungulile Balaba na Yesu yakomigwe.
Pilato kadiuza didale da wanhu, “Yalihi mwa wanhu wano wabili yummulonda niwafungulile?” Wamwidika, “Balaba.”
Pilato kawauza, “Nimtendeze Yesu yokemigwa Kilisto?” Wose wamwidika, “Yawambigwe mumsalaba!”
Pilato kawauza, “Habali, mbuli yaki ihile yaatendile?” Ila wose wongeza kuguta nyangi wolonga, “Yawambigwe mumsalaba!”
Pilato viyawene kamba hawamtegeleza, ila kizuka kiyahiyahi, kasola mazi na kusuluza makono gake haulongozi wa didale da wanhu, kalonga, “Nie nabule mbuli na ifa ya munhu ino! Iloleni mwemwe wenyego!”
Didale da wanhu dimulongela, “Nhaguso ya ifa yake toisola tweye na wanetu!”
Abaho, Pilato kawafungulila Balaba, na kuwalagiza asikali wamulanhe Yesu mbalati, na kumgela mmakono gao giladi yawambigwe mumsalaba.
Abaho, asikali wa mndewa wa Yudea kulawa Loma wamsola Yesu wamwingiza mding'anda da ija imndewa, abaho, dale jose da asikali dimzunguluka.
Wam'vula vivalo vake na kum'vaza kanzu da zambalau.
Abaho, waluka mkungo wa mizomola wamwikila mpala jake na kumwikila ludete mumkono wake wa ukulume. Abaho, wamfugamila mavindi na kumtendela uponela, wamulongela, “Kwa mpile, Mndewa wa Wayahudi!”
Wamtemela mate, wasola ludete na kumulanha nao mpala.
Viwamambukize kumtendela uponela, wam'vula dija dikanzu, wam'vaza vivalo vake. Abaho, wamgala kumuwamba mumsalaba.
Viwakalile wochola, waiting'hana na munhu kulawa isi ya Kilene, yakemigwe Simoni, wemilizi wamshulutiza giladi yaupape msalaba wa Yesu.
Wavika hanhu hakemigwe, Goligota, nhegulo yake “Hanhu ha Fulu da Pala.”
Wamgwelela Yesu divai igeligwe vinhu va usungu, ila viyailanzile, haing'wile.
Wamuwamba mumsalaba, abaho, wakiigolela vivalo vake mkuvitoela kula.
Abaho, wakala hasi, wamwimiliza.
Uchana ya pala jake wandika lupwilili lwa nhaguso yake lulonga, “ino iyo yesu, mndewa wa wayahudi.”
Wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba hamoja na mibokonyi mibili, dimwe ng'ambu yake ya ukulume, na diyagwe ng'ambu yake ya ukumoso.
Wanhu wakalile wobita wamuliga, watigisa mapala gao
walonga, “Gweye iyo ulondile kuibomola Ng'anda ya Mulungu na kuizenga mmazua madatu, ikombole mwenyego! Ihawa gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu, humuluka kulawa mumsalaba!”
Vivija na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wavyele wa wanhu wamtendela uponela, walonga,
“Kawakombola wayagwe, ila hadahile kuikombola mwenyego! Heyo iyo Mndewa wa Islaeli! Avo na yahumuluke kulawa mumsalaba, na tweye tomtogola!
Komtamanila Mulungu, avo tulole vija Mulungu vondayamkombole, kwavija kalonga, ‘Nie iyo Mwana wa Mulungu.’ ”
Vivija na ija imibokonyi iwambigwe hamoja na heyo imuliga.
Songela kipigiti cha saa sita, kukala na ziza muisi yose mbaka kipigiti cha saa tisa.
Mkipigiti cha saa tisa, Yesu kenula dizwi kalila, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Nhegulo yake, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, habali kundeka?”
Wanhu wemile haja viwahulike, walonga, “Munhu ino komkema Eliya!”
Bahaja munhu imwe kakimbila na kusola siponji, kaizabika muna idivai igwaduke na kuifunga kuisota ya lumango na kumng'weza Yesu.
Ila wayagwe walonga, “Muleke! Tulole kamba Eliya kokwiza kumkombola!”
Yesu kenula dizwi kalila kabili, abaho, kadanganhika.
Kipigiti kikija, diguo ditungikwe Muing'anda ya Mulungu didegeka vidanga vibili, kulawa uchana mbaka hasi. Isi igudema, na mibwe itulika,
mapanga gatulika, na ng'huli za wanhu bwando wang'alile wadanganhike wazuka.
Yesu viyazukile, na hewo walawa hana gamapanga wachola hana diwambo ding'alile da Yelusalemu, na koneka na wanhu bwando.
Mkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma, hamoja na waja wakalile womwimiliza Yesu, viwawene mgudemo wa isi na gaja galawilile, wadumba na kulonga, “Kweli munhu ino kakala Mwana wa Mulungu!”
Hanhu haja kukala na watwanzi bwando wolola kutalitali, wakalile womkweleleza Yesu kulawa Galilaya na wakala womsang'hanikila.
Watwanzi hiwo wakala Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala, Maliamu mamaake Yakobo na Usufu, na mama wa wanage Zebedayo.
Viivikile ichungulo, keza mgoli imwe kulawa wambo da Alimataya, yakemigwe Usufu, vivija kakala mwanahina wa Yesu.
Kachola ha Pilato na kumpula lukuli lwa Yesu, na Pilato kalagiza kamba yagweleligwe.
Usufu kalusola ulukuli, kaluzinga sanda,
na kulutambalika mdipanga jake mwenyego da sambi dipukigwe mdidibwe. Kadibimbilisa dibwe kulu na kudika hana umulomo wa idipanga, abaho, kachola.
Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala na Maliamu iyagwe wakala hamgwazo wa idipanga.
Imitondo yake, ikala Zua da Mhumulo, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na Mafalisayo wamcholela Pilato
na kulonga, “Mndewa, tokumbuka kamba viyakalile mgima, m'vwizi ija kalonga, ‘Gahabita mazua madatu nozuka.’
Avo lagiza kamba panga jake diimilizwe mbaka zua da ikadatu, giladi wanahina zake sambiwachole kulusola ulukuli, na kuwalongela wanhu kamba kazuka. Uvwizi uno wa kimambukizo wokwiha ng'hani kubanza uja wa ichanduso.”
Pilato kawalongela, “Soleni iwaasikali, gendeni mkadiimilize kamba vumdaha.”
Avo wachola kudimiliza dipanga mkuweka asikali na kwika utango mumgwazo wa idibwe giladi kamba munhu yahadisegeza wavitange.
Vidimalile Zua da Mhumulo, imitondo iyagwe, zua vidikalile disimbuka, Maliamu wa ikiwambo cha Magidala na Maliamu iyagwe wachola kudilola dipanga.
Bahaja kulawilila na mgudemo mkulu wa isi, kwavija msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kahumuluka kulawa kuulanga, kadibimbilisa idibwe kumgwazo, abaho, kadikalila.
Lukuli lwake lunang'hazika kamba lumwemwe, na vivalo vake vikala vizelu ng'hani.
Waja iwaasikali wadumba na kugudema ng'hani, walinga kamba wanhu wadanganhike.
Msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kawalongela waja iwatwanzi, “Sambimdumbe, kwavija novitanga kamba momzahila Yesu, yawambigwe mumsalaba.
Kahaduhu hano, kazuka, kamba viyalongile. Izoni mulole hanhu hayakalile yatambalale.
Tendeni mbwisa mchole mkawalongele wanahina zake kamba kazuka, kowalongola kuchola Galilaya ako kondammone. Uno uwo usenga wangu kumwenu.”
Hima walawa hana dipanga, kuno wogudema na kudeng'ha ng'hani, abaho, wakimbila, wachola kuwalongela wanahina zake.
Bahaja Yesu kawating'hanila, kalonga, “Nowalamsa!” Wamcholela, wamgoga magulu gake na kumtambikila.
Yesu kawalongela, “Sambimdumbe, gendeni mkawalongele wanahina zangu wachole Galilaya, ako wonyona.”
Waja iwatwanzi viwakalile mnzila, asikali wayagwe wakalile wodimiliza idipanga wachola mdiwambo kuwalongela wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko mbuli zose zilawilile.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko waiting'hana hamoja na wavyele wa wanhu, na viweshile kuitogolela, wawagwelela hela bwando iwaasikali,
wawalongela, “Longeni, ‘Vitukalile tuwasile, wanahina zake weza ikilo na kulwiba lukuli lwake.’
Kamba mbuli ino iham'vikila mndewa wa Yudea kulawa Loma, tolonga nayo mkuwagombeleza giladi sambimgazigwe.”
Avo iwaasikali wasola zihela na kutenda kamba viwalongeligwe. Na mbuli zino zibwililika mwa Wayahudi mbaka lelo.
Wanahina longo dimwe na imwe, wachola Galilaya hana ikigongo chayawalongele Yesu wachole.
Viwamuwene, wamtambikila, ila wanahina wayagwe wadungwadungwa mmoyo.
Yesu kawakwenhukila kawalongela, “Nigweleligwa udaho wose kuulanga na muisi.
Avo gendeni mkawatende wanhu wa isi zose wawe wanahina, na kuwabatiza mtwaga da Tata, na Mwana, na Loho wa Mulungu,
na kuwafundiza kugagoga gaja gose ganiwalongele mweye. Na nie na hamoja na mweye mazua gose, mbaka hakimambukizo cha iisi.”
Uno uwo mwanduso wa Usenga Unogile wa Yesu Kilisto, Mwana wa Mulungu.
Kamba viwandikigwe na muhokozi Isaya, “Mulungu kalonga, ‘Nomulagiza msenga wangu yakulongole, Yondayaitande nzila yako.’
Munhu kenula dizwi muluwala, yolonga, ‘Itandeni nzila ya Mndewa, Mgoloseleni nzila zake!’ ”
Yohana M'batiza kakala muluwala, youpeta ubatizo wa kuleka vilozo, giladi vilozo vao vigeligwe kumgongo.
Wanhu bwando kulawa muisi ya Yudea na mkiwambo cha Yelusalemu wachola kumtegeleza Yohana. Wavilonga vilozo vao haulongozi wa wanhu, na heyo kawabatiza muna Ulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Yohana kavala guo ditendigwe na mijusu ya ngamia na lukumbulu lwa kwembe mchuno chake, kakala yoja nzige na uki.
Yohana kawapetela wanhu, yolonga, “Munhu yokwiza hachugu changu kana mhiko kunibanza nie. Nie silondigwa hata kuinamila na kufungula nzabi za ng'hwabasa zake.
Nie niwabatiza mweye mmazi, ila heyo yeheza kowabatiza na Loho wa Mulungu.”
Mazua gaja, Yesu kalawa mkiwambo cha Nazaleti muisi ya Galilaya, keza kubatizigwa na Yohana M'batiza Mulwanda lwa Yolodani.
Kipigiti kikija Yesu viyalawile mmazi, kawona ulanga uvuguka na Loho wa Mulungu kamuhumulukila yalumbile kamba hua.
Dizwi dihulikwa kulawa kuulanga dilonga, “Gweye iyo Mwanangu unogele. Nogelwa nagwe.”
Baho Loho wa Mulungu kamsung'hiza yachole muluwala,
kakala hiko mazua malongo mane, yogezigwa na Mwenembago. Hiko kakala na wang'onyo wa kumuhulo, na wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga wakala womsang'hanikila.
Yohana M'batiza viyageligwe mkifungo, Yesu kachola Galilaya, kawapetela wanhu Usenga Unogile wa Mulungu.
Kalonga, “Kipigiti kivika, na Undewa wa Mulungu ukwenhuka! Muleke vilozo venu na muutogole Usenga Unogile.”
Yesu viyakalile yobita mumgwazo wa Idilamba da Galilaya, kawona Simoni na Endelea ndugu yake, wotanda nhando zao mdilamba, kwavija wakala waloa somba.
Yesu kawalongela, “Ng'hwelelezeni, na nie nowatenda muwe waloa wanhu.”
Baho wazileka nhando zao wamkweleleza.
Kachola haulongozi kidogo, kawona Yakobo na Yohana, wanage Zebedayo. Wakala mngalawa zao wozigongomanya goya nhando zao.
Yesu viyawawene, bahaja kawakema, wamuleka tataao Zebedayo muingalawa na wasang'hana, wamkweleleza Yesu.
Yesu na wanahina zake wengila mkiwambo cha Kapenaumu. Vidivikile Zua da Mhumulo, Yesu kengila muna ing'anda ya nhambiko, kasonga kufundiza.
Wanhu wamuhulike wakanganya vija voyokala yofundiza, kwavija hafundize kamba wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, ila kafundiza kamba munhu yali na udaho.
Kipigiti kikija munhu yali na kinyamkela kengila mng'anda yao ya nhambiko, kaguta lwangi, yolonga,
“Kotulonda choni, Yesu wa Nazaleti? Kwiza kutubananga? Nokutanga gweye iyo mtumigwa wa Mulungu ung'alile!”
Yesu kamkomhokela ikinyamkela yolonga, “Nyamala! Mulawe munhu ino!”
Kinyamkela kamtigisatigisa ng'hani ija imunhu, kaguta lwangi na kumulawa.
Wanhu wose wakanganya, wasonga kuilongela, “Mbuli yaki ino? Dino fundo da sambi? Munhu ino kana udaho wa kuwakomhokela vinyamkela, na hewo womuhulika!”
Avo mbuli za Yesu zenela himahima kila hanhu muiisi ya Galilaya.
Yesu na wanahina zake hamoja na Yakobo na Yohana walawa mng'anda ya nhambiko wachola hakae ya Simoni na Endelea.
Mama mkwe yake Simoni kakala mtamu wa homa, kipigiti kikija Yesu viyavikile wamulongela.
Yesu kamcholela, kamgoga mkono kamwinula. Homa imulawa, na heyo kasonga kuwasang'hanikila.
Ichungulo zua vidiswile, wanhu wamgalila Yesu watamu wose na awo wakalile na vinyamkela.
Wanhu wose wa mkiwambo waiting'hana haulongozi wa ing'anda.
Yesu kawahonya wanhu bwando wakalile na vitamu va namna zose na kuwinga vinyamkela bwando. Hawalekile vinyamkela walonge kinu chochose, kwavija wamtanga heyo iyo yalihi.
Imitondo iyagwe ulukwili, zua hadinalawa, Yesu kenuka, kalawa mng'anda. Kachola kutali na ikiwambo hanhu halibule wanhu kutambika.
Simoni na wayage wachola kumzahila.
Viwamuwene wamulongela, “Wanhu wose wokuzahila gweye.”
Ila Yesu kawalongela, “Tucholeni hana iviwambo viyagwe vituzunguluke. Nolondigwa nikaupete Usenga Unogile hiko nako, kwavija ino iyo sang'hano iminzile.”
Avo kachola kila hanhu muisi ya Galilaya yowapetela wanhu muna zing'anda za nhambiko na kuwinga vinyamkela.
Munhu imwe yakalile na dikulu keza ha Yesu, kafugama mavindi kaiyalala yolonga, “Uhalonda, kodaha kunihonya.”
Yesu kamwonela bazi, kagolosa mkono wake kamkwasa, kalonga, “Nolonda, hona!”
Baho utamu umulawa, kahona.
Abaho, Yesu kamulongela yachole na zake kuno yomzuma yolonga,
“Tegeleza, sambiumulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ino, ila genda dimwe kwa dimwe ha mkulu wa nhambiko yakulole goya. Abaho, ukalave nhosa kamba viyalagize Musa, giladi wanhu wose watogole kamba kuhona.”
Ila munhu ija kachola na kasonga kubwililisa mbuli ija kila hanhu. Kweli kailonga ng'hani mbuli ija mbaka Yesu hadahile kwingila mkiwambo kimwagaia. Avo kakala hanhu halibule wanhu, na wanhu wamwizila kulawa kila hanhu.
Mazua madodo hamwande, Yesu kabweleganya Kapenaumu, mbuli zija zibwililika kamba kaukae.
Avo, wanhu bwando waiting'hana hamoja mbaka kukala haduhu hanhu hasigale, wakala wamemile mbaka haluhelengo. Na heyo kawapetela Usenga Unogile.
Abaho, weza wanhu, wamgalila munhu yaholole, yakalile yapapigwe na wanhu wane wakalile mmwanza wao.
Avija wanhu viwamemile, hawadahile kumgala ija imunhu ha Yesu. Avo watenda zonzo mkiswili walinga hayali Yesu. Viwatendile idizonzo, wamuhumulusa hasi ija imunhu, yawasile mulusazi.
Viyaiwene nhamanila yao, Yesu kamulongela ija imunhu yaholole, “Mwanangu, vilozo vako vigeligwa kumgongo.”
Wafundiza wayagwe wa Malagizo ga Musa wakalile baho, wasonga kugelegeza munda kwa munda.
“Habali munhu ino yolonga kamba vino? Uno ufukuzi! Mulungu yeiyeka yodaha kugela kumgongo vilozo va wanhu!”
Bahaja Yesu kagatanga gaja gawakalile wogelegeza, avo kawalongela, “Habali mgelegeza vinhu kamba avo?
Dilihi dibuhile ng'hani, kumulongela munhu yaholole ‘Vilozo vako vigeligwa kumgongo,’ ama kulonga, ‘Ima wima upape lusazi lwako, utembele?’
Nolonda m'vitange kamba, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nna udaho wa kuvigela kumgongo vilozo va wanhu muisi.” Abaho kamulongela ija imunhu yaholole,
“Ima wima, papa lusazi lwako, uchole ukae yako!”
Hameso gao ija imunhu kenuka kapapa lusazi lwake himahima kachola. Wanhu wose wakanganya ng'hani wamuyenzi Mulungu wolonga, “Hatunayona mbuli kamba ino!”
Yesu kabweleganya kabili mumgwazo wa Idilamba da Galilaya. Wanhu bwando wamwizila, na heyo kasonga kuwafundiza.
Viyakalile yobita, kamona muwila kodi yokemigwa Lawi, mwana wa Alufayo, yakalile muna ing'anda yake ya kulihila kodi. Yesu kamulongela, “Ng'holeleza.” Lawi kenuka kamkoleleza.
Yesu viyakalile yoja mng'anda ya Lawi, wawila kodi bwando na wene vilozo wayagwe wakala woja na heyo hamoja na wanahina zake, kwavija kukala na wanhu bwando wakalile womkweleleza.
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, wakalile Mafalisayo, viwamuwene Yesu yoja na wawila kodi na wene vilozo wayagwe, wawauza wanahina zake, “Habali yoja na wanhu kamba wano?”
Yesu kawahulika na kawalongela, “Wanhu wagima hawamulonda mganga, ila waja wali watamu wawo womulonda. Sizile kuwakema wanhu walibule vilozo ila wanhu wali na vilozo.”
Wanahina wa Yohana M'batiza na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wakala wofunga. Wanhu wayagwe wamwizila Yesu wamuuza, “Habali wanahina wa Yohana M'batiza na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wofunga, ila wanahina zako hawafunga?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mokwagiza wahenza halusona lwa zengele wacholaga bila kuja? Nokona havilumba! Kipigiti chose chondawakale na mulawilamhambe havidahika kufunga.
Ila kipigiti chovika mulawilamhambe vondayasegezigwe kumwao, baho hondawasonge kufunga.
“Haduhu munhu yokanha kidanga muna ikivalo cha sambi na kukigela muna ikivalo cha umwaka, kwavija yahatenda avo ikidanga cha sambi chobananga ikivalo cha umwaka, na hanhu hadegeke hokongezeka.
Haduhu munhu yogela divai ya sambi muna ivibuyu va umwaka vitendigwe na kwembe. Kwavija yahatenda avo idivai ya sambi yovitula ivibuyu, idivai yokwitika na ivibuyu vobanangika. Ila divai ya sambi yogeligwa muna ivibuyu va sambi vitendigwe na kwembe.”
Yesu kakala yobita muna imigunda ya ngano Mdizua da Mhumulo na wanahina zake. Viwakalile wotembela mnzila, wanahina zake wasonga kufyola zisota za gamakungwi ga ngano.
Avo Mafalisayo wamuuza Yesu, “Lola! Wanahina zako wotenda gagomeswe kutendigwa Mdizua da Mhumulo!”
Yesu kawedika, “Hamsomile kija chayatendile Daudi kipigiti heyo na wayage viwakalile na nzala?
Kengila mdihema da Mulungu kaija imikate ilavigwe nhosa ha Mulungu, na iyagwe kawagwelela wayage. Vinhu vikalile vigomeswe Mmalagizo getu kudigwa na munhu yoyose ila wakulu wa nhambiko weiyeka. Gano galawilila kipigiti kija Abiatali viyakalile Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko.”
Abaho, Yesu kamambukiza, “Zua da Mhumulo dikiligwa wanhu na si wanhu wekiligwe Zua da Mhumulo.”
Avo nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nene Mndewa wa Zua da Mhumulo.
Abaho, Yesu kabweleganya kabili muing'anda ya nhambiko. Amo kukala na munhu yali na mkono uholole.
Wanhu wayagwe wakalile haja wakala wozahila kilamso cha kumtagusila Yesu, avo wamulola ng'hani wone kamba kohonya Mdizua da Mhumulo.
Yesu kamulongela ija imunhu yali na mkono uholole, “Ima hano haulongozi wa wanhu wose.”
Abaho, Yesu kawauza waja iwanhu, “Malagizo getu gotulongela tutende kinhu chaki Mdizua da Mhumulo? Kutenda ganogile ama gehile? Kuukombola ugima wa munhu ama kuubananga?” Ila hawalongile kinhu chochose.
Yesu kawalola wanhu wose na lusango, ila kipigiti kikija kona bazi na giogio sama yao, kwavija wakala na mioyo midala na wapotela. Abaho, kamulongela ija imunhu, “Golosa mkono wako.” Na heyo kaugolosa, na mkono wake uhona.
Avo Mafalisayo walawa hanze ya ing'anda ya nhambiko na waiting'hana na wanhu wa Helode, na wasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumkoma Yesu.
Yesu na wanahina zake wachola kuna Idilamba da Galilaya na dale kulu da wanhu dimkweleleza.
Viwahulike gaja gose goyokala yotenda, wanhu bwando wamwizila kulawa Yudea, Yelusalemu, Idumea, na isi za mwambu wa ikabili wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani, na isi zose zizunguluke Tilo na Sidoni.
Kwavija kukala na dale kulu da wanhu, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake wamwikile goya ngalawa, giladi wanhu sambiwamkukusule.
Yesu kawahonya wanhu bwando, na wanhu wose wakalile watamu wakiibabanika womcholela giladi wamgoge.
Na vinyamkela viwamuwene Yesu, wawagwisa hasi wanhu iwawavagale haulongozi wake, waguta nyangi, walonga, “Gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu!”
Ila Yesu kawalagiza vinyamkela sambiwamulongele munhu yoyose kamba heyo iyo yalihi.
Yesu kakwela mkigongo na kuwakema wanhu yaawalondile, na hewo wamuwinza.
Kawasagula wanhu longo dimwe na wabili awo vivija yaawakemile watumigwa wa Kilisto, wondawakale na heyo na yondayawatume wachole kuupeta Usenga Unogile,
na kawagwelela udaho wa kuwinga vinyamkela.
Na wano iwo wanhu longo dimwe na wabili yaawasagule Yesu. Simoni, Yesu yamgwelele twaga da Petulo,
Yakobo na ndugu yake Yohana, wana wa Zebedayo, Yesu yaawakemile Boaneji, nhegulo yake, “Wana wa Mdumo,”
Endelea, Filipo, Batolomayo, Matayo, Tomaso, Yakobo mwana wa Alufayo, Tadayo, Simoni yakalile yokemigwa Mgombeleza Isi ya Islaeli,
na Yuda Isikalioti yamuhonzile Yesu.
Yesu kachola ukae. Dale kulu da wanhu waiting'hana mwanza uyagwe mbaka Yesu na wanahina zake hawapatile kipigiti cha kuja.
Mulango wake viwahulike, wachola kumsola kwavija wanhu wakala wolonga, “Kana luwege!”
Wafundiza wayagwe wa Malagizo ga Musa walawile Yelusalemu walonga, “Kana Belizebuli, mkulu wa vinyamkela iyo yomgwelela mhiko za kuwinga vinyamkela.”
Avo Yesu kawakema na kawalongela mmahala, “Mwenembago kodahaze kukiiwinga mwenyego?
Kamba undewa uhaigola mmadalemadale, gogomba genyego kwa genyego, undewa hiwo wopwililika.”
Kamba mulango uhaigola mmadalemadale, gogomba genyego kwa genyego, mulango hiwo wopwililika.
Avo kamba undewa wa Mwenembago uhaigola mmadalemadale haugendelela, ila wopwililika na kupotela.
“Haduhu munhu yodaha kwingila mng'anda ya munhu yali na mhiko na kumsolela vinhu vake, mbaka yanduse kumfunga munhu iyo yali na mhiko. Abaho, leka yadahe kum'boka vinhu vake.
“Nowalongela ikweli, vilozo vose na mbuli zose za ufukuzi za wanhu vogeligwa kumgongo.
Ila munhu yoyose yondayamfukulile Loho wa Mulungu, havidahika kugeligwa kumgongo, kwavija katenda vilozo va digunge.”
Yesu kalonga vino kwavija wakala wolonga, “Kana kinyamkela.”
Abaho, mamaake na wadodo zake Yesu weza. Wema hanze, wamulagiza munhu yengile mng'anda yakamkeme.
Dale da wanhu wakalile wamzunguluke, wamulongela, “Mamaako na wadodo zako na lumbu zako wakunze wokuzahila.”
Yesu kawedika, “Mamaangu yalihi? Na wadodo zangu walihi?”
Abaho, kawalola wanhu wamzunguluke na kulonga, “Wano iwo mamaangu na wadodo zangu!
Munhu yoyose yogatenda gaja goyolonda Mulungu, heyo iyo mdodo wangu, lumbu jangu, na mamaangu.”
Yesu kasonga kufundiza mumgwazo wa Idilamba da Galilaya. Wanhu kombenakombena wammemela womzunguluka wakala dale kulu, avo kengila mngalawa na kakala himo. Ija ingalawa ikala mumgwazo wa idilamba, na ididale da wanhu wakala wemile mhwani, mulugigo lwa igamazi.
Kawafundiza vinhu bwando mmahala.
Yolonga, “Tegelezeni! Mulimi kachola kuhanda mbeyu.
Viyakalile yomiza, ziyagwe zilagalila mnzila, ndege weza wazija.
Ziyagwe zilagalila muna uulongo uli na mabwe, hakalile na ulongo mdodo. Hima zimbeyu zota, kwavija ulongo ukala mdodo.
Zua vidilawile diilukuza imiche, na kwavija ikala na mizizi midodo imiche inyala.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mmizomola, imizomola ikula na kuizingiliza imiche, avo hailelile.
Ila ziyagwe zilagalila hana ulongo unogile, zota, zikula na kulela, ziyagwe zilela malongo madatu, ziyagwe zilela malongo sita, na ziyagwe zilela mia.”
Yesu kamambukiza, “Munhu yali na magwiti na yahulike!”
Yesu viyakalile yeiyeka, wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili na wanhu wakalile womtegeleza, wamcholela wamulongela yawalongele nhegulo ya mahala gaja.
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mgweleligwa nyong'onyo za Undewa wa Mulungu, ila wanhu wali kunze wohulika vinhu vose mmahala,
giladi, ‘Walole, Ila sambiwone, Wahulike, Ila sambiwavitange, Kwavija wahavitanga, womuhindukila Mulungu, Na heyo kovigela kumgongo vilozo vao.’ ”
Abaho, Yesu kawauza, “Avo kamba hamditanga hala dino, mogatangaze mahala gayagwe?
Imunhu yohanda kohanda imbuli ya Mulungu.
Wanhu wayagwe walinga kamba mbeyu zilagalile mnzila, haja imbuli ya Mulungu viihandigwe. Kipigiti kikija viwoihulika, Mwenembago kokwiza na kuisola imbuli ya Mulungu ihandigwe mgati yao.
Wanhu wayagwe walinga kamba mbeyu zilagalile muulongo uli na mabwe. Woihulika imbuli ya Mulungu, na kipigiti kikija woibokela mkudeng'ha.
Ila haiwengila mgati ng'hani avo haikala kipigiti kitali. Uhalawila mgayo ama kugazigwa sama ya imbuli ya Mulungu, woileka hima.
Wanhu wayagwe walinga kamba mbeyu zilagalile mmizomola. Wanhu wano iwo waihulike imbuli ya Mulungu,
ila mzahimzahi wa ulumwengu uno, kunogela mali na msulukilo wa vinhu bwando viyagwe mmioyo yao voizingiliza imbuli ya Mulungu, avo hawalela mujo.
Ila wanhu wayagwe walinga kamba mbeyu zilagalile muna ulongo unogile. Waihulika imbuli ya Mulungu na waitogola na kulela mujo, wayagwe malongo madatu, wayagwe malongo sita na wayagwe mia.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Vino kuna munhu yogala mng'anda kiwenge na kukigubika na kinongo ama kukika hauvungu wa lusazi? Nokona si vivo! Kokika mkingolobweda.
Kinhu chochose kifisigwe chovumbuligwa, na kinhu chochose kigubikigwe chogubuligwa.
Munhu yali na magwiti na yahulike.”
Vivija kawalongela, “Gagelegezeni ng'hani gaja gomuhulika! Mhima iija yondamuwapimile wayagwe, iyo mhima yondampimilwe mweye, tena yobanziliza.
Waja wali na kinhu wokongezeligwa, na waja walibule kinhu, wobokigwa hata kija ikinhu kidodo kiwalinacho.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Undewa wa Mulungu ulinga na munhu yomiza mbeyu mumgunda wake.
Ikilo kowasa na imisi kameso, kipigiti kino chose zimbeyu zozuka na kukula. Ila mwenyego havimanya mbuli zino vuzitendeka.
Ulongo wenyego woutenda umche ukule na kulela. Wosonga koneka umche, abaho matepo, abaho ngano muna imikungwi.
Ngano ihakangala, iyo imunhu kosonga kusenga na zele jake, kwavija kipigiti cha kusenga kivika.”
Yesu kalonga, “Undewa wa Mulungu tuulinge na choni? Tuulonge mdihala jaki?
Ulinga kamba munhu yasolile mbeyu ya haladali, mbeyu ndodo kubita mbeyu zose muulumwengu, na kuzihanda muisi.
Mkipigiti kiguhi yokula yowa biki kulu ng'hani kubanza mibiki yose na kulava mitambi mikulu mbaka ndege wokwiza na kuzenga mvulu zao muna imbeho yake.”
Yesu kawapetela wanhu mbuli zake mmahala bwando galingile na gano. Kawalongela kamba viwadahile kuvitanga.
Halongile nao chochose bila mahala. Ila viyakalile yeiyeka na wanahina zake, kawalongela kila kinhu.
Ichungulo ya zua didija, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Tuloke mwambu wa ikabili wa idilamba.”
Avo wadileka dale da wanhu, wanahina wengila mngalawa ija Yesu yaakalile yeshile kukala, wamsola wachola hamoja nayo. Ngalawa ziyagwe vivija zikala bahaja.
Baho dilawilila kukuzumbi, na mawimbi gasonga kuikunhiza ingalawa, avo isonga kumema mazi.
Yesu kakala kukisogo mwa ingalawa kawasa kuno pala jake kasagamila muna umto. Wanahina wamulamusa wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi! Hukona vihile vitulonda kudanganhika?”
Yesu kema wima kadikomhokela dibeho, yolonga, “Nyamala!” Na kagalongela ga mawimbi, “Ituze!” Beho dinyamala, na kukala hapozike.
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Habali mkona bwembwe? Mng'hali mwabule nhamanila?”
Ila wakala wodumba ng'hani na wakala wokiilongela, “Munhu waki ino? Hata beho na mawimbi vomuhulika!”
Yesu na wanahina zake wavika mwambu uyagwe wa Idilamba da Galilaya muisi ya Gelasi.
Kipigiti kikija Yesu viyahumuluke muna ingalawa, munhu yali na vinyamkela kulawa kuna gamapanga hima kamwizila.
Munhu ino kakala yokala kuna gamapanga, haduhu munhu yadahile kumfungiliza hata na mnyolo.
Mianza bwando wamdaza gamagulu na makono gake na mhikwi na minyolo, ila kaitola iminyolo na kuzibena zimhikwi ziwamdazile mmagulu gake. Haduhu munhu yakalile na mbavu za kumgoga.
Imisi na ikilo kakala yoembea mmapanga na m'vigongo yoguta nyangi na kuikanhakanha na mabwe.
Viyamuwene Yesu yang'hali kutali, kamkimbilila, kamfugamila mavindi,
kaguta lwangi, kalonga, “Yesu, Mwana wa Mulungu Mkulu Ng'hani! Konilonda choni? Mtwaga da Mulungu, nokuyalalila, sambiungaze!”
Kalonga vino kwavija Yesu kakala yomulongela, “Kinyamkela, mulawe munhu ino!”
Avo Yesu kamuuza, “Twaga jako dijo dilihi?” Ija imunhu kamwidika, “Twaga jangu ‘Dale’ kwavija twa bwando!”
Kagendelela kumuyalalila Yesu sambiyawawinge walawe muisi ija.
Kukala na dale kulu da mitumbi behi na haja, woja hana ikigongo.
Avo ivinyamkela wamuyalalila Yesu wolonga, “Tugale ha imitumbi, na utuleke tukaiingile.”
Yesu kawaleka wachole, na ivinyamkela wamulawa munhu ija na kuiingila imitumbi. Dale jose da imitumbi divikila alufu mbili, dihumuluka mdigema, dingila mdilamba na kudanganhikila mmazi.
Wachunga wa imitumbi wakimbila, wabwililisa mbuli zija mkiwambo na mmigunda. Wanhu wachola kulola kija kilawilile.
Viwavikile ha Yesu, wamona munhu ija yakalile na dale da vinyamkela, kakala hasi, kavala na yali na nzonzi zake, na wanhu wose wona bwembwe.
Waja wagonile gaja wawalongela wanhu gaja gamulawilile ija imunhu yali na vinyamkela na mbuli za ija imitumbi.
Avo wanhu wamulongela Yesu yasegele muundewa wao.
Yesu viyakwelile mngalawa, ija imunhu yakalile na vinyamkela kaiyalala yomulongela, “Nolonda tuchole tose.”
Ila Yesu kamgomesa, kamulongela, “Genda hakae yako mmulango wako na uwalongele mbuli zose zayakutendele Mndewa na vija viyakonele bazi.”
Avo munhu ija kasegela kachola muna iviwambo longo dimwe vikemigwa Dekapoli, yopeta gaja Yesu gayamtendele. Na wanhu wose wahulike wakanganya ng'hani.
Yesu kakwela kabili muingalawa, kabweleganya mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba, ako dale kulu da wanhu kudiilundize muimhwani dimzunguluka heyo.
Mkulu imwe wa ing'anda ya nhambiko, yokemigwa Yailo, kavika. Viyamonile Yesu, kaibwanha hasi ha magulu gake,
kaiyalala kamulongela yomgong'ondeza, “Mndele wangu imdodo mtamu ng'hani. Avo izo umwikile makono gako yahone!”
Avo Yesu kachola nayo. Wanhu bwando wamkoleleza wakala wokiibabana nayo ng'ambu zose.
Bahaja kukala na mtwanzi yakalile na utamu wa kutumika mkipigiti cha milao longo dimwe na mibili.
Kakala yagangigwe na mafundi bwando, kasa hela zake zose, na utamu wake ugendelela kongezeka ng'hani.
Viyahulike singilimo za Yesu, kengila mdidale da wanhu hachugu cha Yesu na kudikwasa valo jake.
Kwavija kalonga munda kwa munda, “Nihakwasa vivalo vake, nohona.”
Bahaja kutumika kuleka, na kakiihulika mulukuli lwake kamba kahonyigwa utamu wake.
Bahaja Yesu kavitanga kamba mhiko zimulawa, avo kawahindukila didale da wanhu kawauza, “Yalihi yakwasile vivalo vangu?”
Wanahina zake wamwidika, “Kowona wanhu viwakumemele, habali uuza yalihi yakukwasile?”
Ila Yesu kagendelela kulolesa, yamone yatendile vija.
Mtwanzi ija kagatanga gaja gamulawilile, avo keza yogudema kuno yokona bwembwe, kaibwanha hasi ha magulu gake, kamulongela ikweli yose.
Yesu kamulongela, “Mndele wangu, nhamanila yako ikuhonya. Genda mditindiwalo na utamu wako uhone.”
Yesu viyakalile yolonga vija, weza wasenga kulawa kung'anda ya Yailo wamulongela, “Mndele wako kadanganhika. Habali ugendelela kumgaza mkulufunzi?”
Yesu hagategeleze gaja iwasenga gawalongile, ila kamulongela Yailo, “Sambiudumbe, tamanila tu.”
Abaho, Yesu hamtogoze munhu yoyose yachole nayo ila Petulo, Yakobo, na Yohana ndugu yake Yakobo.
Wavika hang'anda ya Yailo, Yesu kona kiyahiyahi na wanhu wolila na kulombokeza.
Kengila mng'anda na kuwalongela, “Kiyahiyahi chose kino cha choni? Habali mulila? Mwana hadanganhike ino, ila kawasa!”
Wamseka, avo kawalava kunze wose, kawasola tata na mama wa imwana na wanahina zake wadatu, abaho, wengila kugati kuyatambalikigwe imwana.
Kamgoga mkono na kumulongela, “Talita komu!” Nhegulo yake, “Mndele, nokulongela, lamuka!”
Kipigiti kikija ija imndele kenuka, kasonga kutembela, kwavija kakala na milao longo dimwe na mibili. Vigalawilile gano wanhu wakanganya ng'hani.
Ila Yesu kawagomesa yowagong'ondeza, sambiwamulongele munhu yoyose, abaho, kawalongela, “Mgweleleni kinhu cha kuja.”
Yesu kahalawa haja kabwela hakiwambo cha hakae yake, na wanahina zake wamkweleleza.
Muna Dizua da Mhumulo Yesu kasonga kufundiza muna ing'anda ya nhambiko, kukala na wanhu bwando, na viwamuhulike, wanhu wose wakanganya, walonga, “Kagapata kwahi mafundizo gano gose? Na ng'hungwe yaki ino yagweleligwe, na kodahaze kutenda mizonza?
Ino sio salamala, mwanage Maliamu, na mkulu wao kina Yakobo, Usufu, Yuda, na Simoni? Na walumbu zake si wano wokala bahano?” Avo wamulema.
Yesu kawalongela, “Wahokozi wohishimilwa kila hanhu, ila hawahishimilwa m'viwambo vao wenyego na mwa wandugu zao na mmilango yao wenyego.”
Hadahile kutenda mizonza yoyose haja, ila kawekila makono gake watamu wabili wadatu kawahonya.
Kakanganya ng'hani, avija wanhu wa haja viwalibule nhamanila. Abaho, Yesu kachola kuna iviwambo vizunguluke haja, yowafundiza wanhu.
Yesu kawakema wanahina longo dimwe na wabili hamoja, na kawatuma wabiliwabili. Kawagwelela udaho wa kuwinga vinyamkela
na kawalagiza, yowalongela, “Sambimsole kinhu chochose mmwanza wenu, ila fimbo iiyeka. Sambimsole mkate, mkoba, ama hela.
Valeni ng'hwabasa, ila sambimpape kivalo kiyagwe.”
Vivija kawalongela, “Hanhu hohose hondam'bokeligwe, kaleni baho mbaka vondamsegele.
Kamba muhengila mkiwambo na wanhu wahalema kuwabokela ama wahalema kuwategeleza, segeleni na kung'unheni timbwisi dili mmagulu genu. Iyo yowa nzuma yao!”
Avo wachola na kuwapetela wanhu waleke vilozo vao.
Wawinga vinyamkela bwando, na kuwabakaza mavuta ga mizaituni watamu na kuwahonya.
Mndewa Helode Antipa, mtawala wa Galilaya, kazihulika mbuli zino, kwavija sang'hano za Yesu zenela kila hanhu. Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Yohana M'batiza kazuka. Kino kicho kilamso kana mhiko zino za kutenda mizonza.”
Wayagwe walonga, “Ino iyo Eliya.” Na wayagwe walonga, “Ino iyo muhokozi yalingile kamba imwe wa wahokozi wa umwaka.”
Helode viyahulike, kalonga, “Ino iyo Yohana M'batiza! Nimkanhile pala jake, kawa mgima kabili!”
Kwavija Helode mwenyego kakala yalagize Yohana yagogigwe, abaho, yageligwe mkifungo. Katenda vino sama ya Helodia mtwanzi wa Filipo mkulu wake, ayo yakalile yamsolile.
Kwavija Yohana kakala yananahile kumulongela Helode, “Havilumbile gweye kumsola mtwanzi wa mkulu wako Filipo.”
Avo Helodia kamwihila Yohana, kalonda kumkoma, ila hadahile.
Helode kamdumba Yohana kwavija kavitanga kamba Yohana hakalile munhu kizenzeleganye na kakala munhu wa Mulungu, avo kamwimiliza. Kanogelwa kumtegeleza, ila yehesha kumtegeleza kakala yogaya ng'hani mkugelegeza, ila kipigiti chose kakala yomtegeleza.
Hakimambukizo, Helodia kapata nzila. Dikala zua da ng'humbukila ya mvumbuka ya Helode, kipigiti Helode vayawatendele lusona wakulu wose wa silikali, wakulu wa asikali, na wakulu wa wenekae wa Galilaya.
Mndele wa Helodia kengila na kuvina, Helode na iwahenza wakalile baho wanogelwa ng'hani. Avo mndewa kamulongela ija imndele, “Nipule kinhu chochose chuulonda, nokugwelela.”
Mkuiduila kamulongela, “Nokugwelela kinhu chochose chondaunipule, hata lwenza lwa undewa wangu.”
Avo ija imndele kalawa kunze kumuuza mamaake, “Nikapule choni?” Na heyo kamulongela, “Pala da Yohana M'batiza.”
Ija imndele kabwela hima ha mndewa na kupula, “Nolonda unigwelele sambisambi pala da Yohana M'batiza muna ulungo!”
Mndewa kona giogio ng'hani, ila sama ya kiduilo chayaiduile na sama ya iwahenza wakalile haja hameza, hadahile kulema.
Avo kamulagiza asikali yomkomhokela yagale pala da Yohana. Asikali kachola mding'anda da kufungila wanhu, na kukanha pala da Yohana.
Abaho, kadigala mulungo na kumgwelela imndele, na heyo kamgwelela mamaake.
Wanahina wa Yohana viwahulike gano, weza kulusola lukuli lwake na kuluzika.
Iwatumigwa wa Kilisto wabwela waiting'hana na Yesu wamulongela gose gawatendile na kufundiza.
Kukala na wanhu bwando wayagwe wokwiza na wayagwe wochola mbaka Yesu na wanahina zake hawapatile hata kipigiti cha kuja. Avo Yesu kawalongela, “Tusegeleni tuchole hanhu ha kifiso, muhumule kidogo.”
Avo wakwela mngalawa wasonga kusegela weiyeka, wachola hanhu ha kifiso.
Wanhu bwando wawona vowosegela, mkipigiti kiguhi wawatanga, avo wanhu kulawa m'viwambo vose wakimbila na magulu na walongola kuvika hanhu hayakalile yochola Yesu na wanahina zake.
Yesu viyahumuluke muna ingalawa, kajona dale kulu da wanhu, kawonela bazi mmoyo kwavija wakala kamba ng'hondolo walibule mchunga. Avo kasonga kuwafundiza vinhu bwando.
Zua vidiswile, wanahina zake wamcholela wamulongela, “Zua diswa na hano hatuli twa muluwala,
walongele wanhu wachole mmigunda na m'viwambo va mmabehi giladi wakagule vinhu vakuja.”
Yesu kawedika, “Wagweleleni mwenye vinhu vakuja.” Na hewo wamuuza, “Kolonda tuchole tukawagulile mikate ya kitumetume cha munhu cha milenge minane tuwagwelele waje?”
Avo Yesu kawauza, “Mikate mingahi imulinayo? Gendeni mkalole.” Viwayonile, wamulongela, “Ilibaho mikate mitano na somba wabili.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake wawagole wanhu wose muna gamadale na kuwalongela wakale hasi muluzondo.
Avo wanhu wakala hasi mmadale ga wanhu miamia na wanhu malongo matanomatano.
Abaho, Yesu kaisola ija imikate mitano na iwasomba wabili, kalola uchana kuulanga, na kamgwelela hewela Mulungu. Kaimogola imikate na kuwagwelela wanahina zake wawagolele wanhu. Vivija kawagolela iwasomba wabili wanhu wose.
Wanhu wose waja na kwiguta.
Abaho, wanahina wadondola migelo longo dimwe na mibili ya imikate na iwasomba wasigale.
