Mheta ya wambigalo wadile wakala alufu tano.
Bahaja Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake wakwele muingalawa walongole kuchola Betisaida, mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba, kipigiti heyo vayakalile yowalaga wanhu.
Viyeshile kuwalaga iwanhu, kachola hakigongo kutambika.
Viivikile ichungulo, ngalawa ikala hadidindi da idilamba, kipigiti Yesu viyakalile yeiyeka mulusanga.
Kawona wanahina zake wogaya kuzikunhiza zinyiko kwavija wakala wochola kudilawa beho, avo mkipigiti cha hagatigati ya nzogolo zikwika na imitondo, kawacholela yotembela uchana ya igamazi. Kalonda kuwabita,
ila wamona yotembela uchana ya igamazi. Watoa nyangi wagiza wona mzimu.
Wose viwamuwene wona bwembwe. Bahaja Yesu kawalongela, “Iyo nie, sambimdumbe.”
Abaho, kakwela mngalawa hamoja nao, na dibeho dinyamala. Wanahina zake wakanganya ng'hani.
Kwavija hawakitangile kilamso cha kuwagwelela mandia wanhu alufu tano, nzonzi zao hazigogile gaja.
Waloka idilamba na wavika muisi ya Genesaleti, aho hawaitatilize ngalawa yao.
Viwahumuluke mngalawa bahaja wanhu wamtanga Yesu.
Avo wanhu wakimbila muna iisi yose, wasonga kuwagala watamu mmachela kokose kuwamuhulike.
Na kila hanhu Yesu kuyacholile m'viwambo, mmiwambo, ama mmigunda, wanhu wawasola watamu wawagala hadisoko na wamuyalalila womulongela yawaleke wakwase hata lugigo lwa kivalo chake, na wose wakwasile wahona.
Mafalisayo wayagwe na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa walawile Yelusalemu weza wailundiza haulongozi wa Yesu.
Wona wanahina wayagwe wa Yesu woja vakuja kuno makono gao ganyolodoke, kwavija gakala hagananavigwa.
Kwavija Mafalisayo na Wayahudi wose, hawaja mbaka wasunguse ng'hani makono gao kamba viilondigwa, sama ya kuwinza mafundo ga wahenga zao.
Hawaja kinhu chochose kilawa hadisoko mbaka wakisuluze. Na wawinza mafundo bwando gawabokele kulawa mwa wahenga zao, kamba vija, kusuluza vikasi, viteleko, na via va shaba.
Avo, Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wanahina zako hawagawinza mafundo gatufundizigwe na wahenga, ila woja na makono ganyolodoke?”
Yesu kawedika yolonga, “Muhokozi Isaya kahokola goya viyahokole yowalonga mweye! Mweye videlenya, kamba vija viyandike, ‘Wanhu wano wonihishimila mmilomo yao, ila mioyo yao yakutali na nie.
Wonitambikila nie bule, kwavija wofundiza mafundo ga wanhu kamba Malagizo gangu!’
Mzika hamgwazo ndagizi za Mulungu, na mgawinza mafundo ga wanhu.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Muna ubala wa kuzilema ndagizi za Mulungu giladi mgatunize mafundo genu wenyego.
Musa kalagiza, ‘Wahishimile tataako na mamaako,’ na ‘Munhu yoyose yomulonga vihile tataake ama mamaake, yakomigwe.’
Ila mweye mofundiza kamba, kamba munhu kana kinhu cha kumgwelela tata ama mamaake, ila yahalonga, ‘Kinhu kino kicho Kolubani,’ nhegulo yake, ‘Nhosa ya Mulungu,’
avo halondigwa kuwataza mkuwagwelela vinhu tata na mamaake.
Vino vivo mafundo gamuwafundiza wanhu vigobeza mbuli za Mulungu. Na kuna vinhu viyagwe bwando kamba vino vimtenda.”
Abaho, Yesu kadikema kabili didale da wanhu, kawalongela, “Nitegelezeni na m'vitange.
Haduhu kinhu kimwingila munhu kulawa kunze chondakimtende munhu yanyolodoke. Ila kija kimulawa munhu, kicho kimtenda munhu yanyolodoke.”
Munhu yali na magwiti ga kuhulika, na yahulike!
Viyadilekile didale da wanhu na kwingila mng'anda, wanahina zake wamulonda yawalongele goya hala dino.
Yesu kawalongela, “Na mweye vivija hamnavitanga? Ham'vimanya kamba kinhu chochose kingila mgati mwa munhu kulawa kunze hakidaha kumnyolodosa,
kwavija hakimwingila mmoyo, ila mmunda, abaho, chochola kucholo?” Viyalongile vino, Yesu kavilonga vakuja vose vidigwe.
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Kija kimulawa munhu kicho kimtenda yanyolodoke.
Kwavija kulawa mgati ya umoyo wa munhu, molawa ngelegeza zihile, ugoni, ubavi, kukoma,
ugoni, ugila, kutenda gehile, sulukila ya ugoni, uzenzeleganye, sulukila za kulonda vinhu bwando, migongo, kuilonga vihile, magoda, na ubozi.
Mbuli zose zino zihile zilawa mgati mwa munhu na zizo zimtenda yanyolodoke.”
Yesu kalawa kachola muisi ili behi na wambo da Tilo. Kengila muna ing'anda imwe na halondile munhu yoyose yavitange kamba kahaja, ila hadahile kuifisa.
Mtwanzi imwe, mndele wake yakalile na kinyamkela, kahulika mbuli za Yesu, hima kamwizila kamfugamila mavindi haulongozi wake.
Mtwanzi ija kakala Mmhazi, yaleligwe ng'ambu ya Foinike muisi ya Silia. Kaiyalala yomulongela Yesu yamuwinge ikinyamkela yam'vamhile mndele wake.
Ila Yesu kamwidika, “Beta tanhu iwana wegute. Havinogile kusola mandia ga wana na kuwagwelela umbwa.”
Ija mtwanzi kamwidika, “Mndewa! Hata umbwa woja vakuja viwasigaze iwana hasi ya imeza.”
Avo Yesu kamulongela, “Sama ya mbuli zako zino, genda ukae kom'vika kinyamkela kamulawa mndele wako!”
Kachola ukae kam'vika mwanage yawasile mulusazi, na kweli kinyamkela kamulawa.
Abaho, Yesu kasegela muna iisi ya Tilo, kachola Lamba da Galilaya kubitila Sidoni mbaka muisi ya viwambo longo dimwe vikemigwa Dekapoli.
Wanhu wamgalila munhu yakalile kinziwi na bubui, wamuyalalila Yesu yamwikile makono gake.
Yesu kamsola yeiyeka, kamgala kutali na ididale da wanhu, kagela vidole vake mmagwiti ga ija imunhu, kazenha vizite, abaho, kalukwasa lulimi lwake.
Abaho, Yesu kalola uchana kuulanga, kabweza mhumuzi, na kumulongela ija imunhu, “Efata!” Nhegulo yake, “Vuguka!”
Bahaja munhu ija magwiti gake gahulika, kigagaziko chake kisegezigwa, avo kasonga kulongelela bila kugaya.
Abaho, Yesu kawagong'ondeza wanhu sambiwamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ija. Ila avija viyakalile yowagong'ondeza ng'hani vivo vowokala wobwililisa ng'hani.
Wanhu wose wahulike wakanganya ng'hani na walonga, “Kila kinhu kotenda goya! Kawatenda hata vinziwi wahulike na mabubui walonge!”
Mazua madodo hamwande, dale kulu diyagwe da wanhu waiting'hana hamoja. Wanhu wakala wabule kinhu chochose cha kuja, Yesu kawakema wanahina zake kawalongela,
“Nowonela bazi wanhu wano, kwavija wakala na nie mazua madatu, na kipigiti kino wabule kinhu cha kuja.
Nihawalongela wachole mkae zao na nzala, wosinduka mnzila, kwavija wayagwe walawa kutali.”
Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Muluwala luno kwahi munhu kondayazahile mandia ga kuwagwelela wanhu wose wano?”
Yesu kawauza, “Mikate mingahi imulinayo?” Wamulongela, “Mikate saba.”
Yesu kadilongela didale da wanhu dikale hasi. Abaho, kaisola ija imikate saba, kalonga hewela ha Mulungu, kaimogola na kuwagwelela wanahina zake wawagolele iwanhu, na wanahina watenda kamba viwalagizwe.
Vivija wakala na visomba vidogodogo. Yesu kalonga hewela ha Mulungu, vivija kawalongela wanahina zake wawagolele iwanhu.
Wanhu wose waja weguta, wanahina zake wadondola, wamemeza migelo saba ya vakuja visigale!
Wakala wanhu alufu nne. Yesu kawalaga iwanhu wachole kumwao.
Kipigiti kikija kakwela mngalawa hamoja na wanahina zake wachola muisi ya Dalumanuta.
Mafalisayo wamcholela Yesu wasonga kuibamilila nayo. Wamwikila vitega wamulonda yatende mzonza wone kamba Mulungu kamtogola.
Ila Yesu kabweza mhumuzi, kalonga, “Habali wanhu wa mazua gano wolonda mzonza? Haduhu, nowalongela! Haduhu ikweli yondamgweleligwe!”
Abaho, kawaleka, kakwela muna ingalawa na kasonga kuloka mwambu uyagwe wa idilamba.
Wanahina wakala waisemwile kusola mikate na wakala na mkate umwe mngalawa.
Yesu kawazuma, kawalongela, “Iteganyeni na mela da Mafalisayo na mela da Helode.”
Wasonga kuilongela wenyego kwa wenyego, “Kolonga vino kwavija twabule mikate.”
Yesu kagatanga gaja gawakalile wolonga, avo kawauza, “Habali mulongelela avija vimulibule mikate? Ham'vimanya ama hamnavitanga? Mwabule nzonzi?
Muna meso ila hamulola? Muna magwiti ila hamuhulika? Muisemwa
avija viniimogole imikate mitano na kuwagwelela wanhu alufu tano, migelo mingahi ya imikate isigale imdondole?” Wamwidika, “Longo dimwe na mibili.”
Yesu kawauza kabili “Na vinimogole imikate saba na kuwagwelela wanhu alufu nne, migelo mingahi imemile ya imikate isigale imdondole?” Wamwidika, “Saba.”
Yesu kawauza, “Mng'hali hamnavitanga?”
Wavika Betisaida, wanhu wamgala munhu kimbugumbugu ha Yesu, wamuyalalila yamkwase.
Yesu kamgoga mkono ija imunhu kimbugumbugu, kamgala kutali na ikiwambo. Kamtemela visite mmeso, abaho, kamwikila makono gake, kamuuza, “Kodaha kulola kinhu chochose?”
Ija imunhu kalola uchana kalonga, “Nowona wanhu, ila wokoneka kamba mibiki itembela.”
Yesu kamwikila makono mwanza uyagwe mmeso, mwanza uno kaiyoha kubunhula, na meso gake gananazuka, kadaha kulola goya kila kinhu.
Abaho, Yesu kamulagiza yachole ukae yomgong'ondeza, yolonga, “Sambiubweleganye muna ikiwambo.”
Abaho, Yesu na wanahina zake wachola kuna iviwambo behi na Kaisalia Filipi. Viwakalile mnzila kawauza, “Nongeleni, wanhu wolonga nie iyo munhu yalihi?”
Wamwidika wolonga, “Wayagwe wolonga gweye iyo Yohana M'batiza, wayagwe wolonga gweye iyo Eliya, wayagwe wolonga gweye iyo imwe wa wahokozi.”
Yesu kawauza, “Na mweye molonga nie iyo munhu yalihi?” Petulo kamwidika, “Gweye iyo Kilisto yasaguligwe na Mulungu.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalagiza, “Sambimmulongele munhu yoyose mbuli zino.”
Abaho, Yesu kasonga kuwafundiza wanahina zake kawalongela, “Nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nolondigwa nigazigwe ng'hani na kulemigwa na wakulu, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Nokomigwa, ila mazua madatu hamwande nozuka nowa mgima kabili.”
Kawalongela kinaganaga. Avo Petulo kamsola kamgala hamgwazo kasonga kumkomhokela.
Ila Yesu kahinduka kukisogo, kawalola wanahina zake na kumkomhokela Petulo, yolonga, “Segela hamwangu, Mwenembago! Ngelegeza zako hazilawa ha Mulungu ila zolawa mwa wanhu.”
Abaho, Yesu kadikema ididale da wanhu hamoja na wanahina zake kawalongela, “Kamba munhu yahalonda kuwa mwanahina wangu, yaibele mwenyego, yaidikwe msalaba wake yanikoleleze.
Kwavija munhu yoyose yahalonda kuukombola ugima wake kowagiza, ila munhu yoyose yowagiza ugima wake, sama yangu nie na sama ya Usenga Unogile, koukombola.
Vino wanhu wokwing'higwa choni kamba wahagweleligwa vinhu vose vili muisi, abaho, wawagize ugima wao? Nokona haduhu!
Haduhu kinhu chondawalave wabweze ugima wao.
Ihawa munhu yahanyonela kinyala nie na mafundo gangu mwa wanhu wano walibule bwembwe da Mulungu na mmazua gano gehile, avo nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nomonela kinyala munhu hiyo vondanize muna iyenzi ya Tata wangu hamoja na wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga wang'alile.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, hana wanhu hano hawadanganhika mbaka wawone Undewa wa Mulungu ukwiza na mhiko.”
Vigabitile mazua sita, Yesu kawasola Petulo, Yakobo, na Yohana, kakwela nao kukigongo kitali weiyeka. Yesu kagaluka haulongozi wao.
Vivalo vake vinang'hazika! Vikala vizelu, haduhu munhu yoyose muulumwengu yahadahile kuvisuluza kamba vija.
Abaho, waja wanahina wadatu wamona Eliya na Musa wolongelela na Yesu.
Petulo kamulongela Yesu, “Mkulufunzi, vinoga tweye tukale hano, tuzenge vizewe vidatu, kimwe chako, kiyagwe cha Musa, na kiyagwe cha Eliya.”
Petulo haditangile da kulonga kwavija heyo na wayage wakala wokona bwembwe.
Abaho, dilawilila wingu diwagubika, na dihulikwa dizwi kulawa mdiwingu, dilonga, “Ino iyo Mwanangu yanogele, mtegelezeni heyo!”
Himahima walola kuno na kuno, hawamuwene munhu yoyose, ila Yesu yeiyeka hamoja na hewo.
Viwakalile wohumuluka mkigongo, Yesu kawalagiza, yowalongela, “Sambimmulongele munhu yoyose gaja gamonile, mbaka nie, Mwana wa Munhu, vondanizuke kulawa mkudanganhika.”
Wagatogola malagizo gake, ila wenyego kwa wenyego wasonga kuigela msego mbuli ija, wokiiuza, “Kuzuka kulawa mkudanganhika ndo choni?”
Na hewo wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wolonga tanhu yeze Eliya?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vivo! Eliya kolongola kwiza, giladi yeke goya kila kinhu. Habali Nyandiko Zing'alile zolonga kamba Mwana wa Munhu kogazigwa ng'hani na kulemigwa?
Ila nowalongela kwa vovose, Eliya keza kesha, na wanhu wamtendela kamba viwalondile, kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzimulonga.”
Viwaiting'hanile na iwanahina wayagwe, wajona dale kulu da wanhu diwazunguluka wanahina zake na wafundiza wayagwe wa Malagizo ga Musa wokiibamilila.
Waja iwanhu viwamuwene Yesu, wakanganya ng'hani na wamkimbilila wamulamsa.
Yesu kawauza wanahina zake, “Moibamilila choni?”
Munhu imwe muna ididale da wanhu kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, nimgala mmhale wangu kumwako, kwavija kana kinyamkela na hadaha kulonga.
Yaham'vamhila, kom'bwanha hasi na kolawa holovu mmulomo na kugegedula meno gake na kugangamala lukuli lwake lose. Niwalongela wanahina zako wamuwinge ikinyamkela, ila walemelwa.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye wanhu mulibule nhamanila! Nokala namwe mbaka zua jaki? Nowazaganya mbaka zua jaki? Nigalile hano immhale!”
Wamgala ha Yesu. Kinyamkela viyamonile Yesu, bahaja kamgela kisango, kabwanhika hasi yobimbilika kuno holovu dimulawa mmulomo.
Yesu kamuuza tata wa imwana ija, “Kitamu kino kimsonga mazua gaki?” Na heyo kamwidika, “Songela udodo wake.
Mianza bwando kinyamkela kalonda kumkoma mkumulagazila hamoto na mmazi. Kamba vihadahika, utonele bazi na ututaze!”
Yesu kalonga, “Vihadahika! Gose godahika mwa imunhu yali na nhamanila.”
Hima tata wa imwana kenula dizwi yolonga, “Notogola, nhaza niuhume ubezi wa nhamanila unilinayo!”
Yesu viyonile dale da wanhu dowakwenhukila, avo kamkomhokela ikinyamkela kalonga, “Gweye kinyamkela kinziwi na bubui, nokulongela umulawe mmhale ino na sambiumwingile kabili!”
Kinyamkela kaguta lwangi, abaho, kamgela kisango na kumulawa. Mmhale iyo koneka konga munhu yadanganhike, na wanhu wose walonga, “Kadanganhika!”
Ila Yesu kamgoga mkono na kamtaza kwinuka, na heyo kema wima.
Yesu viyengile mng'anda, wanahina zake wamuuza kinyele, “Habali tweye hatudahile kumuwinga kinyamkela ija?”
Yesu kawedika, “Kinyamkela kamba ino kodaha kulawa kubitila nhambiko iiyeka, haduhu nzila iyagwe.”
Yesu na wanahina zake wasegela hanhu haja wagendelela na mwanza wobitila muisi ya Galilaya. Yesu halondile munhu yoyose yavitange hanhu hayali,
kwavija kakala yowafundiza wanahina zake, yowalongela, “Nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nogeligwa mmakono ga awo wondawanikome. Ila gahabita mazua madatu nozuka nowa mgima.”
Wanahina zake hawavitangile nhegulo ya fundo dino, na wadumba kumuuza.
Wavika Kapenaumu, viwengile mng'anda Yesu kawauza wanahina zake, “Mkala mkiibamilila choni mnzila?”
Ila hawamwidike, kwavija mnzila wakala wokiibamilila wenyego kwa wenyego yalihi yali mkulu.
Yesu kakala hasi, kawakema wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili, kawalongela, “Munhu yahalonda kuwa wa mwanduso kolondigwa yaibweze mwenyego hachugu cha wanhu wose na yawe mtumigwa wa wose.”
Abaho, kamsola mwana, kamwimiza haulongozi wao. Kamkumbatila, abaho, kawalongela,
“Munhu yoyose yom'bokela imwe wa wana wano wadodo mtwaga jangu konibokela nie, na munhu yoyose yonibokela nie hanibokela nie niiyeka ila kom'bokela ayo yanhumile.”
Yohana kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, tumona munhu yowinga vinyamkela na twaga jako, tumgomesa, kwavija halawa mdidale jetu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Sambimumgomese, kwavija haduhu munhu yotenda mzonza mtwaga jangu, abaho, yanonge vihile.
Munhu yoyose yalekile kuihasanya na tweye ka hamoja na tweye.
Nowalongela ikweli, kamba munhu yoyose yahawagwelela mweye kikasi cha mazi ga kung'wa, kwavija mweye mwa wanhu wa Kilisto, kobokela maliho gake.
“Munhu yoyose yondayamtende imwe wa wanhu wano wadodo yasegeze nhamanila yake kumwangu, vihanogile munhu ija yafungigwe msingo dibwe kulu da kusiginhila na kwasigwa m'bahali.
Avo kamba mkono wako wokutenda gweye utenda vilozo, ukanhe! Vinoga kumwako kwingila muugima kuno ulibule mkono, kubanza kuwa na makono gose mabili, abaho, wasigwe kuzimu,
ako ‘kuna iwamhembele hawafaga wondawawaje, na moto haufaga wondauwalukuze.’
Na kamba mgulu wako wokutenda gweye utende vilozo, ukanhe! Vinoga kumwako kwingila muugima kuno ulibule mgulu, kubanza kuwa na magulu gose mabili, abaho, wasigwe kuzimu,
ako ‘kuna iwamhembele hawafaga wondawawaje, na moto haufaga wondauwalukuze.’
Na kamba siso jako dokutenda gweye utende vilozo, dilave! Vinoga kumwako kwingila Muundewa wa Mulungu na siso dimwe, kubanza kuwa na meso gose mabili, abaho, wasigwe kuzimu,
ako ‘kuna iwamhembele hawafaga wondawawaje, na moto haufaga wondauwalukuze.’
“Kila munhu kong'alizwa na moto kamba vija nhosa viing'alizwa na munyu.
“Munyu unoga, ila uhagiza kilandu chake, kodahaze kuutenda unoge kabili? “Muwe kamba munyu, mkale mditindiwalo wenyego kwa wenyego.”
Yesu kahalawa hanhu haja, kachola muisi ya Yudea na kuloka mwambu wa ikabili wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani. Dale da wanhu bwando dimcholela kabili, na heyo kawafundiza kamba viyatendaga.
Mafalisayo wamcholela na wageza kumwikila vitega wamulongela, “Tulongele, Malagizo getu gomtogoza munhu kumwasa mtwanzi wake?”
Yesu kawedika, kuwauza, “Musa kawalagiza choni?”
Wamwidika wamulongela, “Musa katogoza munhu yamwandikile lupwilili lwa nyasa mtwanzi wake, abaho, yamwase.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Sama ya udala wa mioyo yenu Musa kawandikila ndagizi ino.
Ila songela haichanduso, ‘Mulungu viyasongile kulumba, kalumba mtwanzi na mbigalo.’
‘Mkilamso kino mbigalo kowaleka tataake na mamaake na kuilumba na mwehe wake,
na wabili wano wowa lukuli lumwe.’ Avo si wabili tena ila lukuli lumwe.
Avo kiyalumbile hamoja Mulungu, munhu sambiyakimamazule.”
Viwengile mng'anda mwanza wa ikabili, wanahina zake wamuuza Yesu mbuli ija.
Yesu kawalongela, “Munhu yoyose yomwasa mtwanzi wake na kusola mtwanzi iyagwe, komtendela ugoni mtwanzi wake.
Vivija mtwanzi yomwasa mbigalo wake na kusoligwa na mbigalo iyagwe, kotenda ugoni.”
Wanhu wamgalila Yesu wana wadodo yawekile makono gake, ila wanahina zake wawakomhokela.
Yesu viyawawene, kona lusango kawalongela, “Walekeni wana wadodo weze kumwangu, sambimuwagomese kwavija Undewa wa Mulungu wa sama ya wanhu kamba wano.
Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yondayaleke kuubokela Undewa wa Mulungu kamba mwana mdodo hengila himo.”
Abaho, kawakumbatila waja iwana na makono gake, kawekila makono gake, na kuwamoteza.
Yesu viyagendelele na mwanza wake, munhu imwe kamkimbilila, kamfugamila mavindi haulongozi wake, kamuuza, “Mkulufunzi Unogile, nhendeze giladi niubokele ugima wa digunge?”
Yesu kamuuza, “Habali ung'hema nie ninogile? Haduhu munhu yanogile ila Mulungu yeiyeka.
Kuzitanga ndagizi. ‘Sambiukome, sambiutende ugoni, sambiwibe, sambiulave usindila wa uvwizi, sambium'vwizile munhu yoyose, wahishimile tataako na mamaako.’ ”
Munhu ija kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, higo gose nigatenda songela haudodo wangu.”
Yesu kamulola kamnogela, kamulongela, “Kuhungukilwa na kinhu kimwe. Genda ukaguze vinhu vose vuulinavo, abaho, zihela uwagwelele wakumbulu, avo kowa na ngama kuulanga, abaho, unikoleleze.”
Munhu ija viyahulike vija, kakunza kihanga kasegela kuno yokona giogio, kwavija kakala na mali bwando.
Yesu kazunguluka yowalola wanahina zake wose, kawalongela, “Vidala munhu mgoli kwingila muna Undewa wa Mulungu!”
Wanahina zake wasinhuka viwahulike mbuli zino, ila Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Wanangu, vidala kwingila muna Uundewa wa Mulungu!
Vibuha ngamia kubita mkizonzo cha shindano, kubanza mgoli kwingila Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Wanahina zake wakanganya ng'hani na kukiiuza wenyego kwa wenyego, “Munhu yalihi yondayadahe kukomboligwa?”
Yesu kawalola, kawalongela, “Mwa wanhu mbuli ino haidahika ila sio ha Mulungu, kwavija ha Mulungu vinhu vose vodahika.”
Abaho, Petulo kalonga, “Lola, tweye tuleka vinhu vose na kukukweleleza gweye.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yalekile ng'anda ama ndugu zake ama lumbu zake ama mamaake ama tataake ama wanage ama migunda sama yangu nie na sama ya Usenga Unogile,
kobokela mkipigiti kino mianza mia ya ng'anda, wandugu, walumbu, mama, wana, na migunda, na vivija mgayo, na mkipigiti kikwiza kobokela ugima wa digunge.
Ila wanhu bwando wali sambi haulongozi wowa kuchugu, na wanhu bwando wali sambi kuchugu wowa haulongozi.”
Yesu na wanahina zake wakala mnzila wokwela wochola Yelusalemu, Yesu kalongola haulongozi wao. Wanahina zake wakala wokanganya ng'hani, na wanhu wakalile womkweleleza hachugu wakala wodumba. Mwanza uyagwe viyawasolile wanahina zake kawagala hamgwazo na kuwalongela mbuli zondazimulawilile.
Kawalongela “Tegelezeni, tokwela tochola Yelusalemu ako nie, Mwana wa Munhu, kondanigeligwe mmakono ga wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Wonitagusa kudanganhika na kunigela mmakono ga wanhu hawali Wayahudi,
na hewo wonitendela mzihaka, wonitemela vizite, wonilanha mbalati na kunikoma, ila gahabita mazua madatu nozuka.”
Abaho Yakobo na Yohana, wanage Zebedayo, wamcholela Yesu wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, tolonda ututendele mbuli.”
Yesu kawauza, “Mbuli yaki?”
Wamwidika, “Tutogoze imwe yakale kumkono wako wa ukulume na iyagwe yakale kumkono wako wa ukumoso kuna iyenzi yako.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hammanyile kinhu chumpula. Modaha kuking'wela kikasi cha mgayo kinilondigwa kung'wela nie? Ama modaha kubatizigwa kamba vinilondigwa kubatizigwa nie?”
Wamulongela, “Todaha.” Yesu kawalongela, “Moking'wela kikasi cha mgayo kinilondigwa kuking'wela nie na mobatizigwa kamba vinilondigwa kubatizigwa.
Ila kusagula yalihi yakale kumkono wangu wa ukulume ama kumkono wangu wa ukumoso haili sang'hano yangu. Mulungu iyo yondayawagwelele awo watandiligwe ukazi uno.”
Wanahina wayagwe longo dimwe viwahulike mbuli zija, wawonela lusango Yakobo na Yohana.
Avo Yesu kawakema wose hamoja kawalongela, “M'vimanya waja wogesigwa kamba wandewa wa wanhu hawali Wayahudi wana udaho mwa wanhu zao, na wakulu zao wotenda vovose vowolonda.
Sambiiwe vino kumwenu. Kamba munhu imwe mdidale jenu yahalonda kuwa mkulu, kolondigwa yawe mtumigwa wa wayage,
na munhu imwe mdidale jenu yahalonda kuwa haulongozi, kolondigwa yawe nyakadala wa wose.
Kwavija hata nie, Mwana wa Munhu, sizile kusang'hanikiligwa, ila niza kusang'hanika na kulava ugima wangu giladi niwakombole wanhu bwando.”
Wavika kudiwambo dikemigwa Yeliko, Yesu viyakalile yolawa mkiwambo na wanahina zake na dale kulu da wanhu, kimbugumbugu imwe yakalile yopula vinhu yokemigwa Batimayo mwanage Timayo kakala yakalile hasi behi na inzila.
Viyahulike kamba Yesu wa Nazaleti kobita, kasonga kwinula dizwi yolonga, “Yesu! Mwana wa Daudi! Nyonela bazi!”
Wanhu bwando wamkomhokela na wamulongela yavudale. Ila kagendelela ng'hani kutoa nyangi, yolonga, “Mwana wa Daudi! Nyonela bazi!”
Yesu kema, kalonga, “Mkemeni.” Avo wamkema ija imunhu kimbugumbugu wamulongela, “Deng'helela! Inuka kokukema.”
Kajasa guo jake, kazumha kachola ha Yesu.
Yesu kamuuza, “Kolonda nikutendele choni?” Ija imunhu kamwidika, “Mkulufunzi, nolonda kulola.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda, nhamanila yako ikuhonya.” Bahaja kadaha kulola na kamkweleleza Yesu mnzila.
Viwavikile behi na wambo da Yelusalemu, wavika Betifage hana Ikigongo cha Mizaituni, behi na ikiwambo cha Betania. Yesu kawatuma wanahina zake wabili walongole haulongozi.
Kawalongela, “Gendeni hana ikiwambo kili haulongozi wenu. Muhavika, mom'vika mwana mhunda yafungigwe hanapapa munhu yoyose. Mfunguleni munigalile.
Na kamba munhu yahawauza habali motenda avo, mulongeleni Mndewa komulonda, na sambi baha kom'bweza.”
Avo wachola wam'vika mwana mhunda mulubuga, yafungigwe muna ulwivi lwa ng'anda imwe. Viwakalile womfungula,
wanhu wakalile wemile behi nawo wawauza, “Habali mumfungula imwana mhunda?”
Wawedika kamba Yesu viyawalongele, na hewo wawaleka wachole nayo.
Wamgala imwana mhunda ha Yesu, watandika vivalo vao mumgongo wake, na Yesu kakwela mumgongo wake.
Wanhu bwando wanzanza vivalo vao mnzila, wayagwe wakanha mitambi mmigunda waiyanzanza mnzila.
Wanhu walongole na wose wawawinzile kukisogo wasonga kwinula dizwi wolonga, “Yatogolwe Mulungu! Mulungu ummoteze ayo yokwiza mtwaga da Mndewa!
Mulungu uumoteze undewa ukwiza wa Mndewa Daudi, tata wetu! Yatogolwe Mulungu!”
Yesu kengila Yelusalemu, kachola na kwingila muna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kalola kila hanhu. Ila kwavija zua dikala diswile, kachola Betania na wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili.
Imitondo iyagwe, viwakalile wosegela kulawa Betania, Yesu kakala na nzala.
Kawona hatalitali m'biki ukemigwa mtini utimile mitepo, avo kachola kuulola siku kovika tini. Ila viyaukwenhukile, kavika mitepo yeka, kwavija haukalile msimu wa tini.
Yesu kaulongela uja umtini, “Haduhu munhu yoyose yondayaje tini kulawa kumwako milongo yose!” Na wanahina zake wamuhulika.
Viwavikile Yelusalemu, Yesu kachola Kung'anda ya Mulungu, kasonga kuwalava hanze wanhu wose wakalile wogula na kuguza. Kazihindula izimeza za wavunja hela na ivigoda va waguza njiwa,
na hamulekile munhu yoyose yapape kinhu chochose yakanhize muna idikonhi da Ng'anda ya Mulungu.
Abaho, kawafundiza, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, Mulungu kalonga, ‘Ng'anda yangu yokemigwa ng'anda ya nhambiko za isi zose.’ Ila mweye muigalula kuwa fiso da wabavi!”
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wahulika, avo wasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumkoma Yesu. Ila wamdumba kwavija dale jose da wanhu dikala dokanganya mafundo gake.
Viivikile ichungulo, Yesu na wanahina zake wasegela hakiwambo kija.
Imitondo iyagwe, viwakalile wobita mnzila, wawona umtini unyala kusongela kunhembeti mbaka mmizizi.
Petulo kakumbukila mbuli zija Yesu zayaulongele umtini, kamulongela Yesu, “Lola, mkulufunzi, uja umtini uwikile kinyulu uholola!”
Yesu kawedika, “Mtamanileni Mulungu.
Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yahakilongela kigongo kino, ‘Goboka ukalagalile m'bahali,’ bila kudungwadungwa mmoyo wake ila kotamanila gaja gayalongile, kotendeligwa.
Avo nowalongela, avija vumtambika na kupula kinhu kulawa ha Mulungu, tamanileni kamba m'bokela, na mogweleligwa kinhu chochose chumpula.
Na muhawa muna inhambiko, geleni kumgongo kinhu chochose chumuihasanye na munhu yoyose, avo Tata wenu wa kuulanga kovigela kumgongo vilozo venu vumtendile.”
Avo kamba hamuwagela waenu kumgongo, na Tata wenu havigela kumgongo vilozo venu vimtendile.
Wavika Yelusalemu mwanza uyagwe. Yesu viyakalile yotembela kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na iwakulu wamcholela,
wamuuza, “Kotenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi? Yalihi yakugwelela udaho wa kutenda mbuli zino?”
Yesu kawedika kawalongela, “Nowauza mbuli imwe na muhanidika, nowalongela notenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi.
Nilongeleni, Yohana kapata kwahi udaho wa kubatiza, kapata kulawa ha Mulungu ama ulawa ha wanhu?”
Wasonga kuibamilila wenyego kwa wenyego, “Tulongeze? Tuhalonga, ‘Ulawa ha Mulungu,’ kolonga, ‘Habali hamumtegeleze Yohana?’
Ila sambitulonge, ‘Ulawa ha wanhu.’ ” Wawadumba wanhu, kwavija wanhu wose watogola kamba Yohana kakala muhokozi.
Avo wamulongela Yesu, “Hatuvimanyile.” Yesu kawalongela, “Na nie siwalongela kamba notenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi.”
Abaho, Yesu kalonga nao mmahala, “Munhu imwe kakala na mgunda wa mizabibu, kauzengela konhi na kuhimba lwingila lwa kukamulila zabibu na kuzenga ulingo. Abaho, kawapangiza walimi, kachola isi ya kutali.
Kipigiti cha kuhuna zizabibu vikivikile, kamtuma nyakadala wake ha iwalimi yakamsolele fungu jake da izizabibu.
Iwalimi wamnwang'hula ija inyakadala, wamtoa, na wam'bweza bila kinhu.
Abaho, mwene mgunda kamulongela nyakadala iyagwe yachole ha iwalimi yakamsolele zabibu zake, waja iwalimi wamtoa mdipala na kumtendela mbuli za kumgela kinyala.
Mwene mgunda kamulagiza nyakadala iyagwe, na heyo wamkoma. Na kawalagiza nyakadala wayagwe bwando, wayagwe wawatoa na wayagwe wawakoma.
Munhu yasigale wa kumulagiza kakala mwanage mnogelwa ng'hani wa mwene mgunda. Avo hakimambukizo, kamulagiza mwanage ha iwalimi, kalonga, ‘Kwa vovose ino womuhishimila, kwavija mwanangu.’
Ila waja iwalimi wakiilongela, ‘Ino iyo mwana wa mwene mgunda. Haya izoni tumkome, na uhazi wake wowa wetu!’
Avo wamnwang'hula imwana wa mwene umgunda wamkoma na kumwasa hanze ya umgunda wa imizabibu.”
Yesu kauza, “Abaho, kotenda choni ija imunhu yali na umgunda? Kokwiza na kowakoma iwalimi waja na kuwagwelela walimi wayagwe.
Hamzisomile Nyandiko zino Zing'alile? ‘Dibwe dilemigwe na wazenzi digaluka kuwa dibwe da kutamanilwa ng'hani kubanza mabwe gose.
Mndewa iyo yatendile mbuli ino, nayo iwa mkanganyo mmeso getu!’ ”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wageza kumgoga Yesu, kwavija wavitanga kamba kalonga hala dino yowalonga hewo. Ila wakala wowadumba wanhu, avo wamuleka wachola na zao.
Mafalisayo na wanhu wa Helode walagizwa na wakulu wa Wayahudi ha Yesu wamwikile vitega mkumuuza.
Wamcholela wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, tuvitanga kamba gweye kolonga mbuli zili kweli, bila kudumba ngelegeza za wanhu. Humdumba munhu yoyose, ila kofundiza ikweli ya Mulungu mwa wanhu. Tulongele, totenda galemigwe na Malagizo getu vituliha kodi ha Kaisali?”
Ila Yesu kavitanga vitega vao kawalongela, “Habali mgeza kunikila vitega? Nigalileni ihela niilole.”
Wamgalila hela imwe, kawauza, “Kihanga na ditwaga dino va munhu yalihi?” Wamwidika, “Va Kaisali.”
Avo Yesu kawalongela, “Mulonga goya, avo ga Kaisali mgweleleni Kaisali, na ga Mulungu mgweleleni Mulungu.” Na hewo wakanganya ng'hani vija viyawedike.
Abaho, Masadukayo, awo wolonga kamba wanhu hawazuka kulawa mkudanganhika, wamcholela Yesu wamuuza,
“Mkulufunzi, Musa katwandikila, ‘Ihawa munhu kadanganhika na kuleka mtwanzi halelile nayo mwana, mkulu wake ama mdodo wake ija yadanganhike kolondigwa yamsole ija ikizuka, yamulelele wana indugu yake yadanganhike.’
Avo kukala na wanhu saba wambigalo wa mulango umwe, mkulu wao kasola mtwanzi, kadanganhika bila kulela nayo wana.
Abaho, waikabili kamsola ija imtwanzi, vivija kadanganhika bila kulela nayo wana. Na waikadatu gam'vika gagaja,
na wasigale wose saba, wanhu wose saba wamsola mtwanzi ija na wadanganhika bila kulela nayo wana. Hakimambukizo, ija imtwanzi na heyo kadanganhika.
Avo wanhu wose wadanganhike wahazuka wawe wagima muna idizua da kuzuka kwa wanhu wose, mtwanzi ija kowa mtwanzi wa munhu yalihi? Kwavija wanhu wose saba wakala wamsolile.”
Yesu kawedika, “Muhonyela ng'hani! Kwavija hamzimanyile Nyandiko Zing'alile ama mhiko za Mulungu.
Wanhu wadanganhike wahazuka hawasola ama kusoligwa, wowa kamba wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga.
Avo tuilole mbuli ya kuzuka kwa wanhu wadanganhike, hamsomile mkitabu cha Musa hanhu handikigwe kitutua kikwaka? Mulungu kalongaze? Kalonga, ‘Nie iyo Mulungu wa Ablaham, na Isaka, na Yakobo.’
Heyo si Mulungu wa wanhu wadanganhike ila Mulungu wa wanhu wagima. Mweye muhonyela ng'hani!”
Mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa yakalile haja, kahulika viwakalile wokiibamilila. Kona kamba Yesu kamsambulila vinogile, avo kamcholela na mbuza, kamuuza, “Ndagizi ilihi ili ng'hulu kubanza zose?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Ndagizi ili ng'hulu kubanza zose iyo ino. ‘Tegeleza Islaeli! Mndewa Mulungu wetu iyo Mndewa yeiyeka.
Mnogele Mndewa Mulungu wako na moyo wako wose, na loho yako yose, na nzonzi zako zose, na mhiko zako zose.’
Ndagizi ya ikabili iyo ino, ‘Mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe kamba vukiinogela mwenyego.’ Haduhu ndagizi ziyagwe zili ng'hulu kubanza zino mbili.”
Ija mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa kamulongela Yesu, “Mkulufunzi, kulonga goya! Kulonga ili kweli, vuulongile kamba Mndewa yeiyeka iyo Mulungu na haduhu mulungu iyagwe ila heyo.
Kumnogela Mulungu na moyo wako wose, na nzonzi zako zose, na mhiko zako zose, na mnogele munhu wa habehi nagwe kamba vukiinogela mwenyego, vinoga ng'hani kubanza kumulavila Mulungu nhosa zose za kulukuza na zija zili si za kulukuza.”
Yesu viyonile ija imunhu kalonga galawile mmoyo, kamulongela, “Huli kutali na Undewa wa Mulungu.” Kulawila haja haduhu munhu yamuuzile Yesu mbuli yoyose.
Yesu viyakalile yofundiza Kuing'anda ya Mulungu, kawauza, “Habali wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wolonga kamba Kilisto iyo mwana wa Daudi?
Daudi mwenyego kalongozigwa na Loho wa Mulungu, kalonga, ‘Mndewa kamulongela Mndewa wangu. Kala kumkono wangu wa ukulume mbaka vondaniweke wadumuka zako hasi ya magulu gako.’
“Daudi mwenyego komkema Kilisto ‘Mndewa.’ Avo kodahaze Kilisto kulawa mulukolo lwake?” Dale kulu da wanhu dikala dimtegeleza Yesu mkudeng'ha.
Viyakalile yofundiza kalonga, “Iteganyeni na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Wonogelwa kuzungulukazunguluka kuno wavalile mikanzu mitali na wonogelwa kulamsigwa na hishima mmasoko,
na kusagula vigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za nhambiko na hanhu hanogile kuna izisona.
Wowabulunya vizuka na kutenda nhambiko nhali za uzenzeleganye hameso ga wanhu. Nhaguso yao yowa ng'hulu ng'hani!”
Yesu kakala habehi na ikia cha kulavila nhosa, kakala yowalola wanhu volava hela zao muna ikia cha kulavila nhosa. Wanhu wagoli walava hela bwando,
abaho, keza kizuka mkumbulu kalava hela mbili ndodo ng'hani.
Yesu kawakema wanahina zake hamoja kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, kizuka ino mkumbulu kalava hela bwando kubanza wanhu wose.
Kwavija wayagwe walava vinhu viwabanzile, ila kizuka ino hamoja na ukumbulu wake, kalava vose vayalinavo.”
Yesu viyakalile yolawa Kuing'anda ya Mulungu, mwanahina wake imwe kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi! Lola mabwe gaja vigali makulu na zing'anda vuzinogile ng'hani!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Kuzona ng'anda zino ng'hulu? Haduhu dibwe hano dondadisigale hadili, gose gobomoligwa na kwasigwa hasi.”
Yesu kakala yakalile Hakigongo cha Mizaituni, kikalile kigongo kwa kigongo na Ing'anda ya Mulungu. Petulo, Yakobo, Yohana, na Endelea wamuuza kinyele,
“Tulongele, mbuli zino zolawila zua jaki? Na tulongele, choni chondakilawile kutulagusila kamba kipigiti kivika cha mbuli zino zose kulawilila?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Teganyeni, munhu yoyose sambiyawavwizile.
Wanhu bwando wokwiza mtwaga jangu, wolonga ‘Nie iyo Kilisto!’ na kuwavwizila wanhu bwando.
Muhahulika ng'hondo na singilimo za ng'hondo, sambimdumbe. Vinhu kamba avo volondigwa vilawile, ila ikimambukizo hakinavika.
Isi yogomba na isi iyagwe, na undewa wogomba na undewa uyagwe, kowa na mgudemo wa isi hanhu na hanhu na nzala. Gano gose gowa kamba usungu wa mwanduso wa kulela mwana.
“Teganyeni, kwavija mogogigwa na kugaligwa m'vitala, molanhigwa mzing'anda za nhambiko. Mogaligwa haulongozi wa iwakulu wa isi na wandewa sama yangu kamba usindila kumwao.
Na Usenga Unogile wolondigwa tanhu upetigwe muisi zose kipigiti king'hali ikimambukizo hakinavika.
Muhagogigwa na kugaligwa m'vitala, sambimgelegeze kija chondamulonge. Kipigiti kihavika, longeni gogose gondamgweleligwe. Kwavija mbuli zondamulonge haziwa zenu mweye, ila zolawa ha Loho wa Mulungu.
Ndugu komuhonza ndugu yake giladi yakomigwe, na tata komuhonza mwanage. Wana wowahonza watata na wamama zao na kuwatenda wadanganhike.
Wanhu wose wowehila mweye sama yangu, ila yondayananahile mbaka hakimambukizo kokomboligwa.
“Kipigiti chokwiza vondamone ‘Kinhu Kinyolodoke Kigala Ubananzi’ kima hanhu hakilondigwe kukala.” Munhu yosoma na yaitange nhegulo yake! Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Avo, awo wali Yudea wakimbilile m'vigongo.
Munhu yali mkiswili cha ng'anda yake sambiyahumuluke hasi ama yengile mng'anda yakasole kinhu chochose.
Yali kumgunda sambiyabwele ukae kusola kivalo chake.
Wogaya ng'hani watwanzi wali na inda na wokong'heza mmazua higo!
Tambikeni giladi Mulungu yazitende mbuli zino sambizilawile mkipigiti cha kihuhe!
Kwavija mgayo wa mazua higo wowa mkulu kubanza mgayo wowose woneke songela haichanduso Mulungu vayalumbile iisi mbaka vino. Na haulawila mgayo kamba hiwo milongo yose ikwiza.
Kamba Mndewa yahalekile kugahunguza mazua higo, haduhu munhu yahahonile. Ila sama ya awo wamnogele Mulungu, awo yaawasagule, kagahunguza mazua higo.
“Abaho, kamba munhu yoyose yahawalongela, ‘Lola, Kilisto kahano!’ ama ‘Kakuja!’ sambimumtegeleze.
Kwavija wolawila makilisto wa uvwizi na wahokozi wa uvwizi. Wotenda vilaguso na mikanganyo giladi vihadahika wawakonge hata wanhu wasaguligwe na Mulungu.
Teganyeni! Niwalongela mbuli zose kipigiti king'hali hakinavika.
“Avo muna gamazua higo kipigiti cha mgayo vondakimale, zua doziziwala, mulenge haulava mulangaza wake,
nhondo zolagala kulawa kuulanga, na mhiko za kuulanga zokwekwesigwa kulawa hazikalile.
Abaho, wonyona nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nikwiza na mawingu na mhiko na yenzi ng'hulu.
Abaho, nowatuma wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kuna zing'ambu nne za ulumwengu wawaduganye wanhu wasaguligwe na Mulungu kulawa ng'ambu imwe ya ulumwengu mbaka ng'ambu iyagwe ya ulumwengu.
“Muifundize mum'biki wa mtini. Matambi gake gahasonga udeke wa kuzuka na kulava matepo, movitanga kamba vuli da mmabehi.
Vivija na mweye, muhazona mbuli zino zolawila, m'vitange kamba mbuli zino za mmabehi kusonga.
Nowalongela ikweli, mbuli zino zose zolawilila ing'hali wanhu wa mulelo uno hawanadanganhika.
Ulanga na isi vose vobita, ila mbuli zangu hazibita.
“Kwa vovose haduhu munhu yoitanga saa ama zua dilihi mbuli zino vondazilawile, sio wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga ama nie, Mwana, ila Tata yeiyeka iyo yoitanga.
Goneleleni na teganyeni, kwavija ham'vitanga kipigiti kilihi mbuli zino vondazilawile.
Volinga kamba munhu yawagwelele nyakadala zake kila munhu na sang'hano yake ya kutenda na kumulongela mwimiliza ulwivi yagonelele, abaho, kachola mwanza na kuwaleka nyakadala zake wosang'hanika.
Avo goneleleni kwavija hamkimanyile kipigiti mwene ng'anda vondayeze, siku ichungulo ama ikilo kikulu ama nzogolo zikwika ama imitondo.
Ihawa yeheza mkuwasinhukiza, sambiyawavike muwasile.
Avo kinilonda kuwagong'ondeza, nowalongela wose kamba, goneleleni!”
Gakala gasigale mazua mabili kuvikila Pasaka na Lusona lwa Imikate Ilibule Mela. Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala wozahila nzila ya kumgoga Yesu kinyele wamkome.
Walonga, “Sambitutende gano mkipigiti cha ulusona, ama wanhu wosongeza mzahimzahi.”
Yesu viyakalile Betania, yoja hameza mng'anda ya munhu imwe yokemigwa Simoni yakalile na utamu wa dikulu, mtwanzi imwe keza na nyhupa ya alabasta ili na mavuta ga kunung'hila ga hela bwando, gatendigwe na nado inogile. Kaifungula inyhupa na kumwitila Yesu gamavuta mmwiti.
Wanhu wayagwe wakalile haja wehilwa, wailongela, “Habali mavuta gano ga kunung'hila gobanangwa kamba vino?
Gahaguzigwe zihapatikane hela zidaha kuliha kitumetume cha mulao umwe, na zihela wahagweleligwe wakumbulu!” Wamkomhokela ng'hani mtwanzi ija.
Ila Yesu kawalongela, “Mulekeni, habali mumgaza? Kanhendela kinhu kinogile ng'hani.
Wakumbulu mokala nao mazua gose, na muhalonda kuwagwelela vinhu kipigiti chochose mowagwelela. Ila nie sikala na mweye mazua gose.
Katenda chayadahile, kalubaka mavuta lukuli lwangu kulutanda na mazisi mazua ga hamwande.
Nowalongela ikweli, kila hanhu hondaupetigwe Usenga Unogile muulumwengu wose, kino chayatendile mtwanzi ino cholongwa mkumkumbukila heyo.”
Abaho, Yuda Isikalioti, imwe wa wanahina longo dimwe na wabili, kachola ha wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko giladi yamuhonze Yesu kumwao.
Wadeng'helela ng'hani viwahulike gaja gayalongile, wailagana kumgwelela hela. Avo kasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumgela mmakono gao.
Muna dizua da mwanduso wa Ulusona lwa Imikate Ilibule Mela, idizua ajo wana ng'hondolo wa Pasaka vowochinjigwa, wanahina zake wamuuza, “Kwahi kuulonda tuchole tukakutandile mandia ga Pasaka?”
Yesu kawalagiza wanahina zake wabili kawalongela, “Gendeni mkiwambo, mom'vika mbigalo yapapile nongo ya mazi. Mkwelelezeni
mbaka hana ing'anda yondayengile, mulongeleni mwene ng'anda, ‘Mkulufunzi kouza, Dakwahi digati da wahenza kondanidile mandia ga Pasaka na wanahina zangu?’
Kowalagusila gati kulu da uchana, difagiligwe na kuhambigwa. Tutandileni mandia himo.”
Wanahina walawa, wachola hakiwambo, wavika kila kinhu kamba viyawalongele. Avo wagatanda gamandia ga Pasaka.
Viivikile ichungulo, Yesu keza na wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili.
Viwakalile hameza woja, Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, munhu imwe mmwanza wenu yoja hamoja na nie, konihonza.”
Wanahina wona giogio, na wasonga kumuuza imweimwe, “Nie, Mndewa?”
Kawalongela, “Imwe mmwanza wenu mweye longo dimwe na wabili yozanhika mkate mkia hamoja na nie.
Nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nodanganhika kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzimulonga, ila kogaya ng'hani munhu ija yondayanihonze nie, Mwana wa Munhu! Vihanogile munhu ija sambiyaleligwe!”
Viwakalile woja, Yesu kasola mkate, kalonga hewela ha Mulungu, kaumogola kawagwelela wanahina zake, kawalongela, “Usoleni, uno uwo lukuli lwangu.”
Abaho, kasola kikasi, kalonga hewela ha Mulungu, abaho, kawagwelela wanahina zake, na wose wang'wa.
Kawalongela, “Uno uwo mulopa wangu wa lagano witika sama ya wanhu bwando.
Nowalongela ikweli, sing'wa kabili mulelo uno wa zabibu mbaka zua dija vondaniung'we wa sambi muna Undewa wa Mulungu.”
Viwamambukize kwimba wila, wachola kuna Ikigongo cha Mizaituni.
Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Mweye mose, mong'himbila na kundeka, kamba Zinyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga, ‘Nomtoa imchunga, na iwang'hondolo wopwililika.’
Ila nihazuka kulawa mkudanganhika, nowalongola nochola Galilaya.”
Petulo kamulongela, “Kamba wose wahakuleka ila nie sikuleka!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela ikweli, ikilo ya lelo, nzogolo hanakwika mianza mibili, konibela mianza midatu.”
Ila Petulo kagangamiza yolonga, “Hata kamba nihadanganhika hamoja na gweye, nidanganhike, ila nie sidaha kukubela gweye!” Na wanahina wose wasigale walonga vivo.
Wavika hanhu hakemigwe Getisemane, Yesu kalonga na wanahina zake, “Kaleni hano, nitambike.”
Kawasola Petulo, Yakobo, na Yohana na heyo mwenyego. Kasonga kudungwadungwa na kugaya mmoyo,
kawalongela, “Moyo wangu una giogio ng'hani behi na kudanganhika, kaleni hano mgonelele.”
Kachola hamwande kidogo, kafugama mavindi, katambika kalonga, vihadahika sambiyabitile muna ikipigiti cha mgayo.
Katambika yolonga, “Tataangu! Gose godahika kumwako. Nisegezele kikasi kino cha mgayo. Ila sio kamba vinilonda nie, ila kamba vuulonda gweye.”
Abaho, kabwela ha wanahina zake kawavika wawasile. Kamulongela Petulo, “Simoni, kuwasa? Hudahile kugonelela hata saa dimwe?”
Kawalongela, “Goneleleni, na mtambike giladi sambimwingile mkugezigwa. Kwavija loho yolonda, ila lukuli lutepweta.”
Kachola mwanza uyagwe, katambika yolonga mbuli zizija.
Viyabwelile kawavika wawasile kabili, kwavija meso gao gakala gamemile utulo. Wakala wabule da kumulongela.
Viyawabwelele mwanza wa ikadatu, kawalongela, “Mng'hali wasa na kuhumula? Yotosha! Kwavija kipigiti kivika! Lola, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nohonzigwa, mkugeligwa mmakono ga wanhu wali na vilozo.
Lamukeni tuchole. Lola, munhu yonihonza ka mmabehi!”
Yesu viyakalile yogendelela kulonga, Yuda, imwe wa waja wanahina longo dimwe na wabili, kavika. Keza na dale da wanhu wapapile mizele na mimbwego, wakala watumigwe na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, na wakulu.
Ija imunhu yamuhonzile kakala yawagwelele kilaguso kawalongela, “Munhu yondanimnonele iyo immulonda. Mgogeni mumsole mchole nayo kuno mmwimiliza ng'hani.”
Yuda viyavikile, hima kachola ha Yesu na kulonga, “Mkulufunzi!” Abaho, kamnonela.
Avo wagolosa makono gao na kumgoga.
Ila munhu imwe yakalile yemile hamoja na Yesu, kasomola zele jake na kumuyenza nyakadala wa Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko na kumkanha gwiti jake.
Yesu kawauza, “Mwiza na mizele na mimbwego kunigoga nie kamba vija nie na m'bavi?
Mazua gose nikala hamoja na mweye nifundiza kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, hamunigogile. Ila Nyandiko Zing'alile zolondigwa zivikile kamba vuzandikigwe.”
Abaho, wanahina zake wose wamuleka, wakimbila.
Mmhale imwe yakalile yavalile guo da kuigubika kakala yomkweleleza Yesu. Wageza kumgoga,
ila kadileka idiguo da kuigubika kuchugu na kukimbila mwazi.
Abaho, wamsola Yesu na kumgala ha Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko, na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, na iwakulu na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, wose waiting'hanila.
Petulo kamkoleleza Yesu kutalitali mbaka kengila mdikonhi da ing'anda ya Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko. Kakala hasi hamoja na wemilizi, yokota moto.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na Ikitala chose Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi wageza kuzahila mbuli ya kumgela m'vilozo Yesu giladi wamkome, ila hawapatile.
Wanhu bwando walava usindila wa uvwizi, ila usindila wao hauiduganye.
Abaho, wanhu wenuka na kumulonga Yesu mbuli za uvwizi, walonga,
“Tumuhulika yolonga, ‘Noibomola Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu izengigwe na wanhu. Na gahabita mazua madatu noizenga iyagwe ayo haizengigwe na wanhu.’ ”
Vivija usindila wao hauiduganye.
Abaho, Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kenuka haulongozi wao wose kamuuza Yesu, “Kwabule cha kwidika mnhaguso zino zose zowokutagusa?”
Ila Yesu kanyamala na halongile chochose. Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kamuuza Yesu mwanza uyagwe, “Gweye iyo Kilisto, Mwana wa Mulungu Mwene Yenzi?”
Yesu kalonga, “Iyo nene. Na monyona nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nikalile ng'ambu ya ukulume ya Ukulu, nikwiza na mawingu ga kuulanga!”
Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko kasinhuka, kadega guo jake, kalonga, “Hatulonda wasindila wayagwe!
Muuhulika ufukuzi wake! Mweye molongaze?” Wose walamula walonga, “Kaloza, kolondigwa yakomigwe.”
Wanhu wayagwe wasonga kumtemela mate, wamgubika ikihanga, abaho, wamtoa, walonga, “Zuza, yalihi yakutoile!” Na wemilizi wamsola wamtoa makofi.
Petulo viyakalile yakalile hasi mdikonhi, mtwanzi imwe mtumigwa wa Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko keza behi nayo.
Viyamuwene Petulo yokota moto, kamulola ng'hani, abaho, kamulongela, “Gweye nagwe kukala hamoja na Yesu wa Nazaleti?”
Ila Petulo kabela, kamulongela, “Sikimanya, ama sikitanga chuulonga.” Abaho, kalawa kunze mkubitila mulwivi lwa haulongozi, kipigiti kikija nzogolo keka.
Ija imtumigwa wa kitwanzi kamona Petulo mwanza uyagwe, kasonga kubwelela kulonga mbuli iija ha wanhu wemile behi nayo, “Ino ka mmwanza wao!”
Ila Petulo kabela mwanza uyagwe. Kipigiti kidodo hamwande, wanhu wakalile wemile behi wamulongela Petulo mwanza uyagwe, “Sambiubele, gweye kwa mmwanza wao, kwavija na gweye kwa Mgalilaya.”
Kasonga kudukumiza na kuiduila, “Simtangile munhu ino yummulonga mbuli zake!”
Abaho, bahaja nzogolo keka mwanza uyagwe, abaho, Petulo kakumbukila avija vayamulongele Yesu, “Nzogolo hanakwika mianza mibili, konibela mianza midatu.” Kabemendeka kakala hasi kasonga kulila.
Ulukwili, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko waiting'hana hima na iwakulu, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, na Ikitala chose Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi, na kugelegeza vondawatende. Wamdaza Yesu minyolo, wamgala na kumgwelela Pilato.
Pilato kamuuza, “Gweye iyo Mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Gweye iyo ulonga avo.”
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wamtagusa Yesu vinhu bwando,
avo, Pilato kamuuza mwanza uyagwe, “Hulonda kwidika? Tegeleza mbuli zao zose zowokutagusa!”
Mwanza uyagwe Yesu halongile mbuli, na Pilato kakanganya.
Kila Lusona lwa Pasaka Pilato kakala yazoele kumfungulila mfungigwa imwe, ija wanhu iwamulondile.
Kipigiti kija munhu yakemigwe Balaba kakala mkifungo sama ya kuwadulukila wanhu wa silikali, na kukoma mkipigiti cha umzahimzahi wa kuilema silikali.
Dale da wanhu dimwizila Pilato, wasonga kumuuza yawatendele kamba viyawatendelaga.
Kawauza, “Molonda niwalekesele Mndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Kwavija heyo kavitanga kamba, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wakala wamgalile Yesu kumwake sama ya migongo.
Ila wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wawaswagiza didale da wanhu dimulongele Pilato yawafungulile Balaba.
Pilato kalonga mwanza uyagwe, “Molonda nimtende choni munhu ino imumkema Mndewa wa Wayahudi?”
Watoa nyangi walonga, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
Pilato kauza, “Ila choni chayatendile munhu ino?” Wose wongeza kutoa nyangi, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
Pilato kalonda yawanogeze ididale da wanhu, avo, kawalekesela Balaba. Abaho, kalagiza Yesu yalanhigwe abaho kamgela mmakono ga asikali wakamuwambe mumsalaba.
Asikali wamsola Yesu wamwingiza mdikonhi da iding'anda da kindewa na kuwakema hamoja asikali wasigale.
Wam'vaza Yesu guo da zambalau, waluka mkungo wa mizomola, wam'vaza mditwi jake.
Abaho, wasonga kumulamsa mumzihaka, “Kwa mpile, Mndewa wa Wayahudi!”
Wamtoatoa na ludete mditwi, wamtemela mate, wamfugamila mavindi na kumwinamila.
Viwamambukize kumtendela uponela, wam'vula idiguo da zambalau, abaho, wam'vaza vivalo vake. Abaho, wamulava hanze ya idiwambo wakamuwambe mumsalaba.
Munhu imwe kulawa isi ya Kilene yokemigwa Simoni, tata wa Alekizanda na Lufo, kakala yokwingila mdiwambo kulawa kumigunda, asikali wamshulutiza yaupape msalaba wa Yesu.
Wamsola Yesu wamgala hanhu hakemigwe Goligota, nhegulo yake, “Hanhu ha Fulu da Pala.”
Wageza kumgwelela divai igeligwe manemane, ila Yesu haing'wile.
Abaho, wamuwamba mumsalaba na kuigolela vivalo vake wenyego kwa wenyego, watoa kula walamule yalihi yapate kivalo kilihi.
Ikala saa ndatu ya imitondo viwamuwambile mumsalaba.
Lupwilili lwa nhaguso yake lwandikigwa vino, “mndewa wa wayahudi.”
Na vivija wabavi wabili wawawamba mumsalaba hamoja na Yesu, imwe ng'ambu yake ya ukulume na iyagwe ng'ambu yake ya ukumoso.
Na Nyandiko Zing'alile zolonga, “Kapetigwa hamoja na watenda gehile,” zivikila.
Wanhu wabitile behi na haja wamwasila maligo watigisa mapala gao na kulonga, “Aha! Gweye ulondile kuibananga Ng'anda ya Mulungu na kuizenga mmazua madatu,
uikombole mwenyego, uhumuluke mumsalaba!”
Vivija wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamtendela uponela, wenyego kwa wenyego wolonga, “Kawakombola wayagwe, ila hadahile kukiikombola mwenyego!
Tumulole Kilisto Mkombola, Mndewa wa Islaeli, yahumuluke kulawa mumsalaba, na tweye tumtogole!” Vivija na waja wabili wawambigwe hamoja nayo wamuliga Yesu.
Viivikile saa sita imisi, isi yose ikala igubikwe na ziza mbaka saa tisa ichungulo.
Viivikile saa tisa, Yesu kenula dizwi kalila yolonga, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” nhegulo yake “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, habali undekile?”
Wanhu wakalile behi wahulika mbuli zija, walonga, “Tegeleza, komkema Eliya!”
Munhu imwe kakimbila, kazabika siponji mdivai igwaduke kaika kuisota ya lumango, na kumgwelela Yesu yang'we, yolonga, “Beta tulole kamba Eliya kokwiza kumuhumulusa kulawa mumsalaba!”
Yesu kenula dizwi kaguta ng'hani, abaho, kadanganhika.
Guo ditungikwe Mng'anda ya Mulungu didegeka vidanga vibili, kulawa uchana mbaka hasi.
Mkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma yakalile yemile haja haulongozi wa Yesu, kahulika avija viyakalile yolila na kumona vija viyodanganhika, kalonga, “Kweli munhu ino kakala Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Kukala na watwanzi wolola kutalitali. Mmwanza wao wakala Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala, Salome, Maliamu mamaake Usufu na Yakobo mdodo.
Watwanzi wano wakala womkweleleza Yesu na kumsang'hanikila viyakalile Galilaya. Vivija watwanzi bwando wayagwe wakalile wokwela hamoja na heyo kwiza Yelusalemu, wakala bahaja.
Dikala disigale zua dimwe kuvikila Zua da Mhumulo ajo dikemigwa zua da msasalo. Avo ichungulo vuikwenhuke,
Usufu kulawa mdiwambo da Alimataya, yakalile imwe wa wanhu wa Ikitala Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi, yakalile yobeta kwiza kwa Undewa wa Mulungu, bila kudumba kachola ha Pilato kulupula lukuli lwa Yesu.
Pilato kakanganya kuhulika kamba Yesu kesha kudanganhika. Kamkema mkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma, kamuuza kamba Yesu kadanganhika kamala.
Viyahulike kulawa ha ija imkulu wa asikali mia wa Loma kamba Yesu kadanganhika, Pilato kamulongela Usufu yakalusole ulukuli.
Abaho, Usufu kagula sanda, kaluhumulusa ulukuli, kaluzingiliza sanda na kulutambalika mdipanga dipukigwe mdibwe, abaho, kadibimbilisa dibwe kadika hamulomo wa idipanga.
Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala na Maliamu mamaake Usufu wahona halwikigwe lukuli lwa Yesu.
Vidibitile Zua da Mhumulo, Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala, Salome, na Maliamu mamaake Yakobo wagula mavuta ga kunung'hila giladi wakalubake lukuli lwa Yesu.
Ndamuka ya zua da mwanduso wa wiki, zua vudisongile kusimbuka, wachola kudipanga.
Wakala wokiilongela wenyego kwa wenyego, “Yalihi yondayatubimbilisile idibwe hana umulomo wa idipanga?”
Ila viwalolile uchana, wajona dija idibwe dikalile kulu ng'hani dibimbilisigwa kumgwazo.
Viwakalile wokwingila mdipanga, wamona mmhale imwe yavalile ng'hanzu nzelu yakalile kumkono wa ukulume wa idipanga, wasinhuka.
Ila kawalongela, “Sambimsinhuke, novimanya kamba momzahila Yesu wa Nazaleti, yawambwigwe mumsalaba. Kahaduhu hano, kazuka! Loleni, hanhu hawamtambalike.
Ila gendeni mkawalongele wanahina zake na Petulo, ‘Kowalongola kuchola Galilaya, ako momona kamba viyawalongele.’ ”
Wahalawa na kukimbila kulawa mdipanga, kwavija wagogigwa na bwembwe na mkanganyo, na hawamulongele munhu yoyose, kwavija wona bwembwe.
Yesu viyazukile kulawa mkudanganhika mdizua da mwanduso wa wiki, kasonga kumulawilila Maliamu wa kiwambo cha Magidala ayo yakalile na vinyamkela saba wawingigwe.
Maliamu kachola kuwalongela waja wakalile hamoja na heyo, viwakalile wokiiyalala na kulila.
Ila viwahulike kamba Yesu mgima na heyo mwenyego kamona, hawatogole.
Vuzibitile mbuli zino, Yesu koneka mwa wanhu wabili wakalile wamtogole kuno yagaluke ikihanga, wakalile mnzila wolawa mkiwambo wochola kumigunda.
Wabwela na kuwalongela wayao, ila hawawatogole.
Hakimambukizo, Yesu kawalawilila wanahina longo dimwe na imwe viwakalile woja. Kawakomhokela, kwavija viwakalile bule nhamanila na vija viwakalile wadala mmioyo yao, kwavija hawawatogole waja wamonile kipigiti viyazukile kulawa mkudanganhika.
Kawalongela, “Gendeni muulumwengu wose mkaupete Usenga Unogile ha wanhu wose.
Munhu yoyose yondayatogole na kubatizigwa kokomboligwa, ila munhu yoyose yoleka kutogola kotagusigwa.
Na vilaguso vino vokwandakana na awo wondawatogole. Mtwaga jangu wowinga vinyamkela, na wolonga ulonzi wa mkanganyo.
Wogoga nyoka na makono gao, na kamba wahang'wa kinhu chochose cha kukoma, hakiwagaza. Wokwika makono gao mwa watamu, na wohona.”
Viyeshile kulonga nao, Mndewa Yesu kasoligwa uchana kuulanga kakala kumkono wa ukulume wa Mulungu.
Wanahina wachola kuupeta Usenga Unogile kila hanhu, na Mndewa kasang'hanika nao na kuzigangamiza mbuli zake na vilaguso vandakane nazo.
Mkulu Teofilo, wanhu bwando waiyoha kwandika mumnhongo mbuli zija zivikizwe mmwetu.
Wandika kamba vija vuzikalile zisimulilwa na waja wazonile na meso gao songela haichanduso, awo wakalile wozipeta.
Avo na nie, Mkulu, avija vunizilolile goya mbuli zino zose songela ichanduso chake, nivigesa vinoga nikwandikile vinogile.
Notenda vino giladi na gweye uitange ikweli ya mbuli zija zuufundizigwe.
Kipigiti Helode Mkulu vayakalile mndewa wa Yudea, kukala na mkulu wa nhambiko imwe twaga jake Zakalia, yakalile wa dale da watambika dikemigwa Abiya. Mtwanzi wake kakala yokemigwa Elizabeti, na heyo kakala wa lukolo lwa mtambika Haloni.
Wose wabili wakala womnogela Mulungu na wawinza ndagizi zose za Mndewa bila kusigaza.
Zakalia na Elizabeti wakala wabule wana, kwavija Elizabeti kakala bule sambo, na hewo wose wabili wakala wavyele ng'hani.
Zua dimwe Zakalia kakala yosang'hana sang'hano za watambika Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kwavija dale jake da watambika dikala mzamu.
Kamba viwazoele kutenda watambika, kula imgwila Zakalia yachole kufusha ubane kuna ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa. Avo kengila Mng'anda ya Mndewa,
wanhu wose wakala wakiilundize hanze wotambika kipigiti hicho cha kufusha ubane.
Msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kamulawilila, kema ng'ambu ya ukulume ya ikilingo cha kufushila ubane.
Zakalia viyamuwene, kasinhuka, bwembwe dimwingila.
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kamulongela, “Zakalia, sambiudumbe kwavija Mulungu kazihulika nhambiko zako, avo Elizabeti mtwanzi wako kokulelela mwana mbigalo, na gweye umgwelele twaga dikemigwa Yohana.
Kosekelela na kudeng'ha ng'hani, na wanhu bwando woitoela ng'henze mvumbuka yake!
Kowa mkulu hameso ga Mndewa. Hang'wa ugimbi ama kinhu chochose cha kukola. Komemezigwa Loho wa Mulungu songela mmunda mwa mamaake.
Kowabweza wanhu bwando wa Islaeli kuli Mndewa Mulungu wao.
Kochola haulongozi wa Mndewa na mhiko na loho ya Eliya, kowaduganyiza tena watata na wana zao, kowatenda wanhu wadulu wawe wende avo yamtandile Mndewa wanhu zake.”
Zakalia kamuuza msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga, “Novitangaze kamba mbuli zino zowa avo? Kwavija nie na mtwanzi wangu tose twa wavyele.”
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kamwidika, “Nie iyo Gabulieli, mtumigwa nimaga haulongozi wa Mulungu, nitumigwa nikugalile usenga uno unogile.
Ila kwavija huzitogole mbuli zangu zondazivikile mumsimu wake, kowa bubui, hudaha kulonga mbaka zua dija gano gose ganikulongele vondagalawilile.”
Kipigiti hicho wanhu wakala wom'beta Zakalia kuno wokanganya habali kokawa muja Mng'anda ya Mulungu.
Viyalawile hanze, kakala hadaha kulonga nao, avo wavitanga kamba kakala yonile nzozi Mng'anda ya Mulungu. Kakala hadaha kulonga, kakala yolonga mkulagusa na makono.
Kipigiti chake cha kusang'hanika Muing'anda ya Mulungu vukimalile, kabwela ukae.
Mkipigiti kiguhi mtwanzi wake kapata inda, avo kakala hakae yake milenge mitano.
Kalonga, “Hakimambukizo, Mndewa kanyonela bazi, kanisegezela kinyala changu mwa wanhu.”
Muna umulenge wa sita wa inda ya Elizabeti, Mulungu kamulagiza msenga wake wa kuulanga, yokemigwa Gabulieli, hakiwambo cha Galilaya, kikemigwa Nazaleti.
Kakala na usenga wa mndele imwe mhambe, mkasano wa munhu imwe twaga jake Usufu kulawa mulukolo lwa Mndewa Daudi. Twaga jake Maliamu.
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kamcholela kamulongela, “Nokulamsa! Mndewa ka hamoja nagwe na kakumoteza ng'hani!”
Maliamu kazanywa ng'hani sama ya mbuli zija za msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga na kugelegeza choni nhegulo ya mbuli zija.
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kamulongela, “Sambiudumbe, Maliamu, kwavija Mulungu kanogelwa nagwe.
Kopata inda, komulela mwana mbigalo, na gweye kolondigwa umgwelele twaga dikemigwa Yesu.
Heyo kowa mkulu na kokemigwa Mwana wa Mulungu Mkulu Ng'hani. Mndewa Mulungu komgwelela kigoda cha undewa kamba tataake Daudi.
Avo kowa Mndewa wa lukolo lwa Yakobo milongo yose, Undewa wake hauziga!”
Maliamu kedika kalonga, “Nie na mhambe. Yodahikaze mbuli ino?”
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kedika kalonga, “Loho wa Mulungu kokuhumulukila, na mhiko za Mulungu Mkulu Ng'hani zokugubika. Avo mwana yondayavumbuke kowa mwana yang'alile, kokemigwa Mwana wa Mulungu.
Mgelegeze lumbu jako Elizabeti wamulongile kabule sambo, ila sambi kana inda ya milenge sita hamoja na uvyele wake.
Kwavija haduhu mbuli haidahika ha Mulungu.”
Maliamu kedika kalonga, “Nie na mtumigwa wa Mndewa, na nhendelwe kamba vuulongile.” Abaho, ija msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kahalawa.
Kipigiti kidodo hamwande Maliamu kaisasala, hima kachola kuna ikiwambo kili muisi ya vigongovigongo ya Yudea.
Kengila muna ing'anda ya Zakalia, kamulamsa Elizabeti.
Elizabeti viyahulike ndamsa ya Maliamu, chana king'hele kizumha mkudeng'ha muinda ya Elizabeti. Na Elizabeti kamemezigwa Loho wa Mulungu,
na kenula dizwi kalonga, “Kumota gweye kubanza watwanzi wose, na imwana yondaumulele kamota!
Vilihi mbuli zino ng'hulu zindawilile nie, hata mama wa Mndewa wangu yeze kumwangu?
Mhunde vinihulike ndamsa yako, chana king'hele muinda yangu kizumha mkudeng'ha.
Kumota gweye utogole kamba gaja gayalongile Mndewa kumwako golawilila!”
Na Maliamu kalonga, “Moyo wangu womuyenzi Mulungu.
Loho yangu yomdeng'helela Mulungu Mkombola wangu.
Kwavija kamgelegeza nyakadala wake imwende! Avo kusongela lelo wanhu wa milelo yose wong'hema yamotile,
mmbuli zija ng'hulu Mulungu Mkulu zayanitendele. Twaga jake ding'ala.
Kulawa wanhu wa mulelo umwe mbaka mulelo uyagwe kowonela bazi awo womdumba heyo.
Kaugolosa mkono wake mkulu na kawapwililisa awo woitopela ngelegeza zao.
Kawahumulusa wandewa wali na mhiko walawe muna ivigoda vao va undewa, na kawenula iwakumbulu.
Wali nzala kawegutiza vinhu vinogile, na wagoli kawaleka wachole bila kinhu.
Kakigoga kilagano chayailagane na wahenga zetu, avo keza kumtaza mtumigwa wake Islaeli.
Kakumbukila kumonela bazi Ablaham na lukolo lake lose milongo yose kamba viwailagane na wahenga zetu!”
Maliamu kakala na Elizabeti kamba milenge midatu vino, abaho, kabwela ukae yake.
Kipigiti cha Elizabeti kulela kivika, kamulela mwana mbigalo.
Wanhu wa mmambwegambwega na walawile mulukolo lwake viwahulike mbuli zija zinogile za mkanganyo Mndewa ziyamtendele, wose wadeng'helela hamoja na heyo.
Zua da nane weza kumwingiza kumbi imwana, walonda kumgwaa twaga da tataake, Zakalia.
Mamaake kalonga, “Ndema! Twaga jake dokemigwa Yohana.”
Wanhu wamulongela, “Ila mulukolo lwenu haduhu munhu yali na twaga hijo.”
Abaho, wamuuza tataake mkumulagusila na makono, womuuza kamba twaga dilihi doyolonda yagweleligwe mwanage.
Kawapula kibanzi cha kwandikila, kandika vino, “Twaga jake Yohana.” Wanhu wose wakanganya.
Baho mulomo na lulimi lwake Zakalia vifunguligwa, kasonga kulonga, kamuyenzi Mulungu.
Bwembwe diwengila wanhu wose wa mmambwegambwega na mbuli hizo zisimulilwa ng'ambu zose za isi ya vigongovigongo ya Yudea.
Wose wahulike mbuli hizo wagelegeza mmioyo yao, wolonga, “Mwana ino kowa munhu wa vilihi? Kwavija mhiko za Mndewa za hamoja na heyo.”
Zakalia tataake imwana kamemezwa Loho wa Mulungu, na kulonga usenga uno wa Mulungu,
“Yayenzigwe Mndewa, Mulungu wa Islaeli! Kwavija keza kuwataza wanhu zake na kuwakombola.
Katugwelela Mkombola mkulu, wa lukolo lwa mtumigwa wake Daudi,
kamba vija vayailagane na wahokozi zake wang'alile umwaka,
kamba kotukombola tulawe mmakono ga wadumuka, na kulawa mmakono ga wose watwihile.
Kalonga kowonela bazi wahenga zetu na kudikumbukila lagano jake ding'alile.
Kamduilila Ablaham tata wetu,
kailagana na heyo kamba kotukombola kulawa mmakono ga wadumuka, na kututenda tweye tumsang'hanikile heyo bila bwembwe,
giladi tuwe wanhu wang'alile na tulibule uzenzeleganye haulongozi wake, mazua gose ga ugima wetu.
“Na gweye, mwanangu, kokwiza kukemigwa muhokozi wa Mulungu Mkulu Ng'hani. Kolongola haulongozi wa Mndewa kumtandila nzila yake,
kowalongela wanhu zake avija vondawakomboligwe mkusegezelwa vilozo vao.
Mulungu wetu kogatenda higo sama ya bazi jake kulu, na ukombola wake kulawa kuulanga wotuhumulukila kamba zua da imitondo
na kuwamulikila wose wokala mdiziza na awo wakala mdisisila da kudanganhika, na kugalongoza magulu getu muna inzila ya tindiwalo.”
Mwana ija kakula na kuwa na mhiko muloho. Kakala muluwala mbaka zua dija viyalawilile mwa wanhu wose wa Islaeli.
Mazua gaja mkulu wa undewa wa Loma, yakalile yokemigwa Augusto, kalagiza wanhu wakalile muundewa wose wa Loma matwaga gao gandikigwe mkitabu.
Nyandikisha ino ikala ya ichanduso, kipigiti kija Kulenio viyakalile mkulu wa isi ya Silia.
Avo wose wachola kwandikigwa kila munhu mkiwambo chake mwenyego.
Usufu na heyo kasegela kulawa hakiwambo cha Nazaleti muisi ya Galilaya, kakwela kachola kukiwambo cha Betelehemu muisi ya Yudea, kwaaleligwe Mndewa Daudi kwavija kakala yolawa mulukolo lwa Daudi.
Kachola kwandikigwa hamoja na mkasano wake Maliamu, ayo yakalile na inda.
Viwakalile hiko, kipigiti chake cha kulela kivika.
Kamulela chaudele mbigalo, kam'vaza vivalo vowowavazaga wana ving'hele, kamtambalika mkia kiwadilaga ng'ombe, kwavija hawapatile gati muna ing'anda ya wahenza.
Ng'ambu ija kukala na wachunga wokwimiliza madale gao ga ng'hondolo ikilo mmigunda.
Msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kawalawilila, na yenzi ya Mndewa Mulungu iwamulika ng'ambu zose, wadumba ng'hani.
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kawalongela, “Sambimdumbe! Niwagalila mbuli inogile yondaiwatende wanhu wose wadeng'he ng'hani.
Kwavija lelo ino muna ikiwambo cha Daudi kavumbuka Mkombola wenu, iyo Kilisto Mndewa.
Na vino vivo vondamumtambule, mom'vika mwana king'hele yavazigwe vivalo vowowavazaga wana ving'hele katambalikwa mkia kiwadilaga ng'ombe.”
Baho dale kulu da wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga diza kuilumba hamoja na miyao wa ichanduso, womuyenzi Mulungu, wolonga,
“Yenzi ha Mulungu yali uchana ng'hani kuulanga, na tindiwalo muisi, ha wanhu wanogelwe na heyo!”
Waja iwasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga viwabweleganye kuulanga, waja iwachunga wakiilongela, “Tucholeni Betelehemu tukalole mbuli ino ilawilile, Mndewa yaatulongele.”
Avo wachola hima wam'vika Maliamu na Usufu na wamona ija imwana king'hele katambalikwa mkia kiwadilaga ng'ombe.
Wachunga viwamonile ija imwana, wawalongela wanhu mbuli za mwana ija ziwahulike kulawa ha msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga.
Wanhu wose wakanganya viwahulike mbuli ziwalongeligwe na wachunga.
Maliamu kazika mbuli zija zose mmoyo wake kuno yozigelegeza.
Waja iwachunga wabwela kuno womuyenzi na kumtogola Mulungu, kwavija gaja gawahulike na kugona gawa kamba vija msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga viyawalongele.
Vigabitile mazua manane, kipigiti cha kumwingiza kumbi vikivikile, wamgwaa twaga Yesu, twaga dayagweleligwe na msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kipigiti mamaake hanapata inda.
Kipigiti cha Usufu na Maliamu kutaulwa vikivikile kamba Malagizo ga Musa vigalagize, Usufu na Maliamu wamsola imwana wachola na heyo Yelusalemu wamwike mmakono ga Mndewa.
Muna Gamalagizo ga Mndewa yandikigwa, “Wana mbigalo wose wa udele wobagulwa na kwikigwa sama ya Mulungu.”
Vivija wachola kulava nhosa kamba viilagizwe Mmalagizo ga Mndewa, hua wabili ama makinda mabili ga njiwa.
Kipigiti kija kukala na munhu imwe twaga jake Simioni yakalile yokala Yelusalemu. Kakala yomdumba Mulungu, yotenda gamnogele Mulungu na kakala yololela kukombolwa kwa Islaeli. Na Loho wa Mulungu kakala na heyo.
Loho wa Mulungu kamgubulila kamba heza kudanganhika mbaka yamone Kilisto Mndewa.
Kuno yolongozwa na Loho wa Mulungu, Simioni kachola Kuing'anda ya Mulungu. Usufu na Maliamu viwamgalile Yesu Kung'anda ya Mulungu wamtendele kamba viilagizigwe muna Gamalagizo ga Musa,
Simioni kamsola Yesu mmakono gake kuno yomuyenzi Mulungu yolonga,
“Avino, Mndewa, kugavikiza gaja gautulongele, avo muleke nyakadala wako yachole mditindiwalo.
Kwavija nyona ukombola wako na meso gangu mwenyego,
awo uugalile sama ya wanhu wa isi zose.
Mulenge wondauwagubulile Wamhazi gaja gaulonda, na kugala yenzi mwa wanhu zako wa Islaeli.”
Tata na mama wa imwana wakala wokanganya mbuli ziyalongile Simioni yomulonga Yesu.
Simioni kawamoteza, kamulongela Maliamu mamaake imwana, “Tegeleza, mwana ino kavumbuka giladi yawe kilamso cha kuhumuluswa kwa wanhu bwando na kwinuligwa kwa wanhu bwando muna iisi ya Islaeli. Kowa kilaguso kilawa ha Mulungu chondakilemigwe na wanhu,
avo ngelegeza za wanhu bwando zili mgati zokoneka. Na gweye mwenyego usungu uli kamba zele wokuhoma mmoyo wako.”
Vivija kukala na muhokozi imwe mtwanzi m'vyele ng'hani twaga jake Ana, mndele wa Fanueli wa mtala wa Asheli. Kakala yakalile na mbigalo milao saba songela viyasoligwe,
songela aho kakala kizuka mbaka viyakalile m'vyele wa milao malongo manane na mine. Kipigiti hicho chose kakala Kung'anda ya Mulungu yomtambikila Mulungu misi na kilo, yofunga na kutambika.
Kipigiti kikija keza, na kusonga kamuyenzi Mulungu na kulonga mbuli za ija imwana mmagwiti ga wanhu wose wakalile wololela kukomboligwa kwa Yelusalemu.
Usufu na Maliamu viweshile kutenda gose galagizwe muna Gamalagizo ga Mndewa, wabwela ukae yao kukiwambo cha Nazaleti muisi ya Galilaya.
Mwana ija kakula, kongezeka mhiko na ng'hungwe, na Mulungu kammoteza.
Milao yose Usufu na Maliamu wokwelaga wochola Yelusalemu mkipigiti cha lusona lwa Wayahudi lukemigwa Pasaka.
Yesu viyakalile mmhale wa milao longo dimwe na mibili, wachola kuna ulusona kamba vowotendaga milao yose.
Ulusona vulwishile, wasonga mwanza wa kubwela kumwao, ila Yesu kasigala Yelusalemu. Usufu na Maliamu hawavitangile.
Wagiza kakala mdale da wanhu mnzila, wachola mwanza wa zua dimwe, abaho, wasonga kumzahila mwa wandugu na wambwiga zao.
Hawamonile, avo wabwela Yelusalemu kumzahila.
Zua da ikadatu wam'vika Kung'anda ya Mulungu, kakala na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, yowategeleza na kuwauza.
Wose wahulike mbuli zake wakanganya ubala na nyidikilo zake.
Usufu na Maliamu viwamonile wakanganya ng'hani, Maliamu mamaake kamuuza, “Habali ututendele vino, mwanangu? Tataako na nie tugaya tukuzahila kuno tugudema.”
Ila heyo kawedika yolonga, “Habali munizahila? Ham'vitangile avija vinilondigwa nikale mng'anda ya Tataangu?”
Tataake na mamaake hawaitangile nhegulo ya mbuli ino.
Avo Yesu kahumuluka kabwela Nazaleti na hewo, kakala mwende ha tataake na mamaake. Mamaake kazika mbuli zija zose mmoyo wake.
Yesu kakula mulukuli na mng'hungwe. Kadeng'helwa na Mulungu na wanhu.
Mulongo umwe na milao mitano ya undewa wa Mndewa Tibelio, Pontio Pilato kakala mtawala wa isi ya Yudea. Helode Antipa kakala mtawala wa isi ya Galilaya, na mkulu wake Filipo kakala mndewa wa isi ya Itulea na Tulakoniti. Lisania kakala mndewa wa isi ya Abilene,
na Anasi na Kayafa wakala wakulu wa wakulu wose wa nhambiko. Kipigiti kikija mbuli za Mulungu zim'vikila Yohana, mwanage Zakalia, kuja kuluwala.
Avo Yohana kachola muisi zose zizunguluke Ulwanda lwa Yolodani, kawapetela, yolonga, “Lekeni vilozo venu mkabatizigwe, na Mulungu kovigela kumgongo vilozo venu.”
Kamba vija viyandikigwe muna ikitabu cha muhokozi Isaya, “Munhu kenula dizwi muluwala, yolonga, ‘Itandeni nzila ya Mndewa, mgoloseleni nzila zake.
Migea yose yokusiligwa, vigongo na visugulu vose vohimbuligwa. Nzila ziveduke zogolosigwa, hali na mikolongokolongo hatelebuswe.
Na wanhu wose wowona ukombola kulawa ha Mulungu.’ ”
Yohana kawalongela wanhu bwando wamwizile wabatizigwe, “Mweye wana wa nyoka! Iyo yalihi yawazumile kulukimbila lusango lwa Mulungu londalwize?
Tendeni mbuli zilagusa kamba muleka vilozo venu. Sambimsonge kuilongela kamba ‘Ablaham iyo tata wetu.’ Kwavija nie nowalongela Mulungu kodaha kumwinulila Ablaham wana kulawa mgamabwe gano.
Avo nhemo ikigwa goya kuikanha mibiki mmisina, avo biki jojose dondadileke kulela mujo unogile dokanhigwa na kwasigwa hamoto.”
Dale da wanhu dimuuza, “Avo, tutendeze?”
Kawalongela, “Yali na vivalo vibili yam'bagulile yalibule, na yali na mandia yatende vivo.”
Wawila kodi na hewo weza kubatizigwa, wamuuza, “Mkulufunzi, na tweye tutendeze?”
Na heyo kawalongela, “Sambimuwile kodi ng'hulu kubanza vumulagizwe.”
Asikali na hewo weza kumuuza, “Na tweye tutende choni?” Na heyo kawalongela, “Sambim'bokonye hela za munhu yoyose ama sambimum'vwizile mbuli munhu yoyose, mwenelwe na maliho genu.”
Wanhu wose wakala wamemile nhamanila ha Yohana, wakala wokiiuza mmioyo yao kamba siku Yohana iyo Kilisto.
Avo Yohana kawalongela wanhu wose, “Nie nowabatiza mweye na mazi, ila kokwiza yali na mhiko kubanza nie, nie sidaha hata kufungula nzabi za ng'hwabasa zake. Heyo kowabatiza na Loho wa Mulungu na moto.
Heyo kana kia chake cha kubetela ngano yake, yakunzanye ingano kukano, na imikumvi yaisome na moto hauzimikaga.”
Yohana kaupeta Usenga Unogile mwa wanhu yowazuma mkuwagong'ondeza na mbuli bwando waleke gehile.
Ila Yohana kamkomhokela Helode Antipa, mndewa, kwavija kakala yamsolile Helodia, mtwanzi wa ndugu yake, na gehile gose goyokala yotenda.
Avo Helode kabanziliza udumuka wake ha Yohana, na kamgela mkifungo.
Wanhu wose viweshile kubatizigwa, Yesu na heyo kabatizigwa. Na viyakalile yotambika, ulanga uvuguka,
na Loho wa Mulungu kamuhumulukila yalumbile kamba hua. Dizwi dihulikwa kulawa kuulanga, “Gweye iyo Mwanangu uninogele, ninogelwa nagwe.”
Yesu viyasongile sang'hano yake, kakala na milao malongo madatu. Na wanhu wamgesa iyo mwana wa Usufu, mwanage Heli.
Heli kakala mwanage Matati, Matati kakala mwanage Lawi, Lawi kakala mwanage Meliki, Meliki kakala mwanage Yanai, na Yanai kakala mwanage Usufu,
Usufu kakala mwanage Matatia, Matatia kakala mwanage Amosi, Amosi kakala mwanage Nahumu, Nahumu kakala mwanage Hesili, Hesili kakala mwanage Nagai,
Nagai kakala mwanage Maati, Maati kakala mwanage Matatia, Matatia kakala mwanage Shemeni, Shemeni kakala mwanage Yoseki, Yoseki kakala mwanage Yoda,
Yoda kakala mwanage Yohanani, Yohanani kakala mwanage Lesa, Lesa kakala mwanage Zelubabeli, Zelubabeli kakala mwanage Shelitieli, Shelitieli kakala mwanage Neli,
Neli kakala mwanage Meliki, Meliki kakala mwanage Adi, Adi kakala mwanage Kosamu, Kosamu kakala mwanage Elimadamu, Elimadamu kakala mwanage Eli,
Eli kakala mwanage Yoshua, Yoshua kakala mwanage Eliezeli, Eliezeli kakala mwanage Yolimu, Yolimu kakala mwanage Matati, Matati kakala mwanage Lawi,
Lawi kakala mwanage Simioni, Simioni kakala mwanage Yuda, Yuda kakala mwanage Usufu, Usufu kakala mwanage Yonamu, Yonamu kakala mwanage Eliakimu,
Eliakimu kakala mwanage Melea, Melea kakala mwanage Mena, Mena kakala mwanage Matata, Matata kakala mwanage Natani, Natani kakala mwanage Daudi,
Daudi kakala mwanage Yese, Yese kakala mwanage Obedi, Obedi kakala mwanage Boazi, Boazi kakala mwanage Salimoni, Salimoni kakala mwanage Nashoni,
Nashoni kakala mwanage Aminadabu, Aminadabu kakala mwanage Adimini, Adimini kakala mwanage Ani, Ani kakala mwanage Heziloni, Heziloni kakala mwanage Pelesi, Pelesi kakala mwanage Yuda,
Yuda kakala mwanage Yakobo, Yakobo kakala mwanage Isaka, Isaka kakala mwanage Ablaham, Ablaham kakala mwanage Tela, Tela kakala mwanage Naholi,
Naholi kakala mwanage Selugi, Selugi kakala mwanage Leu, Leu kakala mwanage Pelegi, Pelegi kakala mwanage Ebeli, Ebeli kakala mwanage Shela,
Shela kakala mwanage Kainamu, Kainamu kakala mwanage Alufaksadi, Alufaksadi kakala mwanage Shemu, Shemu kakala mwanage Nuhu, Nuhu kakala mwanage Lameki,
Lameki kakala mwanage Metusela, Metusela kakala mwanage Henoko, Henoko kakala mwanage Yaledi, Yaledi kakala mwanage Mahalaleli, Mahalaleli kakala mwanage Kainamu,
Kainamu kakala mwanage Enoshi, Enoshi kakala mwanage Seti, Seti kakala mwanage Adamu, Adamu kakala mwanage Mulungu.
Yesu kalawa Mulwanda lwa Yolodani kuno yamemile Loho wa Mulungu, kalongozwa na Loho wa Mulungu mbaka muluwala.
Ako kagezigwa na Mwenembago mkipigiti cha mazua malongo mane. Kipigiti hicho chose hadile kinhu chochose, kipigiti hicho vikimalile, kona nzala.
Mwenembago kamulongela, “Uhawa gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu, dilongele dibwe dino digaluke mkate.”
Yesu kedika kalonga, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Munhu hawa mgima sama ya mkate wiyeka.’ ”
Mwenembago kamsola kamgala uchana ng'hani, mkipigiti kiguhi kamulagusila ndewa zose za ulumwengu.
Mwenembago kamulongela, “Nokugwelela mhiko zino zose na mali gano gose, kwavija nigweleligwa na nodaha kumgwaa yoyose inimulonda.
Uhanitambikila, vino vose vowa vako gweye.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Mtambikile Mndewa Mulungu wako na umsang'hanikile heyo yeiyeka!’ ”
Mwenembago kamsola kamgala Yelusalemu kuna inhembeti ya Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kamulongela, “Uhawa gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu, ibwanhe hasi kulawa hano.
Kwavija yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Mulungu kokulagizila wasenga zake wa kuulanga wakwimilize.’
Kabili yandikigwa, ‘Wokudang'ha mmakono gao, sambiuikwale mgulu wako muna idibwe.’ ”
Ila Yesu kamwidika, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, ‘Sambiumgeze Mndewa Mulungu wako.’ ”
Mwenembago viyeshile kumgeza mmbuli zose, kamuleka mkipigiti kidodo.
Yesu kabwela muisi ya Galilaya yamemile mhiko za Loho wa Mulungu, na singilimo zake zenela isi zose za mmambwegambwega.
Na heyo kakala yowafundiza wanhu muna zing'anda zao za nhambiko, na wanhu wose wamtogola.
Abaho, Yesu kachola Nazaleti kiwambo chayakulile, na muna Idizua da Mhumulo, kengila mng'anda ya nhambiko kamba vayazoele. Kema giladi yasome Nyandiko Zing'alile.
Kagweleligwa ikitabu cha muhokozi Isaya. Kakigubula kavika hanhu handikigwe vino,
“Loho wa Mndewa ka hamoja na nie, kwavija kanisagula niwagalile wakumbulu Usenga Unogile. Kanilagiza niipete ndekesa mwa awo wagogigwe, na vimbugumbugu wadahe kulola, niwadohole waja wogazigwa.
Na kupeta kamba kipigiti kivika cha mndewa kuwakombola wanhu zake.”
Abaho, Yesu kakigubika ikitabu kam'bwezela mwimilizi wa ing'anda ya nhambiko, abaho, kakala hasi. Wanhu wose wakalile muja mng'anda ya nhambiko wamulola ng'hani.
Na heyo kawalongela “Lelo Nyandiko zino Zing'alile zivikila, kamba vumuhulike.”
Wanhu wose wanogelwa ng'hani, wakanganya mbuli zinogile zayalongile. Walonga, “Ino sio mwanage Usufu?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nivitanga kamba monilongela ulonzi uno, ‘Mganga, ihonye mwenyego! Gaja gatuhulike ugatendile Kapenaumu ugatende hano hakiwambo chako mwenyego.’ ”
Kagendelela kulonga, “Nowalongeleni ikweli, muhokozi hatogoligwa hakae yake mwenyego.
“Kweli, kukala na vizuka bwando muna iisi ya Islaeli kipigiti chayakalile Eliya, kipigiti mvula vuilekile kutoa milao midatu na milenge sita, nzala ikala mpamanho muna iisi yose.
Ila Eliya hatumigwe ha kizuka yoyose, ila ha kizuka imwe yakalile Salepta muna iisi ya Sidoni.
Na kukala wanhu bwando wakalile na dikulu muna iisi ya Islaeli kipigiti chayakalile muhokozi Elisha, na haduhu mtamu yoyose wa dikulu yahonyigwe, ila Naamani yeiyeka yakalile yokala muisi ya Silia.”
Wanhu wose wakalile muja mng'anda ya nhambiko viwahulike mbuli zija wona lusango.
Wema, wamkwekwesa Yesu, wamulava hanze ya ikiwambo. Wamsola wamgala uchana ya ikigongo, haja idiwambo jao hadizengigwe, walonda kumsung'hizila mdigema.
Ila Yesu kabita hagatigati yao, kachola na zake.
Abaho, Yesu kachola kukiwambo cha Kapenaumu muisi ya Galilaya, kawafundiza wanhu muna Dizua da Mhumulo.
Wakanganya avija voyokala yofundiza kwavija mbuli zake zikala na udaho.
Muja muna ing'anda ya nhambiko kukala na munhu yakalile na kinyamkela, katoa nyangi yolonga,
“Ka! Kotulonda choni gweye, Yesu wa Nazaleti? Kwiza kutubananga? Nokutanga, gweye iyo Ung'alile wa Mulungu!”
Yesu kamkomhokela ija kinyamkela, yolonga, “Nyamala, mulawe munhu ino.” Kinyamkela kam'bwanha hasi ija imunhu hameso gao, kamulawa bila kumulumiza hanhu.
Wanhu wose wakanganya, wailongela, “Mbuli zaki zino? Munhu ino kana mhiko na udaho wa kuwakomhokela vinyamkela, nao wolawa!”
Mbuli za Yesu zenela ng'ambu zose za isi ija.
Yesu kalawa muna ing'anda ya nhambiko, kachola hakae ya Simoni. Mama mkwe yake Simoni kakala yolumwa homa ng'hali, avo wamulongela Yesu yamuhonye.
Yesu keza kema behi na heyo, kaikomhokela ija ihoma, imulawa, kenuka na kuwasang'hanikila.
Viivikile ichungulo, wanhu wose wawagala ha Yesu wanhu zao wakalile wolumwa vitamu va namna zose, kawekila makono gake kawahonya.
Vinyamkela wawalawa wanhu bwando, watoa nyangi wolonga, “Gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu.” Yesu kawakomhokela hawalekile walonge, kwavija wamtanga heyo iyo Kilisto.
Ulukwili, Yesu kasegela kachola hanhu halibule wanhu. Wanhu wasonga kumzahila, viwamonile, wageza kumzuila sambiyasegele hamwao.
Ila heyo kawalongela, “Nolondigwa niupete Usenga Unogile wa Undewa wa Mulungu m'viwambo viyagwe, kwavija nhumigwa nhende vino.”
Kakala yowapetela wanhu Usenga Unogile wa Undewa wa Mulungu muna zing'anda za nhambiko muisi yose ya Yudea.
Zua dimwe Yesu kakala yemile hamgwazo wa Idilamba da Genesaleti. Wanhu wakala wokiibabanika wokwenhuka behi na heyo kutegeleza mbuli za Mulungu.
Kazona ngalawa mbili mulugigo lwa idilamba, zikigwe haja na waloa somba, wakalile wosuluza nhando zao.
Yesu kengila mngalawa imwe ikalile ya Simoni, kamulongela Simoni yaikwenhuse hamwande, hatalitali na ulugigo lwa idilamba. Yesu kakala mngalawa yowafundiza wanhu bwando.
Viyeshile kulonga kamulongela Simoni, “Kwenhusa ingalawa hamwande hana ididindi da idilamba, na gweye na wayago tandeni nhando zenu muloe somba.”
Simoni kamulongela, “Mndewa, tugonelela tuloa somba hatupatile kinhu, ila kwavija gweye kulonga, nozitanda nhando.”
Viwazitandile izinhando, wonza somba bwando, na nhando zao zisonga kukanhika.
Wawakema wayao wakalile mngalawa iyagwe weze kuwataza. Weza wamemeza somba ngalawa zose mbili, avo ngalawa zikala mmabehi kudidimila mmazi.
Simoni Petulo viyagonile gaja, kafugama mavindi haulongozi wa Yesu, yolonga, “Mndewa, sambiung'hwenhukile kwavija nie nna vilozo!”
Simoni na wayage wose wakanganya avija viwonzile somba bwando kamba vija.
Yakobo na Yohana wanage Zebedayo, wakalile waloa somba wayage Simoni, vivija wakanganya. Yesu kamulongela Simoni, “Sambiudumbe, kusongela lelo kowa muloa wanhu.”
Wazikwekwesa zingalawa wazika mumgwazo wa idilamba, waleka gose wamkweleleza Yesu.
Yesu viyakalile mdiwambo dimwe da hiko, kaiting'hana na mbigalo imwe yakalile na dikulu lukuli lugima. Viyamonile Yesu, kafugama mavindi, kamulongela mkuiyalala, “Mndewa, uhalonda, kodaha kunihonya.”
Yesu kagolosa mkono wake kamkwasa yolonga, “Nolonda, hona!” Kipigiti kikija kahona utamu wa dikulu.
Abaho, Yesu kamulagiza yolonga, “Sambiumulongele munhu yoyose, ila genda dimwe kwa dimwe ha mkulu wa nhambiko yakulole goya, abaho, ukalave nhosa kamba Musa vayalagize, giladi iwe usindila mwa wanhu wose kamba kuhona.”
Ila mbuli za Yesu zibanza kwenela muisi yose, wanhu bwando weza kumtegeleza na kuhonyigwa vitamu vao.
Ila Yesu mianza bwando kakala yonyelenhuka yochola hanhu halibule wanhu kutambika.
Zua dimwe Yesu kakala yofundiza. Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, walawile m'viwambo vose va Galilaya, Yudea na kulawa Yelusalemu, wakala baho. Mhiko za Mndewa zikala na heyo, avo kawahonya watamu.
Baho weza wanhu wampapile munhu yaholole mulusazi, wageza kumwingiza mng'anda wamwike haulongozi wa Yesu.
Avija wanhu viwakalile wamemile hawadahile kumwingiza mng'anda. Avo wampapa, wamgala uchana mkiswili, wafumula usoti, wamuhumulusa hamoja na lusazi lwake, na kumwika hagatigati ya ididale da wanhu haulongozi wa Yesu.
Yesu viyonile avija viwakalile na nhamanila ng'hulu, kamulongela ija imunhu, “Mbwiga, vilozo vako vigeligwa kumgongo.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wasonga kukiiuza, “Iyo yalihi yofukula? Mulungu yeiyeka yodaha kugela kumgongo vilozo va wanhu!”
Ila Yesu kazitanga ngelegeza zao, kawauza, “Habali mgelegeza mbuli kamba azo?
