yolonga, “Kamba uhakitangile lelo kija kilondigwa kugala tindiwalo! Ila kifisigwa hameso gako!
Kwavija kipigiti chokwiza wadumuka zako vondawakuzungulusile lwigo, na kukuzunguluka kukubaniza ng'ambu zose.
Wokuhondahonda kabisa na kuwakoma wanhu wali mgati mwa iviwambaza vako, haduhu dibwe dondadilekigwe hachana ya diyagwe, kwavija hukitangile kipigiti Mulungu viyezile kukukombola!”
Abaho, Yesu kachola Kung'anda ya Mulungu, kasonga kuwawinga wanhu wakalile woguza vinhu,
yowalongela, “Yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile kamba, ‘Ng'anda yangu yowa ng'anda ya nhambiko.’ Ila mweye muitenda kifiso cha wabavi!”
Mazua gose viyakalile Yelusalemu, Yesu kakala yofundiza Kung'anda ya Mulungu. Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, na wakulu wa wanhu wakala wozahila nzila ya kumkoma.
Ila hawapatile nzila ya kumkomela, kwavija wanhu wose wakala womtegeleza goya mazua gose, hawalondile kuihonya hata mbuli imwe.
Zua dimwe Yesu viyakalile Kung'anda ya Mulungu yowafundiza wanhu na kuwapetela Usenga Unogile, wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa hamoja na wavyele wa wanhu weza,
wamuuza, “Tulongele, kotenda mbuli zino na udaho ulihi? Yalihi yakugwelele udaho uno?”
Yesu kawedika, “Beta niuze mbuli. Nilongeleni,
vino udaho wa Yohana wa kubatiza ulawa ha Mulungu ama ulawa mwa wanhu?”
Wasonga kuibamilila wenyego kwa wenyego, “Tulongeze? Kamba tuhalonga ‘Ulawa ha Mulungu,’ kwiza kotulongela, ‘Habali hamumtogole Yohana?’
Na tuhalonga, ‘Ulawa mwa wanhu,’ wanhu wose hano wotukoma mkututoa na mabwe, kwavija wamtogola kamba Yohana kakala muhokozi.”
Avo wamulongela, “Hatukutangile kuulawile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Na nie siwalongela na udaho ulihi notenda mbuli zino.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wanhu hala dino, “Kukala na munhu imwe yakalile na mgunda wa mizabibu, kawapangiza walimi, abaho, kachola isi ya kutali, kakala kuja kipigiti kitali.
Kipigiti cha kuhuna zizabibu vikivikile, kamtuma nyakadala wake ha iwalimi yakamsolele fungu jake da izizabibu. Ila waja iwalimi wamtoa ija inyakadala na kum'bweza bila kinhu.
Avo kamgala nyakadala iyagwe, ila waja iwalimi vivija wamtoa, wamtendela mbuli za kumgela kinyala, abaho, wam'bweza bila kinhu.
Abaho, kamgala nyakadala wa ikadatu, na heyo vivija waja iwalimi wamgela milonda, abaho, wamwasa hanze ya umgunda.
Avo mwene umgunda wa zabibu kalonga, ‘Nhendeze? Nomgala mwanangu mwenyego yaninogele, kwa vovose ino womuhishimila!’
Ila waja iwalimi viwamonile, wailongela, ‘Ino iyo muhazi wake mwene mgunda. Natumkome, na uhazi wake wowa wetu!’
Avo wamwasa hanze ya umgunda, abaho, wamkoma.” Yesu kawauza, “Ija mwene umgunda wa izizabibu kowatenda choni waja iwalimi?
Kokwiza kuwakoma wanhu waja, na umgunda wa izizabibu kowagwaa walimi wayagwe.” Wanhu viwahulike gano, walonga, “Sambigatulawilile gano!”
Ila Yesu kawalola, abaho, kawauza. “Nyandiko zino Zing'alile nhegulo yake choni? ‘Dibwe dilemigwe na wazenzi digaluka kuwa dibwe da kutamanilwa ng'hani kubanza mabwe gose.’
Munhu yoyose yondayadigwile dibwe dija kokanhika vidangavidanga, na kamba dibwe dija dihamgwila munhu, domsiginha lipilipi.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko bahaja walonda kumgoga Yesu, kwavija wavitanga kamba kadilonga hala dino yowalonga hewo, ila wawadumba wanhu.
Wakala womuhembula ng'hani, abaho, wawatuma visepi waitendile kamba wanhu wanogile. Watamanila kumnamata Yesu mmbuli zayalongile, giladi wamgoge wamgele mmakono ga mkulu wa undewa wa Loma.
Wanhu waja wamulongela Yesu, “Mkulufunzi, tuvitanga kamba kolonga na kufundiza mbuli za kweli, na kamba hudumba kihanga cha munhu yoyose, ila kofundiza ikweli vija Mulungu voyowalonda wanhu watende.
Tulongele, vino vinoga tweye kuliha kodi ha mkulu wa undewa wa Loma ama havinogile?”
Ila Yesu kaumanya ubala wao, kawalongela,
“Ndagusileni ihela. Twaga na kihanga kino kili muno cha munhu yalihi?” Walonga, “Va mkulu wa undewa wa Loma.”
Avo Yesu kalonga, “Vinoga. Avo muliheni mkulu wa undewa wa Loma vija vili va mkulu wa undewa wa Loma, na muliheni Mulungu vija vili va Mulungu.”
Hawadahile kumnamata mmbuli ziyalongile haja hameso ga wanhu, avo wanyamala, wakanganya nyidikilo yake.
Abaho, Masadukayo wayagwe, waja wolonga kamba wanhu hawazuka, weza ha Yesu na mbuza,
walonga, “Mkulufunzi, Musa katwandikila tweye lagizo dino, ‘Kamba munhu yahadanganhika na kaleka mwehe ila halelile nayo mwana, mdodo ama mkulu wa munhu hiyo kolondigwa yamsole ija ikizuka yamulelele wana ndugu yake yadanganhike.’
Avo kukala na wandugu saba. Imkulu kasola mtwanzi, kadanganhika halekile mwana.
Abaho, waikabili kamsola ija imtwanzi, na heyo kadanganhika bila kuleka mwana,
na waikadatu kamsola. Galawilila gagaja mbaka wose saba wadanganhika bila kuleka wana.
Hakimambukizo, ija imtwanzi vivija kadanganhika.
Avo kuna dizua da kuzuka kwa wanhu wadanganhike, kowa mtwanzi wa yalihi? Kwavija wose saba wakala wamsolile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Wanhu wa kipigiti kino wosola na kusoligwa,
ila wanhu waja walumbile kwingila muulumwengu uja, na kuna umzuso wa kulawa mkudanganhika, hawasola ama kusoligwa,
na hawadanganhika, wowa kamba wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga. Wao wowa wana wa Mulungu, kwavija wazusigwa.
Ila mmbuli ya kuzuka kwa wanhu, hata Musa kalagusa mbuli hiyo Mzinyandiko Zing'alile muna imbuli ya kitutua kikwaka, aho komulonga Mndewa kamba ‘Mulungu wa Ablaham, na Isaka, na Yakobo.’
Heyo hali Mulungu wa wadanganhike, ila Mulungu wa wagima, kwavija kumwake heyo wose wana ugima.”
Wafundiza wayagwe wa Malagizo ga Musa walonga, “Kulonga goya, Mkulufunzi!”
Na haduhu munhu yagezile kumuuza tena mbuli iyagwe!
Yesu kawauza, “Vodahikaze wanhu kulonga kamba Kilisto Mkombola kowa mwana wa Daudi?
Kwavija Daudi mwenyego kolonga mkitabu cha Zabuli, ‘Mndewa kamulongela Mndewa wangu, Kala kumkono wangu wa ukulume
mbaka vondaniweke wadumuka zako wawe kamba kigoda cha kwikila magulu gako.’
Kamba Daudi kamkema heyo Mndewa, abaho, Kilisto Mkombola kowaze mwana wa Daudi?”
Wanhu wose viwakalile wotegeleza, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake,
“Iteganyeni na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, awo wonogelwa kuzungulukazunguluka kuno wavalile mikanzu yao, na wonogelwa kulamsigwa na hishima mmasoko, na kusagula vigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za nhambiko na mulusona.
Wowabulunya vizuka na kutenda nhambiko nhali za uzenzeleganye hameso ga wanhu! Nhaguso yao yowa ng'hulu ng'hani!”
Yesu kawalola wanhu wose, kawona wagoli vowogela nhosa zao mkia cha kulavila nhosa,
abaho, kamona kizuka imwe mkumbulu ng'hani kagela senti mbili.
Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela kizuka ino imkumbulu kagela nhosa ng'hulu kubanza wayagwe wose,
kwavija wayagwe walava nhosa zao kulawa m'vinhu vibanzile mmali gao gali bwando, ila heyo, hamoja na ukumbulu wake, kalava vose vayatamanile.”
Wanhu wayagwe wakala wolongelela woilonga Ing'anda ya Mulungu viihambigwe na mabwe ganogile na nhosa zilavigwa ha Mulungu. Yesu kalonga,
“Gano gomkona hano, kipigiti chokwiza haduhu hata dibwe dimwe dondadilekigwe hachana ya diyagwe, gose golagazwa hasi.”
Wamuuza, “Mkulufunzi, mbuli zino zolawila zua jaki? Na choni chondakilawilile kutulagusila kamba kipigiti kivika cha mbuli ino kulawilila?”
Yesu kalonga, “Tegelezeni munhu sambiyawavwizile. Wanhu bwando wokwiza mtwaga jangu, wolonga, ‘Nie iyo Kilisto!’ na, ‘Kipigiti kivika!’ Ila sambimuwakoleleze.
Sambimdumbe muhahulika ng'hondo na muhindumuhindu, kwavija vinhu kamba avo volondigwa visonge kulawila, ila ikimambukizo hakiza hima.”
Kagendelela kulonga, “Isi yogomba na isi iyagwe, na undewa wouvamhila undewa uyagwe.
Kowa na mgudemo mkulu ng'hani wa isi, nzala na utamu hauhonaga hanhu na hanhu, kowa na vinhu va mkanganyo na va kudumbiza vilagala kulawa kuulanga.
Ila mbuli zino zose kipigiti hazinalawila, tanhu, mogogigwa na kugazigwa, mogaligwa mzing'anda za nhambiko na kugeligwa mkifungo, mogaligwa mwa wandewa na mwa watawala sama yangu.
Kino chowa kipigiti cha mweye kuzipeta mbuli zangu kumwao.
Lamuleni mmioyo yenu kamba hamwiza kugelegeza avija vondamuigombeleze,
kwavija nowagwelela ng'hungwe na mbuli za kulonga azo zondaziwatende wadumuka zenu wose sambiwadahe kuzilema ama kubamila.
Mohonzigwa na watata zenu na wamama zenu na wakulu na wadodo zenu na wandugu zenu na wambwiga zenu, na wayagwe mmwanza wenu wokomigwa.
Wanhu wose wowehila sama yangu.
Ila haduhu hata luvili lumwe kulawa mmatwi genu londalupotele.
Nanahileni, moikombola wenyego.
“Muhajona wambo da Yelusalemu dizungulukwe na madale ga asikali, m'vitange kamba mkipigiti kiguhi dokwiza kubanangwa.
Avo, awo wali Yudea wakimbilile m'vigongo, awo wali mdiwambo wasegele, na awo wali kumigunda sambiwabwele mdiwambo.
Kwavija kino kicho kipigiti cha nhaguso, kugatenda gaja gose galongigwe Mzinyandiko Zing'alile galawile.
Wogaya ng'hani watwanzi wali na inda mmazua higo na watwanzi wali na wana ving'hele! Mgayo mkulu wokwiza muisi ino, na lusango lukulu lwa Mulungu lowagwila wanhu wano.
Wanhu wayagwe wokomigwa na mapanga, na wanhu wayagwe wosoligwa kamba wafungigwa na kupwililiswa muisi zose. Na wambo da Yelusalemu dobojagwa na Wamhazi, mbaka kipigiti chao vondakimale.
“Kowa na vinhu va mkanganyo vondavilawile mdizua, mmulenge, na mnhondo. Muulumwengu, wanhu wa muisi zose wowa bule nhamanila, wodumba kisindo cha bahali na nyangi za kumema na kuhungula kwa ibahali.
Wanhu wosinduka mkona bwembwe, wobeta wone chondakilawilile muulumwengu wose, kwavija mhiko za kuulanga zotigiswa.
Aho baho hondawanyone nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nikwiza na mawingu na mhiko na yenzi ng'hulu.
Mbuli zino zihasonga kulawila, imeni wima, mgangamale, kwavija ukombola wenu wa mmabehi.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela hala dino, “Ugelegezeni mtini na mibiki yose.
Muhagona matepo gake gosonga kuzuka, movitanga kamba vuli da mmabehi.
Vivija, muhazona mbuli zino zolawila, m'vitange kamba Undewa wa Mulungu wa mmabehi.
“Kweli nowalongela, wanhu wa mulelo uno hawesha wose mbaka mbuli zino zose zilawilile.
Ulanga na isi vose vobita, ila mbuli zangu hazibita.
“Teganyeni, mioyo yenu sambiibasakanywe na ngelegeza za kubukanya na kung'wa ugimbi na mbuli za ulumwengu uno, kwavija zua dija da ikimambukizo dowezila mkuwasinhukiza
kamba mtego. Kwavija vivo vondadiwezile wanhu wose wokala kila hanhu muulumwengu.
Kaleni meso mazua gose, na mtambike kipigiti chose giladi mwing'higwe mhiko za kubita muilegehe mmbuli hizo zose azo zondazilawile na kwima haulongozi wa nie, Mwana wa Munhu.”
Mazua gaja Yesu kakala yofundiza Kung'anda ya Mulungu, na ichungulo kakala yochola kuwasa kuna Ikigongo cha Mizaituni.
Ndamuka ya kila imitondo wanhu wose wachola Kung'anda ya Mulungu kumtegeleza.
Kipigiti cha Lusona lwa Imikate Ilibule Mela, lukemigwa Pasaka, kikwenhuka.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala wozahila nzila ya kumkoma Yesu, ila wawadumba wanhu.
Abaho, Mwenembago kamwingila Yuda, yokemigwa Isikalioti, yakalile mmwanza wa wanahina longo dimwe na wabili.
Avo Yuda kachola kulonga na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wakulu wa asikali wemilizi wa Ing'anda ya Mulungu avija vondayamgele mmakono gao.
Wadeng'helela ng'hani, wailagana kumgwaa hela.
Yuda katogola, kasonga kuzahila hanhu ha kumgela Yesu mmakono gao kipigiti halibule wanhu.
Zua da Ulusona lwa Imikate Ilibule Mela divika, lusona lwawachinjaga wana ng'hondolo wa Pasaka.
Yesu kawatuma Petulo na Yohana yowalongela, “Gendeni mkatutandile mandia ga Pasaka tuje.”
Wamuuza, “Kwahi kuulonda tukaitande?”
Kawalongela, “Muhengila mdiwambo, moiting'hana na munhu yapapile nongo ya mazi. Mkwelelezeni mbaka kuna ing'anda yondayengile,
mulongeleni mwene ng'anda, ‘Mkulufunzi kokuuza, dakwahi digati dondawadile Pasaka heyo na wanahina zake?’
Kowalagusila gati kulu da uchana dili na vinhu vose. Aho baho hondamsasale kila kinhu.”
Wachola wavika kila kinhu kamba viwalongeligwe na Yesu, avo wasasala mandia ga Pasaka.
Kipigiti vikivikile, Yesu kakala hameza na watumigwa zake.
Kawalongela, “Nisulukila ng'hani kuja na mweye mandia gano ga Pasaka ning'hali sinagazigwa.
Kwavija nowalongela sigaja kabili mandia gano mbaka vondagavikile Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Abaho, Yesu kasola kikasi, kamuheweza Mulungu, kalonga, “Soleni kino muigolele mwemwe kwa mwemwe.
Nowalongela, songela kipigiti kino na kugendelela, sing'wa viyagwe divai mbaka Undewa wa Mulungu vondawize.”
Abaho, kasola mkate, kamuheweza Mulungu, kaumogola, kawagwelela yolonga, “Uno uwo lukuli lwangu lulavigwe sama yenu, tendeni vino mkung'humbukila nie.”
Viyeshile kuwagwelela gamandia, vivija kawagwelela kikasi yolonga, “Kikasi kino kicho lagano da isambi dili mmulopa wangu, ukwitika sama yenu.
“Ila lola! Mkono wa munhu yondayanihonze wa bahano na nie hameza!
Nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nodanganhika kamba vayalamule Mulungu, ila kogaya ng'hani munhu ija yondayanihonze!”
Avo wasonga kuiuza wenyego kwa wenyego yalihi mmwanza wao yondayazitende mbuli zija.
Bamila dizuka mwa wanahina, kamba yalihi mmwanza wao yogelegezwa kuwa mkulu kubanza wayagwe.
Yesu kawalongela, “Wandewa wa Wamhazi wowatawala wanhu zao na mhiko, na watawala wolonda kukemigwa, ‘Wambwiga za Wanhu.’
Ila vino sio vumulondigwa mweye muwe. Ila yali mkulu kubanza wose mmwanza wenu kolondigwa kuwa kamba mdodo kubanza wose, na ayo yali kilangizi kolondigwa kuwa kamba mtumigwa.
Yalihi yali mkulu, ija yokala hasi kuja ama ija imtumigwa? Nokwagiza ija yokala hasi kuja. Ila nie na mmwanza wenu kamba mtumigwa.
“Mweye mkala na nie kipigiti chose kinikalile nigazigwa,
na kamba Tataangu viyangwelele nie Undewa, vivija na nie nowagwelela mweye Undewa.
Moja na kung'wa hameza yangu Muundewa wangu, na mokala muna ivigoda va undewa, muitagusa mitala longo dimwe na mibili ya Islaeli.
“Simoni, Simoni! Tegeleza! Mwenembago kampula Mulungu giladi yeze kuwageza mweye, yone kamba nhamanila yenu yogendelela.
Ila nikutambikila gweye, Simoni, nhamanila yako sambiihunguke. Na uhabwela kumwangu, uwagangamaze wandugu zako.”
Ila Petulo kalonga, “Mndewa, nie nitogola kugeligwa mkifungo hamoja nagwe ama kudanganhika hamoja nagwe!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela, Petulo, kilo cha lelo nzogolo hanakwika, konibela mianza midatu kamba hunimanyile.”
Abaho, Yesu kawauza wanahina zake yolonga, “Viniwatumile kipigiti kija bila mkwiji wa hela na bila mkoba na bila vilatu viyagwe, mkala muhungukilwe na kinhu?” Wamulongela, “Hatuhungukilwe na kinhu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ila kipigiti kino yoyose yali na mkwiji wa hela ama mkoba, nayavisole, na munhu yalibule zele yaguze koti jake yakagule zele.
Avo, nowalongela, Nyandiko Zing'alile zolonga, ‘Kapetigwa hamoja na watenda gehile,’ Zolondigwa zivikile kumwangu, kwavija ugima wangu wokwenhuka kuisota.”
Wanahina zake walonga, “Lola, Mndewa! Hano hana mizele mibili!” Na heyo kalonga, “Yotosha.”
Yesu kasegela haja hakiwambo kachola Hakigongo cha Mizaituni na wanahina zake kamba vayatendaga.
Viwavikile haja hakigongo, kawalongela wanahina zake, “Tambikeni, giladi sambimwingile muna ivitega.”
Abaho, kachola hamwande mwanza wa kwasa dibwe, kafugama mavindi, katambika,
kalonga, “Tata, kamba vihakunogela, nisegezele kikasi kino cha mgayo. Ila sio kamba vinilonda nie, ila kamba vuulonda gweye.”
Msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga kamulawilila na kumgangamaza.
Muusungu mkulu kaiyoha kutambika, mhome yake ikala kamba madwendwe ga mulopa godwendweka hasi.
Viyamambukize kutambika, kema, kabweleganya ha wanahina zake, kawavika wawasile kwavija wakala na giogio.
Kawalongela, “Habali mweye muwasa? Lamukeni mtambike, giladi sambimwingile muna ivitega.”
Yesu viyakalile yang'hali yolonga, dale da wanhu divika dilongozwa na Yuda yakalile mmwanza wa wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili. Kamkwenhukila Yesu na kumnonela.
Ila Yesu kamulongela, “Yuda, konihonza nie, Mwana wa Munhu, mkuninonela?”
Wanahina wakalile na Yesu viwagawene gaja galondile kulawila, wamuuza, “Mndewa, tuwakanhe na mizele yetu?”
Mwanahina imwe kadikanha gwiti da ukulume da nyakadala wa Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko.
Ila Yesu kalonga, “Lekeni.” Kadikwasa gwiti da ija imunhu na kumuhonya.
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na waja wemilizi wa Ing'anda ya Mulungu na wakulu wa ikitala wezile haja kumgoga, “Munizila na mizele na mimbwego kamba vija nie na m'bavi?
Nikala na mweye Kung'anda ya Mulungu mazua gose, hamunigogile. Ila kino kicho kipigiti chenu cha kutenda gano, kipigiti cha mhiko za ziza zotawala.”
Wamgoga Yesu, wamsola wamgala kung'anda ya Mkulu wa Wakulu wose wa Nhambiko, na Petulo kakala yowakoleleza kutalitali.
Ubwinhigwa moto hagatigati ya idikonhi da ing'anda, wakala hamoja wokota moto, na Petulo kakala hamoja nawo.
Nyakadala imwe wa kitwanzi viyamonile yakalile haja hamoto, kamulola ng'hani, kalonga, “Munhu ino vivija kakala na Yesu!”
Petulo kabela, kalonga, “Gweye mtwanzi, simtangile munhu hiyo!”
Mkipigiti kiguhi, munhu imwe kamona, kalonga, “Vivija na gweye kwa mmwanza wao!” Petulo kalonga, “Gweye munhu, sio nie!”
Na kipigiti cha kamba saa dimwe, munhu iyagwe kagong'ondeza, yolonga, “Kabisa! Munhu ino kakala na Yesu kwavija heyo nayo kolawa Galilaya!”
Petulo kalonga, “Gweye munhu, sikitanga chuulonga.” Bahaja viyakalile hanamambukiza kulonga, nzogolo keka.
Mndewa kahinduka kamulola Petulo, na Petulo kakumbukila kamba Mndewa kakala yamulongele kamba, “Kipigiti nzogolo hanakwika kilo ya lelo, kom'bela mianza midatu.”
Abaho, Petulo kalawa hanze, kalila ng'hani.
Wanhu wakalile womwimiliza Yesu wasonga kumtendela mzihaka na kumtoa.
Wamfunga na kitambala mmeso, abaho, wamuuza, “Zuza! Yalihi yakutoile?”
Na wamulongela vinhu viyagwe bwando va maligo.
Vuuchile, wavyele na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa waiting'hanila hamoja, na Yesu kagaligwa haulongozi wa Ikitala Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi.
Walonga, “Tulongele, gweye iyo Kilisto Mkombola?” Kawalongela, “Kamba nihawalongela, hamunitogola,
na kamba nihawauza mbuli, hamwidika.
Ila songela kipigiti kino, nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nokala kumkono wa ukulume wa Mulungu Mkulu.”
Wose walonga, “Avo gweye iyo Mwana wa Mulungu?” Kawalongela, “Mweye iwo mulonga nie iyo nene.”
Walonga, “Hatulonda usindila uyagwe! Tweye wenyego tuhulika kulawa mmulomo wake mwenyego!”
Dale jose dinuka, wamsola Yesu wamgala ha Pilato.
Wasonga kumtagusa wolonga, “Tum'vika munhu ino yowagiza wanhu zetu, yowagomesa sambiwamulihe kodi Kaisali, na mwenyego koikema kamba heyo iyo Kilisto, Mndewa.”
Pilato kamuuza, “Gweye iyo mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Gweye iyo ulonga avo.”
Abaho, Pilato kawalongela wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na dija didale da wanhu, “Siyona mbuli ya kumtagusila munhu ino.”
Ila hewo wananahila ng'hani wolonga, “Mafundo gake genula mzahimzahi mwa wanhu wose wa Yudea, kasonga Galilaya na sambi kahano.”
Pilato viyahulike gano, kawauza, “Munhu ino kolawa Galilaya?”
Viyavitangile goya kamba Yesu kokala yolawa isi yootawala Helode Antipa, kamgala ha Helode, yakalile Yelusalemu kipigiti kija.
Helode kadeng'helela ng'hani viyamuwene Yesu, kwavija kakala yohulika mbuli zake, avo kipigiti kitali kakala yolonda kumona. Kakala yotamanila kumona Yesu viyotenda mzonza.
Avo Helode kamuuza Yesu mbuli bwando, ila Yesu kamnyamalila.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakwenhuka, wamtagusa Yesu na lusango.
Helode na asikali zake wamtendela mzihaka Yesu na kumgela kinyala, abaho, wam'vaza guo da undewa, ikwisha wam'bweza kabili ha Pilato.
Pilato na Helode wakala waihile, ila songela zua dija wakala wambwiga.
Pilato kawakema hamoja wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko, wakulu wa isi, na wanhu.
Kawalongela, “Mumgala munhu ino kumwangu mulonga kowagiza wanhu. Avo nimpelemba hano hameso genu, sonile mbuli yoyose ihile imumtagusila.
Helode na heyo honile mbuli ihile, kileka mana yam'bwezile kumwetu. Haduhu kinhu chochose kihile chayatendile munhu ino kilumbile munhu ino kudanganhika.
Avo nolagiza yalanhigwe, abaho, nomuleka yagende na zake.”
Kila kipigiti cha Lusona lwa Pasaka Pilato kawafungulilaga mfungigwa imwe.
Dale jose diguta nyangi walonga, “Mkome hiyo! Tufungulile Balaba!”
Balaba kakala yafungigwe sama ya mzahimzahi wa kuilema silikali ulawilile mdiwambo na kukoma.
Pilato kalonda kumfungula Yesu, avo kalawilila kabili haulongozi wa ididale da wanhu.
Ila wagendelela kutoa nyangi, wolonga, “Yawambigwe mumsalaba, yawambigwe mumsalaba!”
Pilato kawalongela mwanza wa ikadatu, yolonga, “Mbuli ilihi ihile yaatendile? Nie siyona mbuli yoyose ihile yaatendile ilumbile heyo kudanganhika! Kolanhigwa, abaho, kolekesigwa.”
Ila wagendelela kutoa nyangi ng'hani wolonga Yesu kolondigwa yawambigwe mumsalaba. Hakimambukizo, nyangi zao zihuma.
Avo Pilato kawatogolela waja iwanhu vija vowokala womulonda Yesu.
Avo kawafungulila Balaba iwamulondile, munhu yakalile mkifungo sama ya kugala mzahimzahi wa kuilema silikali na kukoma, na kumgela Yesu mmakono ga asikali, wamtende kamba vowolonda Wayahudi.
Viwakalile womgala, wamgoga munhu imwe yokemigwa Simoni, munhu wa isi ya Kilene, yakalile yokwingila mdiwambo yolawa kumgunda. Wamdikwa msalaba, kaupapa hachugu cha Yesu.
Dale kulu da wanhu dimkweleleza, mmwanza wao kukala na watwanzi wokala womulilila na kumuyalalila.
Yesu kawahindukila kawalongela, “Mweye watwanzi wa Yelusalemu! Sambimunililile nie, ila ililileni wenyego na wanenu,
kwavija mazua gokwiza wanhu wokwiza kulonga, ‘Wana mhome watwanzi walibule wana, na waja hawalelile na waja hawakong'heze.’
Kipigiti hicho wanhu wosonga kuilongela migongo, ‘Tulagalile!’ Na vigongo, ‘Tufise!’
Kwavija kamba vinhu kamba vino votendeka mum'biki mbisi, vowaze mum'biki unyalile?”
Wanhu wayagwe wabili, wakalile watendaga gehile, vivija na hewo walongozwa wachola kukomigwa hamoja na Yesu.
Viwavikile hanhu hokemigwa, “Fulu da Pala,” wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba hamoja na watenda gehile wabili, imwe kumkono wake wa ukulume na iyagwe kumkono wake wa ukumoso.
Yesu kalonga, “Tata, wagele kumgongo kwavija hawagatangile gaja gowotenda.” Waigolela vivalo vake mkutoa kula.
Wanhu wema haja wolola kipigiti wakulu wa Wayahudi viwakalile womtendela uponela, wolonga, “Kawakombola wayagwe, na yaikombole mwenyego kamba heyo iyo Kilisto yasaguligwe na Mulungu.”
Asikali vivija wamtendela uponela, wamkwenhukila wamgwelela divai ya ugwadu,
wolonga, “Kamba gweye iyo Mndewa wa Wayahudi, ikombole mwenyego!”
Hachana ya umsalaba wake wandika vino, “ino iyo mndewa wa wayahudi.”
Mtenda gehile imwe yatungikigwe haja kamuliga Yesu yolonga, “Kamba gweye iyo Kilisto, ikombole mwenyego, abaho, utukombole na tweye.”
Ila ija mtenda gehile iyagwe kamkomhokela miyage yolonga, “Gweye humdumba Mulungu? Gweye kwa mumgayo kamba heyo.
Kumwetu tweye vilumba kwavija tugweleligwa gaja galumbile na gaja gatutendile, ila ino hatendile mbuli yoyose ihile.”
Abaho, kamulongela Yesu, “Yesu, ung'humbuke vondawize Muundewa wako.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela ikweli, lelo kowa hamoja na nie Paladiso.”
Viivikile kamba saa sita, ziza diigubika isi yose mbaka saa tisa
kwavija zua diziziwala, na idiguo ditungikwe Muing'anda ya Mulungu didegeka vidanga vibili.
Yesu kenula dizwi, kalila yolonga, “Tata, mmakono gako noika loho yangu!” Viyeshile kulonga vino, kadanganhika.
Ija imkulu wa iwaasikali mia wa Loma kagona gaja galawilile, kamuyenzi Mulungu yolonga, “Kweli, munhu ino kakala mwende!”
Wanhu wakalile waiting'hane haja kulola mbuli ija wagona gaja galawilile, wose wabwela ukae yao wokiitoatoa zimhambaga wokiiyalala ng'hani.
Wose wakalile wambwiga zake Yesu, hamoja na watwanzi wakalile womkweleleza kulawa Galilaya, wema hatalitali wolola.
Kukala na munhu imwe yokemigwa Usufu, yakalile imwe wa wanhu wa Ikitala Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi, kakala mwende wa Mulungu,
na hatogole gaja gawalamule. Kakala yolawa kukiwambo cha Wayahudi kikemigwa Alimataya, na kakala youbeta Undewa wa Mulungu.
Munhu hiyo kachola ha Pilato kulupula lukuli lwa Yesu.
Abaho, kaluhumulusa hasi ulukuli, kaluvaza sanda, abaho, kalugela mdipanga dipukigwe mdibwe, dikalile hadinazikilwa munhu yoyose.
Dikala zua da kuisasala na Zua da Mhumulo kwavija Zua da Mhumulo dikala behi kusonga.
Waja iwatwanzi, wakalile womkweleleza Yesu kulawa Galilaya, wamkweleleza Usufu. Avo wajona dipanga na avija lukuli lwa Yesu vulwikigwe.
Abaho, wabwela mkae zao kusasala vinung'hanung'ha na mavuta ga kunung'hila ga kulubaka lukuli lwa Yesu. Muna Idizua da Mhumulo, wahumula kamba ndagizi vuzilagize.
Zua da mwanduso wa wiki, imitondo ng'hani, watwanzi wachola kuna dipanga wapapile vinung'hanung'ha vawatendile.
Wadivika dibwe dikigwe hamulomo wa idipanga dibimbiliswe dikigwe hamgwazo,
ila viwengile mdipanga, hawaluvikile lukuli lwa Mndewa Yesu.
Viwakalile wang'hali wokanganya mbuli ija, bahaja walawilila wanhu wabili wavalile mikanzu inang'hazika, wema behi nao.
Waja iwatwanzi wafugama mavindi wokona bwembwe ng'hani, ila waja wanhu wawalongela, “Habali mumzahila munhu mgima mwa wanhu wadanganhike?
Kahaduhu hano, kazuka. Kumbukileni chayawalongele vayakalile yang'hali Galilaya.
‘Mwana wa Munhu kolondigwa yageligwe mmakono ga wanhu wene vilozo, na womuwamba mumsalaba, na zua da ikadatu kozuka.’ ”
Aho waja iwatwanzi wakumbukila mbuli zake,
wabwela kulawa kudipanga, na kuzilonga mbuli zija zose mwa wanahina longo dimwe na imwe na mwa wanhu wose wasigale.
Watwanzi waja wakala Maliamu kulawa kiwambo cha Magidala, Yoana, na Maliamu mamaake Yakobo. Wao hamoja na watwanzi wayagwe wazilonga mbuli zino mwa watumigwa wa Kilisto.
Ila watumigwa wa Kilisto wagiza gaja gawalongile waja iwatwanzi ukala uponela, avo hawawategeleze.
Ila Petulo kenuka kakimbila kachola kudipanga, kainamila kasungulila, kona isanda iiyeka. Abaho, kasegela haja hana dipanga kabwela ukae, kuno yokanganya gaja galawilile.
Zua didija wanahina zake Yesu wabili wakala wochola kukiwambo kimwe kikemigwa Emau mwanza wa masaa mabili kulawa Yelusalemu,
wakala wolongelela, wogalonga gaja gose galawilile.
Viwakalile wolongelela kuno wokiiuzagiza, Yesu mwenyego kawakwenhukila kailongoza nao.
Wamona, ila meso gao gazuilwa sambiwamtange.
Yesu kawauza, “Mbuli zaki hizo zimuisimulila mnzila?” Wema wanyamala tulu. Kuno vihanga visifukile.
Munhu imwe mmwanza wao yokemigwa Kileopa kamuuza, “Gweye wiyeka iyo muhenza huzitangile mbuli zija zilawilile haja Yelusalemu mazua madodo gabitile?”
Kawauza, “Mbuli zaki?” Na hewo wamulongela, “Mbuli zimulawilile Yesu wa Nazaleti. Heyo kakala muhokozi mwene mhiko mmbuli ziyalongile na zija ziyatendile hameso ga Mulungu na hameso ga wanhu.
Wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na wakulu zetu wa isi wamgela mnhaguso ya ifa, avo kawambigwa mumsalaba.
Ila tweye tutamanila kamba heyo iyo yondayaikombole isi ya Islaeli! Tuhagaleka higo gose, lelo zua da ikadatu songela vigalawilile gano.
Vivija watwanzi wayagwe wa mdidale jetu watusinhusa, waidamuka wachola kudipanga,
ila hawaluvikile lukuli lwake. Wabwela walonga wawona wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga, wawalongela kamba Yesu mgima.
Wanhu wayagwe wakalile mdale jetu wachola kudipanga wavika vivija kamba viwalongile watwanzi waja, ila hawamonile.”
Abaho, Yesu kawalongela, “Habali muli wabozi kamba avo, na habali muli na mioyo izalame kuzitogola mbuli zose zawalongile wahokozi?
Vino Kilisto Mkombola halondigwa yagaye m'vinhu kamba avo, abaho, yengile muyenzi yake?”
Avo Yesu kawasimulila mbuli zimulonga heyo mwenyego muna Zinyandiko Zing'alile, songela vitabu va Musa na Nyandiko Zing'alile za wahokozi wose wa Mulungu.
Viwakwenhukile ikiwambo chawakalile wochola, Yesu kaitenda kamba vija kogendelela na mwanza,
ila wamuyalalila ng'hani, wolonga, “Kala hano na tweye, kwavija zua diswa na ziza dingila.” Avo kengila mng'anda kakala na hewo.
Kakala hasi yaje nao mandia, kasola mkate, kamuheweza Mulungu, abaho, kaumogola kawagwelela.
Baho meso gao gagubuka, wamtanga, ila heyo kayangayuka havihanga vao.
Wakiilongela, “Mioyo yetu haiding'huke ng'hani na ndeng'helelo, kipigiti viyakalile yolonga na tweye mnzila na kutugubulila Zinyandiko Zing'alile?”
Bahaja wenuka wabweleganya Yelusalemu, wawavika waja wanahina longo dimwe na imwe waiting'hana hamoja na wanhu wayagwe,
na kulonga, “Kweli Mndewa kazuka na kamulawilila Simoni!”
Baho waja wanhu wabili wasimulila gaja gawalawilile mnzila na avija viwamtambule Mndewa kipigiti viyakalile youmogola umkate.
Kipigiti waja iwanahina wabili hawanamambukiza kuwapetela gano, bahaja Mndewa mwenyego kema mdidale jao, kawalongela, “Tindiwalo diwe hamoja namwe.”
Wasinhuka na kona bwembwe wagiza wakala wokona mzimu.
Ila heyo kawauza, “Habali mkona bwembwe? Habali mdungwadungwa mmioyo yenu?
Loleni makono gangu na magulu gangu. Mwone kamba iyo nene. Nibabaseni mwone kamba nie sio mzimu, kwavija mzimu wabule lukuli na mizege kamba vumnyona nie vinili.”
Kagalonga gano na kuno yowalagusila makono na magulu gake.
Wakala wamemile ndeng'helelo ng'hulu ng'hani na mkanganyo kuno wang'hali hawanatogola kamba iyo heyo, avo kawauza, “Mna kinhu chochose hano cha kuja?”
Wamgwelela kidanga cha somba kibanikigwe,
kakisola kakija hameso gao.
Abaho, kawalongela, “Iyo inhegulo ya zimbuli ziniwalongele kipigiti vinikalile ning'hali na mweye, ilondigwa gatendeke gose ganyandikiligwe muna Gamalagizo ga Musa na muna ivitabu va wahokozi na muna ikitabu cha Zabuli.”
Abaho, kawavugula zinzonzi zao wazimanye Zinyandiko Zing'alile,
kawalongela, “Yandikigwa vino, Kilisto kolondigwa yagazigwe, abaho, yadanganhike na mdizua da ikadatu yazuke,
na mtwaga jake, usenga wa kuwazuma wanhu waleke vilozo na kugeligwa kumgongo vilozo vao wopetigwa muisi zose kusongela Yelusalemu.
Mweye iwo wasindila wa mbuli zino.
Na nie mwenyego nowalagizila gaja gamuilagane na Tataangu. Ila kaleni himo mdiwambo mbaka vondamgweleligwe mhiko kulawa kuulanga.”
Abaho, kawalongoza kawagala hanze ya idiwambo mbaka Betania, aho kenula makono gake kawamoteza.
Viyakalile yowamoteza, kainega na hewo, abaho, kasoligwa kachola kuulanga.
Wamfugamila mavindi wamtambikila, abaho, wabweleganya Yelusalemu, kuno wodeng'helela ng'hani,
na kipigiti chose wakala Kuing'anda ya Mulungu womuheweza Mulungu.
Haichanduso kukala na Mbuli, Mbuli ija kakala na Mulungu, na Mbuli ija kakala Mulungu.
Songela haichanduso Mbuli kakala na Mulungu.
Mulungu kavilumba vinhu vose kubitila heyo, haduhu kinhu chochose kilumbigwe na Mulungu bila heyo.
Mbuli ija kakala iyo ichanduso cha ugima, na ugima uno uwo ugala mulangaza mwa wanhu wose.
Mulangaza uno womulika mdiziza, na ziza hadidaha kuuhuma.
Mulungu kamtuma munhu imwe yokemigwa Yohana,
keza kamba msindila, giladi yalave usindila wa mulangaza uja, avo wanhu wose watogole kubitila heyo.
Heyo mwenyego hakalile mulangaza, ila keza kamba msindila wa mulangaza.
Uno uwo mulangaza wa kweli, uwamwemwesa wanhu wose, ukalile ukwiza muulumwengu.
Heyo iyo mulangaza ukalile muulumwengu, avo Mulungu kaulumba ulumwengu mkubitila heyo, ila ulumwengu haumtangile.
Keza mwa wanhu zake mwenyego, ila wanhu zake mwenyego hawam'bokele.
Ila wanhu wose wam'bokele na kumtogola, kawagwelela udaho wa kuwa wana wa Mulungu,
awo watendigwe wawe wana wa Mulungu si sama ya mulopa ama sama ya manogelwa ga lukuli ama sama ya manogelwa ga munhu, ila sama ya manogelwa ga Mulungu.
Mbuli kagaluka munhu, kakala hamoja na tweye. Tuyona yenzi yake, yenzi ya kamba mwana imwe yeiyeka wa Tata, yamemile ngekewa na kweli.
Yohana kazipeta mbuli zake Yesu. Kenula dizwi yolonga, “Ino iyo munhu inikalile nimulonga, avija vinilongile, ‘Kokwiza hachugu changu, ila heyo iyo mkulu kubanza nie, kwavija kipigiti nie sinavumbuka heyo kakala baho.’ ”
Avija viyamemile ngekewa tweye tose tubokela motelo zose.
Mulungu katugwelela Malagizo kubitila Musa, ila ngekewa na kweli viza kubitila Yesu Kilisto.
Haduhu munhu yoyose yamonile Mulungu, ila Mwana yeiyeka, ayo yali hamgwazo wa Tata, iyo yamtendile Tata yatangigwe.
Uno uwo usindila uyalavile Yohana kipigiti wakulu wa Wayahudi viwawatumile wakulu wa nhambiko na Walawi kulawa Yelusalemu wakamuuze, “Gweye iyo yalihi?”
Yohana kawedika kawalongela kinaganaga, “Nie sili Kilisto.”
Wamuuza, “Kumbe gweye iyo yalihi? Gweye kwa Eliya?” Yohana kawalongela, “Nie sili Eliya.” Wamuuza, “Gweye kwa Muhokozi ija?” Kawalongela, “Nie sili Muhokozi ija.”
Wamulongela, “Basi tulongele gweye iyo yalihi? Giladi tukawalongele waja watutumile. Mzingelegeza zako gweye mwenyego koilongaze?”
Yohana kalonga, kuno yokwiga mbuli za Muhokozi Isaya, yolonga, “Nie dijo ‘Dizwi da munhu yoguta muluwala, Igoloseni nzila yondayabite Mndewa.’ ”
Waja iwasenga, watumigwe na Mafalisayo,
wamuuza Yohana, “Kamba gweye huli Kilisto ama Eliya ama Muhokozi ija, habali ubatiza?”
Yohana kawalongela, “Nie nobatiza na mazi, ila mmwanza wenu mweye mwimile aho kema munhu hamumtangile.
Ayo yondayeze hachugu changu, nie silumba hata kudohola nzabi za ng'hwabasa zake.”
Mbuli zino zose zilawilila mkiwambo cha Betania ng'ambu ya ulawilo wa zua ya Lwanda lwa Yolodani, aho Yohana hayakalile yobatiza.
Zua da ikabili Yohana kamona Yesu yokwiza, kalonga, “Lola! Mwana Ng'hondolo wa Mulungu yosola vilozo va ulumwengu!
Ino iyo munhu inikalile nimulonga, ‘Kokwiza munhu hachugu changu, yali mkulu kubanza nie, kwavija kakala baho kipigiti nie sinavumbuka.’
Nie mwenyego simtangile kamba heyo iyo Kilisto, ila nie niza kubatiza na mazi sama ya kilamso kino, siku kogubuligwa mwa wanhu wa Islaeli.”
Na Yohana kalava usindila uno, yolonga, “Nimona Loho wa Mulungu yohumuluka kulawa kuulanga kamba hua na kukala uchana yake.
Nie sambinimtange, ila ayo yandagize nie kubatiza na mazi, kanongela, ‘Uhamona Loho wa Mulungu yohumuluka na kukala uchana ya munhu, iyo, iyo munhu yondayabatize na Loho wa Mulungu.’
Na nie nigona gano, na nilava usindila kamba, ino iyo Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Zua da ikabili Yohana kakala yemile kabili bahaja na wanahina zake wabili,
viyamuwene Yesu yobita behi na hewo, kalonga, “Loleni! Mwana Ng'hondolo wa Mulungu.”
Waja iwanahina wabili viwamuhulike yolonga gano, wamkweleleza Yesu.
Yesu viyahinduke kawona womkweleleza, kawauza, “Mozahila choni?” Wamuuza, “Labi, kwahi kuukala?” “Labi,” nhegulo yake “Mkulufunzi.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Izoni mulole.” Avo wachola wahone haja hayakalile yokala, na wakala na heyo zua dija jose. Ikala kamba saa longo dimwe ichungulo.
Imwe wa wanahina waja wabili yamuhulike Yohana yolonga na kumkweleleza Yesu kakala Endelea mkulu wake Simoni Petulo.
Kinhu cha ichanduso kiyatendile Endelea kikala kumzahila ndugu yake Simoni na kumulongela, “Tumona Masihi.” Mbuli ino nhegulo yake iyo, “Kilisto.”
Abaho, kamsola kamgala ha Yesu. Yesu kamulola kalonga, “Twaga jako kokemigwa Simoni, mwana wa Yohana, ila songela lelo kokemigwa Kefa.” Twaga dino nhegulo yake iyo “Dibwe.”
Zua da ikabili Yesu kalonda kuchola Galilaya, kam'vika Filipo kamulongela, “Nikoleleze.”
Filipo kakala yolawa Betisaida, kiwambo chawakalile wokala Endelea na Petulo.
Filipo kamzahila Natanieli kamulongela, “Tumona munhu ayo Musa yandike mbuli zake mkitabu cha Malagizo na ayo vivija wahokozi wandike mbuli zake, Yesu, mwana wa Usufu, kulawa Nazaleti.”
Natanieli kauza, “Vodahika kinhu kinogile kilawe Nazaleti?” Filipo kalonga, “Izo ulole.”
Yesu viyamuwene Natanieli yokwiza, kalonga, “Lola! Ino iyo Muislaeli mwenyego kabisa, mduhu uzenzeleganye mmoyo wake!”
Natanieli kamuuza, “Kunitangaze?” Yesu kalonga, “Nikona vuukalile hasi ya umtini kipigiti Filipo hanakukema.”
Natanieli kalonga, “Mkulufunzi, gweye kwa Mwana wa Mulungu! Gweye kwa Mndewa wa Islaeli!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Kutogola kwavija nikulongela nikona vuukalile hasi ya umtini? Avo kovona vinhu vikulu kubanza vino!”
Abaho, kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, mowona ulanga uvuguka na wasenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga wokwela na kunihumulukila nie Mwana wa Munhu.”
Zua da ikadatu kukala na lusona lwa zengele mkiwambo kikemigwa Kana muisi ya Galilaya. Mamaake Yesu kakala bahaja.
Yesu na wanahina zake vivija wagonekigwa hana ulusona luja lwa zengele.
Divai viimalile, mamaake Yesu kamulongela, “Wabule divai.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Mama, gano gavikaze kumwetu? Kipigiti changu hakinavika.”
Abaho, mamaake Yesu kawalongela waja wakalile wosang'hanika na vakuja, “Tendeni chochose chondayawalongele.”
Haja kukala na minongo sita ya mazi itendigwe na mabwe, na kila nongo dimwe dikala na ukulu wa nongo mbili ama ndatu kwavija Wayahudi wakala na nzoela ya kuinava makono na magulu.
Yesu kawalongela waja wakalile wosang'hanika, “Memezeni mazi minongo ino.” Avo wamemeza minongo yose mbaka hamulomo.
Abaho, kawalongela, “Haya, deheni vimazi vidodo mkamgwelele mkulu wa ulusona.” Wasola gamazi wamgalila mkulu wa ulusona.
Mkulu wa ulusona viyagalanzile gamazi gakalile gagaluke divai, kakanganya kwahi kuilawile divai ija. Ila waja wakalile wosang'hanika na ulusona wadehile gamazi wavitanga, avo kamkema imulawilamhambe,
kamulongela, “Wanhu wose wagomelaga divai inogile haichanduso, na iwahenza wehesha kung'wa ng'hani kowagomela divai igwaduke, ila gweye kwika divai inogile mbaka vino!”
Yesu katenda mzonza uno wa mwanduso mkiwambo cha Kana muisi ya Galilaya, aho hayailaguse yenzi yake, na wanahina zake wamtogola.
Abaho Yesu na mamaake, wandugu zake, na wanahina zake wachola Kapenaumu, wakala haja mazua madodo.
Lusona lwa Pasaka lwa Wayahudi lukala lukwenhuke, avo Yesu kachola Yelusalemu.
Akuja kung'anda ya Mulungu kawavika wanhu woguza ng'ombe, ng'hondolo, na nziwa, na wavunja hela wakala wakalile mzimeza zao.
Avo kasola nzabi kogosa lukumbulu, kasonga kuwawinga waja iwang'onyo wose yowalava hanze ya Ing'anda ya Mulungu, ng'hondolo hamoja na ng'ombe. Kazihindula zimeza za wavunja hela na kuzipwililisa zihela zao,
na kawalongela awo wakalile woguza nziwa, yolonga, “Wasegezeni nziwa zenu hano! Lekeni kutenda Ng'anda ya Tataangu kuwa gulilo!”
Wanahina zake wakumbukila avija Zinyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga, “Nogelwa iniinogele ng'anda yako, Mulungu, yondukuza kamba moto.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wamwidika mkumuuza, “Mzonza ulihi wondautulagusile tuvitange kamba kuna udaho wa kutenda mbuli zino?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Bomoleni Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu, na nie noizenga kabili mmazua madatu.”
Wamuuza, “Kodahaze gweye kuizenga kabili mmazua madatu? Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu isola milao malongo mane na sita kumambukiza kuizenga!”
Ila ng'anda ya Mulungu iyailongile Yesu ikala lukuli lwake.
Viyazukile kulawa mkudanganhika, wanahina zake wakumbukila kamba kakala yalongile gano, na wazitogola Zinyandiko Zing'alile na gaja Yesu gayalongile.
Kipigiti cha Lusona lwa Pasaka Yesu kakala Yelusalemu, wanhu bwando viwonile mizonza iyaitendile wamtogola.
Ila Yesu haitogole nhogola yao, kwavija kautanga uzenzeleganye wa wanhu.
Halondile munhu yoyose yamulongele mbuli za wanhu waja, kwavija heyo mwenyego kagatanga gaja gakalile mmioyo yao.
Kukala na munhu yokemigwa Nikodemo, imwe wa wakulu wa Ikitala Kikulu cha Isi ya Wayahudi, yakalile Mfalisayo.
Kachola ha Yesu ikilo, kamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, tuvimanya kamba gweye kwa mkulufunzi ugaligwe na Mulungu. Kwavija haduhu munhu yondayadahe kutenda mizonza yuutenda kamba Mulungu hali hamoja na heyo.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela ikweli, munhu kamba havumbuke mwanza wa ikabili hadaha kuwona Undewa wa Mulungu.”
Nikodemo kamuuza, “Vodahikaze munhu m'vyele kuleligwa kabili? Havidahika kwingila muinda ya mamaake na kuvumbuka mwanza wa ikabili!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela ikweli, haduhu munhu yondayengile Muundewa wa Mulungu kamba havumbuke na mazi na Loho.
Kivumbuke na lukuli chowa lukuli, na kivumbuke na Loho wa Mulungu chowa loho.
Sambiukanganye kwavija nikulongela kamba mose molondigwa m'vumbuke kabili.
Ubeho ucholaga kuulonda, na mweye mohulika kisindo chake, ila mweye hamuutanga kuulawa ama kuuchola. Vivo ili na waja wose wavumbuke Muloho wa Mulungu.”
Nikodemo kauza, “Yowaze mbuli ino?”
Yesu kamulongela, “Gweye kwa mkulufunzi muisi ya Islaeli, hugatangile gano?
Nokulongela ikweli, tolonga gaja tugamanyile na tosimulila gaja gatonile, ila haduhu munhu yoyose mmwanza wenu youtogola usenga wetu.
Niwalongela mbuli za muulumwengu na hamzitogola, motogolaze kamba nihawalongela mbuli za kuulanga?
Haduhu munhu yoyose yakwelile kuulanga ila ayo yahumuluke kulawa kuulanga, nie, Mwana wa Munhu.
“Kamba Musa viyamwinule nyoka kuluwala, vivija na Mwana wa Munhu kolondigwa yenuligwe,
giladi yoyose yondayamtogole yeng'higwe ugima wa digunge.
Kwavija Mulungu kaunogela ulumwengu avo kamulava Mwanage imwe yeiyeka, giladi yoyose yondayamtogole sambiyadanganhike, ila yawe na ugima wa digunge.
Kwavija Mulungu hamgalile Mwanage muulumwengu yeze kuutagusa ulumwengu, ila ulumwengu ukomboligwe kubitila heyo.
“Awo womtogola Mwana hawatagusigwa. Ila awo woleka kumtogola wesha kutagusigwa, kwavija hawamtogole Mwana yeiyeka wa Mulungu.
Na ino iyo nhaguso, mulangaza wiza muulumwengu, ila wanhu wanogelwa na ziza na kuwihila umulangaza, kwavija sang'hano zao ziha.
Awo wose wotenda mbuli zihile wowihila mulangaza, na haweza kuna umulangaza kwavija hawalonda mbuli zao zihile zoneke.
Waja wotenda mbuli zinogile wokwiza kuna umulangaza, giladi yoneke kamba sang'hano zao zitendeka kubitila Mulungu.”
Abaho Yesu na wanahina zake wachola ng'ambu ya Yudea, kakala hiko mkipigiti kidodo na kubatiza.
Yohana na heyo kakala yobatiza ako Ainoni behi na Salimu, kwavija hanhu haja kukala na mazi bwando. Wanhu wamgendela na heyo kawabatiza.
Mbuli zino zilawilila kipigiti Yohana hanageligwa mkifungo.
Wanahina wa Yohana wasonga kuibamilila na Muyahudi imwe muimbuli ya nzoela ya kusuluza magulu na makono.
Avo wachola ha Yohana wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, munhu ija yakalile na gweye mwambu wa ikabili wa Ulwanda lwa Yolodani, ija iumulongile kamba iyo Kilisto, na heyo kobatiza, na wanhu wose womgendela.”
Yohana kawalongela, “Haduhu munhu yodaha kupata kinhu chochose kamba hagweleligwe na Mulungu.
Mweye wenyego iwo wasindila zangu haja hanilongile, ‘Nie sili Kilisto, ila nitumigwa nimulongole.’
Mhambe mwenyego mulawilamhambe, mbwigaake mulawilamhambe kokwima na kumtegeleza mulawilamhambe, yahadihulika dizwi da mulawilamhambe kodeng'ha ng'hani. Avo sama ya kilamso kino ndeng'ha yangu ivikila.
Vinoga heyo yabanze na nie nihungule.”
Ayo yezile kulawa uchana kawabanza wose. Ayo yezile kulawa muisi ka munhu wa muisi, na kolonga mbuli za muisi. Ila ayo yezile kulawa kuulanga kawabanza wose.
Kolonga gaja gayonile na kugahulika, ila haduhu munhu yozitogola mbuli zake.
Ila munhu yondayatogole mbuli zake kosindila kamba Mulungu iyo ikweli.
Munhu yatumigwe na Mulungu kopeta mbuli za Mulungu, kwavija Mulungu komgwelela Loho wake bila mhima.
Tata komnogela Mwana avo keka vinhu vose mmakono gake.
Munhu yoyose yomtogola Mwana kana ugima wa digunge, ila yoyose yomulema Mwana hawona ugima kwavija lusango lwa Mulungu lowa hamoja na heyo.
Mafalisayo wahulika kamba Yesu kowapata na kuwabatiza wanahina bwando kum'banza Yohana.
Ila Yesu mwenyego ham'batize munhu yoyose, ila wanahina zake wawo wabatize.
Yesu viyahulike gano, kasegela muisi ya Yudea kabwela muisi ya Galilaya,
kabita nzila ibitile muisi ya Samalia.
Kavika mkiwambo kimwe muisi ya Samalia kikemigwa Sikali, behi na mgunda wa Yakobo uyakalile yaamgwelele mwanage, Usufu.
Haja kukala na sima da Yakobo, na Yesu, avija viyadonhile na umwanza, kakala hasi hamgwazo wa idisima. Ikala saa sita imisi.
Mtwanzi wa Kisamalia keza kudeha mazi, na Yesu kamulongela, “Nigwelele mazi ning'we.”
Wanahina zake wakala wacholile kukiwambo kugula mandia.
Ija imtwanzi kamulongela, “Gweye kwa Muyahudi na nie na mtwanzi wa Kisamalia, konipulaze nie mazi ga kung'wa?” Kwavija Wayahudi hawasangilaga vinhu na Wasamalia.
Yesu kedika, “Kamba uhaimanyile nhunza ya Mulungu na uhammanyile ayo yokupula mazi ga kung'wa, uhampulile heyo na yahakugwelele mazi golava ugima.”
Ija imtwanzi kalonga, “Mndewa, kia cha kudehela kwabule na sima digidila, kwahi kondaugapate mazi higo gali na ugima?
Gweye kwa mkulu kum'banza muhenga wetu Yakobo yatugwelele sima dino, na heyo mwenyego na wanage na madale gake ga ng'hondolo wose wang'wa mazi ga sima dino?”
Yesu kamulongela, “Wanhu wose wong'wa mazi gano wokona ng'hilu kabili,
ila munhu yoyose yondayang'we mazi gondanimgwelele nie honda yone ng'hilu kabili. Mazi gondanimgwelele nie gogaluka nzokwe mgati yake, gondagamgwelele ugima wa digunge.”
Ija imtwanzi kalonga, “Mndewa, ngwelela mazi higo! Giladi sambinyone ng'hilu kabili, na sambinize hano kudeha mazi.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda kamkeme mbigalo wako, abaho, ubwele.”
Ija imtwanzi kedika, “Nabule mbigalo.” Yesu kamulongela, “Kulonga goya avija vuulonga kwabule mbigalo.
Kwavija kusoligwa na wambigalo watano, na mbigalo yuukala nayo sambi sio mbigalo wako. Kunongela ikweli.”
Ija imtwanzi kalonga, “Mndewa, nokona gweye kwa muhokozi.
Wahenga zetu wakala wotambika mkigongo kino, ila mweye mogong'ondeza kamba Yelusalemu baho hanhu ha kutambikila.”
Yesu kamulongela ija imtwanzi, “Nhegeleza nie, go mtwanzi, kipigiti chokwiza wanhu hawamtambikila Tata mkigongo kino ama kuja Yelusalemu.
Mweye motambikila kija hamkitangile, ila tweye tukitanga kija itukitambikila, kwavija ukombola wolawa mwa Wayahudi.
Ila kipigiti chokwiza na tena kipigiti kivika, watambika wa ikweli womtambikila Tata muloho na muikweli, kwavija Tata kowazahila wanhu wondawamtambikile kamba vino.
Mulungu iyo Loho, avo awo womtambikila wolondigwa wamtambikile muloho na muikweli.”
Ija imtwanzi kamulongela, “Nivitanga kamba Kilisto kokwiza, na yeheza, kotulongela kila kinhu.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nie, inilonga nagwe, iyo Kilisto.”
Kipigiti kikija wanahina zake wabwela, wakanganya ng'hani viwam'vikile yolongelela na mtwanzi. Ila haduhu hata imwe mmwanza wao yamulongele, “Kolonda choni?” ama kumuuza Yesu, “Habali ulonga na mtwanzi ino?”
Abaho, ija imtwanzi kaleka nongo yake ya mazi, kabweleganya kukiwambo na kuwalongela wanhu wakalile haja.
Yolonga, “Izoni mmulole munhu yanongele kila kinhu kinhendile. Havidahika munhu ino kuwa iyo Kilisto?”
Avo wasegela haja hakiwambo wachola kuyali Yesu.
Kipigiti kikija wanahina zake wamuyalalila Yesu wolonga, “Mkulufunzi, uje mandia.”
Ila heyo kawalongela, “Nie nnago mandia ago mweye hamgamanyile.”
Avo waja wanahina wasonga kukiiuza wenyego kwa wenyego, “Hana munhu yamgalile mandia?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mandia gangu nie gago gano, kugatenda gaja gamnogele ayo yanhumile na kuimambukiza sang'hano yake.
Mnawo ulonzi ulonga, ‘Isigala milenge mine mulao ulawe.’ Ila nie nowalongela, loleni mmigunda, vakuja vipa visha avo volondigwa kuhunigwa.
Muhuna vakuja kogendelela kulihigwa hata sambi, na heyo kokunzanya ivakuja yavike muugima wa digunge, avo yahandile na ayo yohuna wodeng'ha hamoja.
Kamba ulonzi uno vuulonga, ‘Imwe kohanda, iyagwe kohuna.’
Niwagala kuhuna vakuja mumgunda hamuulimile. Wanhu wayagwe iwo wasang'hanike, na mweye mpata fong'ha kulawa msang'hano yao.”
Wasamalia bwando kulawa mkiwambo kija wamtogola Yesu, sama ya gaja gayalongile ija imtwanzi, “Kanongela kila kinhu kinhendile.”
Avo waja Wasamalia viwamwizile, wamuyalalila yakale na hewo, avo Yesu kakala haja mazua mabili.
Wanhu wayagwe bwando wamtogola sama ya mbuli zake,
na wamulongela ija imtwanzi, “Tutogola si kwavija gweye kutulongela, ila kwavija tumuhulika tweye wenyego, na tuvitanga kamba heyo iyo Mkombola wa ulumwengu.”
Vigabitile mazua mabili, Yesu kasegela haja kachola kuisi ya Galilaya.
Kwavija heyo mwenyego kalonga, “Muhokozi hahishimilwa muisi yake mwenyego.”
Viyavikile Galilaya wanhu wa haja wam'bokela, kwavija wavona vinhu vose viyatendile Yelusalemu, kipigiti cha Ulusona lwa Pasaka, kwavija na hewo wakala wacholile kuna ulusona.
Abaho, Yesu kabweleganya kuna ikiwambo cha Kana muisi ya Galilaya, ako kuyagalule mazi kuwa divai. Haja kukala na mkulu imwe wa silikali yakalile na mwanage mtamu ako Kapenaumu.
Viyahulike kamba Yesu keza kulawa Yudea kwiza Galilaya, kamgendela na kumuyalalila yachole Kapenaumu yakamuhonye mwanage yakalile behi na kudanganhika.
Yesu kamulongela, “Kamba hamonile vilaguso na mikanganyo, hamtogola.”
Ija imkulu wa silikali kamulongela, “Mndewa, izo kipigiti mwanangu hanadanganhika.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda ukae yako, na mwanago kohona.” Ija imkulu wa silikali kazitogola mbuli za Yesu, avo kachola.
Viyakalile yobwela ukae, mnzila kaiting'hana na nyakadala zake, wamulongela, “Mwanago kahona.”
Kawauza kipigiti kilihi mwanage chayahonile, wamulongela, “Ikala saa saba imisi mayo homa imsegela.”
Avo ija tata wa imwana kakumbukila kamba kikala kipigiti kikija Yesu chayamulongele, “Mwanago kohona.” Avo heyo na mulango wake wose wamtogola Yesu.
Uno ukala mzonza wa ikabili waatendile Yesu viyalawile Yudea kuchola Galilaya.
Abaho, Yesu kachola Yelusalemu kuna ulusona lwa Wayahudi.
Kuja Yelusalemu, behi na Lwivi lwa Ng'hondolo, kukala na bwawa dikemigwa Mkieblania “Betizata,” dikalile na mhelengo tano.
Wanhu bwando wakalile watamu wakala wowasa mmhelengo zija, vimbugumbugu, mbetembete, na wanhu waholole wakala wobeta mazi gatibuke.
Kwavija watogola kamba kuna kipigiti msenga wa Mndewa wa kuulanga kohumuluka mdibwawa na kugatibula gamazi. Na mtamu wa ichanduso kwingila mdibwawa kipigiti msenga wa Mulungu yehesha kugatibula, kohonyigwa utamu wose uyalinao.
Haja kukala na munhu yakalile mtamu mmilao malongo madatu na minane.
Yesu viyamonile munhu ija kawasa haja na viyavitangile kamba munhu ija kakala mtamu mkipigiti kitali, kamuuza, “Kolonda kuwa mgima?”
Ija imtamu kamwidika, “Mndewa, nie nabule munhu hano wa kunigela mdibwawa kipigiti mazi gahatibuligwa. Nihalonda kwingila, munhu iyagwe konilongola.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Ima wima, papa lusazi lwako utembele.”
Bahaja ija imunhu kahona, kapapa lusazi lwake, kasonga kuchola. Mbuli ino ilawilila Mdizua da Mhumulo.
Avo wakulu wa Wayahudi wamulongela ija imunhu yahonyigwe, “Lelo Zua da Mhumulo, malagizo getu gokugomesa gweye kupapa lusazi lwako.”
Na heyo kawalongela, “Ija munhu yanihonyile kanilongela, ‘Papa lusazi lwako uchole.’ ”
Wamuuza, “Iyo munhu yalihi yakulongele upape lusazi lwako uchole?”
Ila ija imunhu yahonyigwe kakala hamtangile kakala munhu yalihi, kwavija Yesu kakala yengile mdidale da wanhu dikalile haja.
Mkipigiti kiguhi hamwande, Yesu kam'vika ija imunhu Kuing'anda ya Mulungu, kamulongela, “Tegeleza, sambi kuhona, avo sambiutende vilozo kabili, ama vokulawilila vinhu viyagwe vihile ng'hani kubanza vino.”
Abaho, ija imunhu kachola kuwalongela wakulu wa Wayahudi kamba Yesu iyo yamuhonyile.
Avo wasonga kumgaza Yesu kwavija kahonya Mdizua da Mhumulo.
Yesu kawalongela, “Tataangu kosang'hanika mazua gose, na nie vivija nosang'hanika.”
Sama ya kilamso kino wakulu wa Wayahudi wazahila ng'hani nzila ya kumkomela, sio kwavija katenda gagomeswe Mdizua da Mhumulo, ila vivija kamkema Mulungu Tataake, avo kaitenda heyo kalinga na Mulungu.
Avo Yesu kawedika yolonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, Mwana hadaha kutenda chochose heyo mwenyego, ila kotenda kija choyomona Tataake yotenda. Kija choyotenda Tata, kicho vivija Mwana choyotenda.
Kwavija Tata komnogela Mwanage na kamulagusila vinhu vose voyotenda heyo. Komulagusila vinhu vikulu ng'hani kubanza vino, na mweye mose mokwiza kukanganya.
Kamba vija Tata viyozusa wadanganhike na kuwabwezela ugima, vivija na Mwana kowabwezela ugima waja yoolonda kuwabwezela.
Tata hamtagusa munhu yoyose. Ila kamgwelela Mwanage udaho wose wa kutagusa,
giladi wanhu wose wamuhishimile Mwana kamba vija viwomuhishimila Tata. Munhu yoyose yondayaleke kumuhishimila Mwana, vivija hamuhishimila Tata yamtumile.
“Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yondayazihulike mbuli zangu na kumtogola ayo yanhumile nie kana ugima wa digunge. Hatagusigwa, ila kabita kulawa mkudanganhika kengila muugima.
Nowalongela ikweli, kipigiti chokwiza na kipigiti kivika aho wanhu wadanganhike wodihulika dizwi da nie, Mwana wa Mulungu, na awo wondawadihulike wowa wagima.
Kamba vija Tata viyali na ugima mgati yake mwenyego, vivija kamtenda Mwanage yawe na ugima mgati yake mwenyego.
Na kanigwelela udaho wa kutagusa kwavija nie iyo Mwana wa Munhu.
Sambimkanganye mbuli ino, kipigiti chokwiza aho wanhu wali mgamapanga vondawahulike dizwi jangu,
na kulawa hanze ya igamapanga, awo watendile ganogile wozuka giladi wagweleligwe ugima wa digunge, na awo watendile gehile wozuka giladi wakehigwe.
“Nie sidaha kutenda kinhu chochose nene mwenyego, notagusa kamba vinihulika. Nhaguso yangu yabule uzenzeleganye, kwavija sizahila kuinogeza mwenyego ila kumnogeza ayo yanhumile.
“Kamba nihaisindila mwenyego, usindila wangu hautogoligwa kamba kweli.
Ila hana munhu iyagwe yonisindila nie, na munhu hiyo iyo Yohana, na nie nivitanga kamba gaja goyolonga gotogoligwa kamba kweli.
Muwatuma wasenga zenu ha Yohana, na heyo kawalongela ikweli yose.
Nie silonda usindila kulawa mwa wanhu, ila nilonga gano giladi mkomboligwe.
Yohana kakala kamba kiwenge kilukula na kulava mulangaza, na mweye mulonda kudeng'helela mulangaza wake mkipigiti kiguhi.
Ila nie nna usindila mkulu ng'hani kubanza usindila yaawagwelele Yohana. Kwavija sang'hano ino initenda yaangwelele Tata niimambukize, ino inigendelela kuitenda, yolagusa kamba Tata iyo yanhumile.
Tataangu yanhumile vivija mwenyego kasindila sama yangu. Hamdihulike dizwi jake ama kuchona kiwiliwili chake,
na hamzikile mbuli zake mmioyo yenu, kwavija hamumtogole ayo iyamtumile.
Mozihimbula ng'hani Nyandiko Zing'alile, kwavija mokwagiza kamba mkutenda vino mokwing'higwa ugima wa digunge. Na Nyandiko Zing'alile zimuhimbula zizo zinilonga nie!
Hata avo hamulonda kwiza kumwangu giladi mpate ugima.
“Nie sizizahila nhogolwa kulawa mwa wanhu.
Ila niwamanya mweye mwa wanhu wa vilihi. Nivitanga kamba mweye mwabule noge da Mulungu mmioyo yenu.
Nie niza mtwaga da Tataangu, ila mweye hamunibokele. Ila kamba munhu yeheza mtwaga jake mwenyego, mom'bokela.
Kamba mweye mobokela nhogolwa zilawa mmwenu mwemwe wenyego, ila hamuiyoha mpate nhogolwa zilawa ha Mulungu yeiyeka, avo modahaze kutogola?
Sambimgelegeze kamba nie niza kuwatagusa ha Tata. Musa, imumtamanila, iyo yondayawataguse mweye.
Kamba mweye mumtogola Musa, muhanitogole nie, kwavija kandika mbuli zangu.
Ila kamba hamgatogole gaja gayandike, mogatogolaze gonilonga?”
Abaho Yesu kaloka Lamba da Galilaya, ama vivija vowodikemaga Lamba da Tibelia.
Dale kulu da wanhu dimkweleleza, kwavija wayona mizonza iyatendile mwa watamu.
Yesu kakwela hakigongo, kakala hasi na wanahina zake.
Kipigiti cha Lusona lwa Wayahudi lukemigwa Pasaka kikwenhuka.
Yesu kalola uchana kona dale kulu da wanhu domwizila, kamulongela Filipo, “Tukagule kwahi mikate ya kuwegutiza wanhu wose wano?”
Kalonga gano giladi yamgeze, kwavija mwenyego kavimanya vija vondayatende.
Filipo kamwidika kalonga, “Kitumetume cha milenge minane hakidaha kugula mikate ya kumtenda kila imwe yapate kikate kidodo.”
Mwanahina wake iyagwe yokemigwa Endelea, mkulu wake Simoni, ayo vivija yokemigwa Petulo, kalonga,
“Hana mmhale hano kana mikate mitano ya mpunga na visomba vibili. Ila wangahi wondawaje mdidale dino jose?”
Yesu kalonga, “Walongeleni wanhu wakale hasi.” Haja kukala na visoti bwando. Avo wanhu wose wakala hasi, na wanhu wakalile haja wakala kamba wambigalo alufu tano vino.
Abaho Yesu kaisola ija imikate, kamgwaa Mulungu hewela, kawagolela wanhu wakalile haja kamba viwalondile. Katenda vivija na ivisomba.
Wanhu wose viweigute, kawalongela wanahina zake, “Dondoleni ividanga va imikate isigale, sambikipotele chochose.”
Avo wavidondola na kumemeza migelo longo dimwe na mibili imemile vidanga va imikate ya mpunga isigale iwadile iwanhu.
Wanhu viwonile mzonza uno waatendile Yesu, walonga, “Kweli ino iyo Muhokozi yalongigwe kokwiza muulumwengu.”
Yesu kavitanga kamba wakala mmabehi kwiza kumgoga wamtende mndewa wao kwa shuluti, avo kasegela kabweleganya kukigongo yeiyeka.
Viivikile ichungulo, wanahina zake Yesu wahumuluka kudilamba,
kilo vukisongile kwingila na Yesu kakala yang'hali hanabwela, wakwela mngalawa na kusonga kuloka idilamba wochola Kapenaumu.
Kukuzumbi dilawilila, na gamazi gasonga kutibuka.
Wanahina viwakalile wogela ng'hafi mwanza wa kilometa tano ama sita, wamona yesu yotembela uchana ya igamazi, yokwiza behi na ingalawa. Avo, wadumba ng'hani.
Yesu kawalongela, “Sambimdumbe, nie iyo.”
Avo wam'bokela mkudeng'ha, kengila mngalawa, na kipigiti kikija ingalawa ivika mulusanga, bahaja hawakalile wochola.
Zua da ikabili wanhu bwando wakalile mwambu wa ikabili wa idilamba wakumbukila kamba haja kukala na ngalawa imwe, na Yesu hacholile na wanahina zake mngalawa ija, ila wachola weiyeka.
Ngalawa ziyagwe zikalile zizile kulawa kiwambo cha Tibelia zivika behi na hanhu haja wanhu hawadile imikate, Mndewa viyeshile kumgwaa hewela Mulungu.
Wanhu viwonile kamba Yesu na wanahina zake wahaduhu, wengila mzingalawa zija, wachola Kapenaumu kumzahila Yesu.
Wanhu viwam'vikile Yesu mwambu wa ikabili wa idilamba, wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, kwiza zua jaki hano?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, monizahila si kwavija vumuyonile imizonza, ila kwavija muja imikate na kupata gaja gamulondile.
Sambimsang'hanikile ng'hani mandia gaja gobanangika, ila sang'hanikileni mandia gondagakale mbaka kuugima wa digunge, ago nie, Mwana wa Munhu gondaniwagwelele. Mwa heyo Mulungu Tata keka kilagilo chake.”
Abaho wamuuza, “Tutendeze giladi tugatende gaja Mulungu goyolonda tweye tugatende?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kino kicho Mulungu choyolonda mumsang'hanikile, mumtogole ayo iyamtumile.”
Wamulongela, “Mzonza ulihi wondauutende tuwone, giladi tukutogole? Kotenda kinhu kilihi?
Wahenga zetu waja mana muluwala, kamba Zinyandiko Zing'alile vuzilonga, ‘Kawagwelela mkate kulawa kuulanga waje.’ ”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, sio Musa yawagwelele mkate kulawa kuulanga, ila Tataangu iyo yowagwelela mkate wa ikweli kulawa kuulanga.
Kwavija mkate wa Mulungu uwo heyo yohumuluka kulawa kuulanga, yolava ugima muulumwengu.”
Wamulongela, “Mndewa, tugwelele mkate uno mazua gose.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nie iyo mkate wa ugima. Yoyose yondayeze kumwangu heza kona nzala, na yoyose yondayanitogole heza kona ng'hilu.
Ila kamba viniwalongele, munyona ila hamunitogola.
Wose waangwelele Tataangu wokwiza kumwangu, na yoyose yondayeze kumwangu simuwinga.
Kwavija nihumuluka kulawa kuulanga kutenda gaja goyolonda ayo yanhumile, na sio kutenda gaja ganilonda nie.
Na gano gago goyolonda ija yanhumile, sambinimwase munhu yoyose mmwanza wa waja waanigwelele, ila nolondigwa niwazuse wose wawe wagima mdizua da ikimambukizo.
Kwavija choyolonda Tataangu icho kino, wose wondawamone Mwana na kumtogola wopata ugima wa digunge. Na nowazusa wawe wagima mdizua da ikimambukizo.”
Wayahudi wasonga kumtwanganikila, kwavija kalonga, “Nie iyo mkate uhumuluke kulawa kuulanga.”
Walonga, “Munhu ino hali Yesu, mwanage Usufu? Tumtanga tataake na mamaake. Avo kolongaze kahumuluka kulawa kuulanga?”
Yesu kawedika, “Sambimtwanganike wenyego kwa wenyego.
Haduhu munhu yodaha kwiza kumwangu kamba hakwegigwe na Tataangu yanhumile nie, na nie nomzusa yawe mgima mdizua da ikimambukizo.
Wahokozi wandika, ‘Wanhu wose wofundizigwa na Mulungu.’ Munhu yoyose yomuhulika Tata na kuifundiza kumwake kokwiza kumwangu.
Haduhu munhu yamonile Tata, ila ayo yalawile ha Mulungu iyo yeiyeka yamonile Tata.
Nowalongela ikweli, ayo yondayatogole kana ugima wa digunge.
Nie iyo umkate wa ugima.
Wahenga zenu waja mana muluwala, ila wadanganhika.
Ila uno uwo mkate uhumuluka kulawa kuulanga, awo munhu youja hadanganhika.
Nie iyo mkate uli na ugima uhumuluke kulawa kuulanga. Kamba munhu yoyose yahauja mkate uno, kowa na ugima wa digunge. Mkate wondanimgwelele uwo lukuli lwangu nilulava giladi ulumwengu uwe na ugima.”
Wayahudi wasonga kuibamilila ng'hani wenyego kwa wenyego wolonga, “Vodahikaze munhu ino yatugwelele lukuli lwake tuluje?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, kamba hamuludile lukuli lwa nie, Mwana wa Munhu, na kuung'wa mulopa wangu, mowa bule ugima mgati yenu.
Awo woja lukuli lwangu na kuung'wa mulopa wangu wana ugima wa digunge, na nowazusa wawe wagima mdizua da hakimambukizo.
Kwavija lukuli lwangu lulo mandia ga ikweli, na mulopa wangu uwo ung'waji wa ikweli.
Yoyose yondayaluje lukuli lwangu na kuung'wa mulopa wangu kokala mgati yangu, na nie nokala mgati yake.
Tata mwene ugima iyo yanhumile, na sama yake na nie nnao ugima. Vivija munhu yoyose yondayanije kowa na ugima sama yangu nie.
Uno uwo mkate uhumuluke kulawa kuulanga. Wahenga zenu waja mana na viwadanganhike hawapatile ugima wa digunge. Ila awo wondawaje mkate uno wowa na ugima wa digunge.”
Yesu kagalonga gano viyakalile yofundiza mng'anda ya nhambiko ako Kapenaumu.
Wanahina zake bwando viwahulike gano walonga, “Mafundo gano magaga. Yalihi yondayadahe kugabokela?”
Yesu kavitanga kamba wakala woitwanganikila mbuli ino, kawalongela, “Mbuli ino iwagevuza?
Yowaze kamba muhanyona nie, Mwana wa Munhu, nikwinuligwa kubweleganya kunikalile haichanduso?
Yagelaga ugima iyo Loho, mhiko za wanhu hazidaha chochose. Mbuli iniwalongele iyo Loho wa Mulungu yolava ugima.
Hata avo hana wanhu mmwanza wenu hawagatogola.” Songela haichanduso Yesu kavitanga wanhu walihi wakalile hawamtogola na munhu yalihi yondayamuhonze.
Abaho, kongeza kulonga, “Kino kicho kilamso cha kuwalongela kamba haduhu munhu yondayeze kumwangu kamba hagaligwe na Tata.”
Sama ya mbuli zino, wanahina zake bwando wabweleganya kuchugu, avo waleka kumkweleleza.
Avo Yesu kawauza waja wanahina zake longo dimwe na wabili, “Na mweye vivija molonda kusegela?”
Simoni Petulo kamulongela, “Mndewa, tuchole ha munhu yalihi? Gweye kuna mbuli zili na ugima wa digunge.
Na sambi tutogola na kuvitanga kamba gweye iyo Ung'alile wa Mulungu.”
Yesu kamwidika yolonga, “Siwasagule mweye longo dimwe na wabili? Hata avo imwe mmwanza wenu Mwenembago!”
Kakala yagalongile gano yomulonga Yuda mwanage Simoni Isikalioti, ayo yakalile mmwanza wa wanahina longo dimwe na wabili, ayo hamwande yamuhonzile Yesu.
Abaho Yesu kakala yotembela muiisi ya Galilaya. Halondile kutembela muiisi ya Yudea kwavija wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala wolonda kumkoma.
Lusona lwa Vizewe lwa Wayahudi lukala lukwenhuke,
avo wandugu zake Yesu wamulongela, “Segela hano uchole Yudea, giladi wanahina zako wazone sang'hano zuutenda.
Haduhu munhu yofisa mbuli zoyotenda kamba yahalonda kutangigwa na wanhu. Kamba kotenda mbuli zino, uilaguse muulumwengu.”
Kwavija hata wandugu zake hawamtogole.
Yesu kawalongela, “Kipigiti changu kinogile hakinavika, ila vipigiti vose kumwenu mweye vinoga.
Ulumwengu haudaha kuwehila mweye, ila wonihila nie, kwavija mazua gose noulongela kamba sang'hano zake ziha.
Mweye gendeni kulusona. Nie sichola kuna ulusona, kwavija kipigiti changu kinogile hakinavikila.”
Viyamambukize kugalonga gano, kagendelela kukala muiisi ya Galilaya.
Wadodo zake viwacholile kulusona, Yesu na heyo kachola, ila hacholile mkuilagusa, ila mkuifisa.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala womzahila kuja kulusona, wauza, “Kakwahi?”
Kukala na nyong'onyo bwando mwa wanhu womnyong'onya heyo. Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Munhu ino kanoga,” wayagwe walonga, “Hanogile, kowagiza wanhu.”
Ila haduhu yamulongile kinaganaga kwavija wakala wowadumba wakulu wa Wayahudi.
Lusona vuluvikile mkindibwindibwi, Yesu kachola Kung'anda ya Mulungu na kusonga kufundiza.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakanganya ng'hani walonga, “Munhu ino kozitangaze mbuli zino zose na kuno hafundizigwe na munhu yoyose?”
Yesu kalonga, “Kinifundiza nie sio mafundo gangu mwenyego, ila galawa ha Mulungu yanhumile.
Munhu yoyose yosagula kugatenda gaja goyolonda Mulungu kovitanga kamba gano gonifundiza nie golawa ha Mulungu ama nolonga mbuli zangu mwenyego.
Munhu yolonga mbuli zake mwenyego kozahila nhogolwa yake mwenyego. Ila munhu yosang'hanika sama ya nhogolwa ya ayo yamtumile iyo mwene ikweli, na mduhu dihile mgati yake.
Musa hawagwelele Malagizo? Na haduhu hata munhu imwe mmwanza wenu yogazindilila Malagizo. Habali mulonda kunikoma?”
Waja wanhu walonga, “Gweye kuna Mwenembago! Yalihi yondakukukoma?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nitenda mzonza umwe, na mose msinhuka.
Musa kawalagiza mweye muwengize kumbi wanenu. Hata avo sio Musa yasongile mbuli ino ila wahenga zenu. Avo mumwingiza kumbi mwana Mdizua da Mhumulo.
Kamba mwana kengizigwa kumbi Mdizua da Mhumulo giladi Malagizo ga Musa sambigadulukwe, habali basi munyonela lusango nie kwavija nimuhonya munhu utamu wake wose Mdizua da Mhumulo?
Sambimumtaguse munhu kwavija voyoneka, ila mtaguseni muikweli.”
Wanhu wayagwe wa Yelusalemu walonga, “Ino hali munhu ija woyolonda kumkoma?
Lola, kolongelela hakimwagaia, na wakulu hawalonga kinhu chochose cha kumtagusa. Yokoneka wavitanga kamba heyo iyo Kilisto?
Ila Kilisto vondayeze haduhu munhu yondayavitange koyolawa. Ila tweye tose tukutanga koyolawa munhu ino.”
Yesu viyakalile yofundiza Kung'anda ya Mulungu, kenula dizwi yolonga, “Nie munitanga na mkutanga kuja kunilawa. Sizile na udaho wangu mwenyego. Ayo yanhumile kabule uzenzeleganye, na mweye hamumtangile.
Ila nie nimtanga, kwavija niza kulawa kumwake, na heyo iyo yanhumile nie.”
Avo, walonda kumgoga, ila haduhu munhu yamgolosele mkono wake, kwavija kipigiti chake kikala hakinavika.
Wanhu bwando wakalile mdidale dija wamtogola, walonga, “Kipigiti chondayeze Kilisto, kotenda mizonza kubanza ino yootenda munhu ino?”
Mafalisayo wawahulika wanhu wonyong'onya mbuli zija womulonga Yesu, avo hewo na wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko wawatuma wemilizi wa Ng'anda ya Mulungu wakamgoge.
Yesu kalonga, “Nokala na mweye mkipigiti kidodo, abaho, nobwela ha ayo yanhumile.
Monizahila ila hamunyona, na kondaniwe hamdaha kwiza.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakiilongela wenyego kwa wenyego, wolonga, “Kwahi koyolonda kuchola kondatuleke kumona? Konda kuchola kuwapwililikile wanhu zetu muisi ya Ugiliki na kuwafundiza Wagiliki?
Mbuli ino nhegulo yake choni ahaja hayolongile, ‘Monizahila, ila hamunyona’ na ‘Kondaniwe, hamdaha kwiza’?”
Zua da mgotoko wa ulusona dikala zua dinogelwe ng'hani na wanhu. Yesu kema kenula dizwi kalonga, “Munhu yoyose yali na ng'hilu na yeze kumwangu yang'we,
munhu yoyose yonitogola, kamba Nyandiko Zing'alile vuzilongile, ‘Lwanda lwa mazi golava ugima gotililika kulawa mmoyo wake.’ ”
Mazi gayalongile Yesu gakala Loho wa Mulungu, ayo waja wamtogole heyo wom'bokela. Kipigiti kija Loho wa Mulungu kakala yang'hali hanavika, kwavija Yesu kakala yang'hali hanayenzigwa.
Wanhu wayagwe wakalile mdidale dija wamuhulike Yesu yolonga gano walonga, “Munhu ino kweli iyo Muhokozi ija.”
Wayagwe walonga, “Ino iyo Kilisto.” Ila wayagwe walonga, “Vodahikaze Kilisto yalawe muisi ya Galilaya?
Nyandiko Zing'alile hazilonga kamba Kilisto kokwiza kulawa mulukolo lwa Daudi, na kovumbuka muisi ya Betelehemu, kiwambo chayakalile yokala Daudi?”
Avo wanhu wakiigola sama ya Yesu.
Wayagwe walonda kumgoga, ila haduhu yamgolosele mkono.
Wemilizi wabwela ha wakulu wa wakulu wa nhambiko na Mafalisayo, na hewo wawauza, “Habali hamumgogile?”
Wemilizi walonga, “Hatunamona munhu yolonga kamba viyolonga munhu ino!”
Mafalisayo wawauza, “Na mweye vivija kawavwizila?
Mmona munhu yoyose mmwanza wa wakulu wa wanhu ama Mfalisayo imwe yomtogola ino?
Wanhu wano womuwinza ino hawagatangile Malagizo ga Musa, avo wokiigela mulusango lwa Mulungu!”
Imwe wa Mafalisayo wakalile haja kakala Nikodemo, munhu yacholile kumona Yesu mazua ga kuchugu, kauza,
“Malagizo hagalonga kamba havidahika kumtagusa munhu yoyose kamba hatunamuhulika na kugatanga gaja gayatendile?”
Walonga, “Gweye vivija kolawa Galilaya? Pelesa Zinyandiko Zing'alile na kokwiza kona kamba haduhu muhokozi yondayeze kulawa Galilaya.”
Abaho, kila munhu kachola ukae yake.
Ila Yesu kachola Kukigongo cha Mizaituni.
Imitondo ng'hani zua da ikabili kabweleganya Kung'anda ya Mulungu. Wanhu wose waiting'hana womzunguluka, na heyo kakala hasi kasonga kuwafundiza.
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wamgalila mtwanzi yagogigwe muugoni. Wamwika haulongozi wao,
wamulongela, “Mkulufunzi, mtwanzi ino kagogigwa hadibugo yotenda ugoni.
Muna Gamalagizo, Musa katulagiza kamba, watwanzi kamba wano watoigwe na mabwe mbaka wadanganhike. Avo gweye kolongaze?”
Wagalonga gano womwikila vitega Yesu giladi weze kumtagusa. Ila heyo kainamila yokwandika muisi na kidole chake.
Waja wanhu wemile haja viwabanzilize kumuuzagiza, Yesu kenuka kawalongela, “Munhu yoyose mmwanza wenu yalibule vilozo yawe waichanduso kumwasila dibwe.”
Abaho, kainamila kabili yokwandika muna iisi.
Viwahulike gano, wose wasegela imweimwe, kusongela iwakulu mbaka iwadodo, kasigala Yesu yeiyeka na ija imtwanzi yemile bahaja.
Kenuka kamulongela ija imtwanzi, “Wakwahi? Haduhu hata imwe yakutaguse?”
Ija imtwanzi kalonga, “Haduhu hata imwe, Mndewa.” Yesu kalonga, “Vinoga, hata nie sikutagusa. Genda na zako ila sambiutende vilozo kabili.”
Yesu kawalongela wanhu kabili, “Nie iyo mulangaza wa ulumwengu. Munhu yoyose yong'hweleleza kowa na mulangaza ugala ugima na hatembela mdiziza kabisa.”
Mafalisayo wamulongela, “Gweye koisindila mwenyego, avo gano gaulonga hagatogoligwa kamba kweli.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Hata nihaisindila mwenyego, usindila wangu wotogoligwa kamba kweli, kwavija nikutanga kunilawa na kunichola, ila mweye hamkutangile kunilawa ama kunichola.
Mweye motenda nhaguso ya kiunhu, ila nie simtagusa munhu yoyose.
Na kamba nihamtagusa munhu, nhaguso yangu ina kweli mgati yake, kwavija nie sili niiyeka muinhaguso ino, ila Tata yanhumile ka hamoja na nie.
Yandikigwa Mmalagizo genu kamba usindila wa wanhu wabili wotogoligwa kamba kweli.
Niisindila mwenyego, na Tata yanhumile vivija konisindila.”
Wamuuza, “Tataako kakwahi?” Yesu kawalongela, “Hamunimanyile nie na Tataangu hamummanyile. Kamba muhanimanyile nie, vivija muhammanyile na Tataangu.”
Yesu kagalonga gano gose viyakalile yofundiza Kung'anda ya Mulungu, mdigati dija mkikigwe kia cha kulavila nhosa. Na haduhu munhu yagezile kumgoga, kwavija kipigiti chake cha kugogigwa kikala hakinavika.
Kabili Yesu kawalongela, “Nochola na zangu, ila mokwiza kunizahila, na mofa na vilozo venu. Na hamdaha kuchola kunichola nie.”
Avo wakulu wa Wayahudi walonga, “Kalonga kamba hatudaha kuchola koyochola heyo. Konda kuikoma?”
Yesu kawedika yolonga, “Mweye mulawa hasi, nie nilawa uchana. Mweye mwa wanhu wa ulumwengu uno, nie si munhu wa ulumwengu uno.
Niwalongela kamba mofa na vilozo venu. Kamba hamutogole kamba nie iyo, kweli mofa na vilozo venu.”
Wamuuza, “Gweye iyo yalihi?” Yesu kawalongela, “Nie iyo ija iniwalongele songela haichanduso.
Nna mbuli bwando za kuwalonga mweye, na mbuli bwando za kuwatagusila. Ayo yanhumile kabule uvwizi, na nie noulongela ulumwengu gaja ganihulike kulawa kumwake.”
Hawavitangile kamba Yesu kakala yowalongela mbuli za Tata.
Yesu kawalongela, “Muhaniinula nie, Mwana wa Munhu, movitanga kamba nie iyo, na sitenda kinhu chochose nene mwenyego, ila nolonga mbuli zino kamba viyanilongele Tata.
Na ayo yanhumile nie ka hamoja na nie, hanilekile niiyeka, kwavija mazua gose notenda gaja gamnogele heyo.”
Viyakalile yolonga mbuli zino, wanhu bwando wamtogola.
Avo Yesu kawalongela awo Wayahudi wamtogole, “Kamba muhagatogola mafundo gangu, mowa wanahina zangu wa ikweli.
Moitanga ikweli, na ikweli yowatenda mkale muulegeho.”
Wamulongela, “Tweye twa lukolo lwa Ablaham, na hatunakuwa nyakadala wa munhu yoyose. Kotulongelaze tokwiza kuilegeha?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yoloza hiyo ka nyakadala wa vilozo.
Nyakadala hapetigwa kuwa munhu wa mulango wa munhu yomsang'hanikila milongo yose, ila mwana kopetigwa kuwa wa mulango uja milongo yose.
Kamba Mwana yahawakombola, mokomboligwa kwelikweli.
Novitanga kamba mweye mwa lukolo lwa Ablaham. Hata avo molonda kunikoma kwavija hamgatogola mafundo gangu.
Nowalongela gaja ganyonile ha Tataangu, kamba mweye vumtenda gaja gamuhulike kulawa ha tata zenu.”
Wamulongela, “Tweye twa lukolo lwa Ablaham.” Yesu kawalongela, “Kamba muhawile kweli mwa lukolo lwa Ablaham, muhatendile kamba viyatendile Ablaham.
Molonda kunikoma nie, munhu yawalongele kweli iniihulike kulawa ha Mulungu. Ablaham hatendile kinhu kamba kino!
Mweye motenda goyotenda tata wenu.” Wamulongela, “Tweye hatuli wana wa ugoni. Mulungu yeiyeka iyo Tata wetu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kamba Mulungu iyo Tata wenu, muhaninogele, kwavija nilawa ha Mulungu na sambi na hano. Siigalile mwenyego, ila Mulungu iyo yanhumile.
Habali hamgategeleza gaja ganilonga? Kwavija hamulonda hata kuzihulika mbuli zangu.
Mweye mwa wana wa tata wenu, Mwenembago, na molonda kugawinza gaja goyolonda tata wenu. Songela haichanduso heyo kakala mkoma wanhu na hakalile muikweli hata mwanza umwe, kwavija mmwake mduhu kweli. Yahalonga uvwizi, kumwake heyo kotenda goya, kwavija heyo m'vwizi na iyo tata wa wavwizi wose.
Ila kwavija nie nowalongela ikweli, hamunitogola.
Yalihi mmwanza wenu yodaha kunongela nie kamba nna vilozo? Na kamba nowalongela ikweli, habali basi hamunitogola?
Munhu yalawile ha Mulungu kozitegeleza mbuli za Mulungu. Kwavija mweye hamulawile ha Mulungu, kileka mana hamzitegeleza.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wamwidika, wolonga, “Tuhonyela vitulongile kamba gweye kwa Msamalia na kuna kinyamkela?”
Yesu kawedika, yolonga, “Nie nabule kinyamkela. Nie nomuhishimila Tataangu, ila mweye monizabuza nie.
Nie sizahila yenzi yangu mwenyego. Ila kuna imwe yoizahila, na heyo iyo mulamula.
Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yoyose yogatogola mafundo gangu hadanganhika.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wamulongela, “Sambisambi tuvimanya kamba kuna kinyamkela! Ablaham kadanganhika na wahokozi wayagwe wadanganhika, hata avo gweye ung'hali longa kamba munhu yoyose yogatogola mafundo gako hadanganhika.
Muhenga wetu Ablaham kadanganhika na wahokozi wayagwe vivija wadanganhika. Gweye koitenda mkulu kubanza muhenga wetu Ablaham? Vuigelegeza gweye kwa munhu yalihi hasa?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kamba nihaitogola mwenyego, nhogolwa yangu si kinhu. Yonitogola nie iyo Tataangu, ayo yummulonga kamba iyo Mulungu wenu.
Mweye hamumtangile, ila nie nimtanga. Kamba nihalonga simtangile, nowa m'vwizi kamba mweye. Ila nie nimtanga na nozigoga mbuli zake.
Muhenga wenu Ablaham kadeng'helela viyalolile haulongozi na kuwona mwizilo wangu. Kawona na kadeng'helela ng'hani.”
Wayahudi wamulongela, “Gweye hunavikila hata milao malongo matano, kumona Ablaham?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ikweli, kipigiti Ablaham hanavumbuka, ‘Nie iyo.’ ”
Viyalongile vija, wadondola mabwe giladi wamtoe, ila Yesu kaifisa, abaho, kalawa Kung'anda ya Mulungu.
Yesu viyakalile yobita mnzila, kamona munhu yavumbuke kimbugumbugu.
Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Mkulufunzi, yalihi yalozile, kileka mana munhu ino yavumbuke kimbugumbugu, heyo mwenyego ama wamulelile?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Sio munhu ino ama waja wamulelile watendile vilozo, gano galawilila giladi sang'hano za Mulungu zoneke mkubitila heyo.
Kipigiti chose cha imisi tolondigwa kutenda sang'hano za ayo yanhumile. Kilo chokwiza haduhu munhu yondayadahe kusang'hanika.
Kipigiti nie ning'hali muulumwengu, nie iyo mulangaza wa ulumwengu.”
Viyeshile kulonga gano, Yesu kazenha vizite hasi muisi, abaho, katenda tope yovulugiza na ivizite, abaho, kam'baka mmeso ga ija imunhu.
Kamulongela, “Genda ukainave kihanga chako Mdibwawa da Siloamu.” Nhegulo ya twaga dino iyo, “Yatumigwe.” Avo ija imunhu kachola kaisuluza, kabwela yolola.
Wanhu wakalile wokala behi nayo na wanhu wamonile viyakalile yopula kipigiti hanahonyigwa wakiiuza, “Ino hali munhu ija yakalile yokala mnzila yopula?”
Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Iyo heyo,” ila wayagwe walonga, “Sio heyo, ila wailinga.” Avo ija imunhu kamana kulonga mwenyego, “Iyo nene.”
Wamuuza, “Kutendaze, kileka mana sambi ulola?”
Kawalongela, “Munhu imwe yokemigwa Yesu katenda vitope, kanibaka mmeso gangu, kanilongela nichole Siloamu nikaisuluze kihanga changu. Avo nichola, vunimambukize kuisuluza, nilola.”
Wamuuza, “Kakwahi?” Kawalongela, “Mmane.”
Abaho, wamsola ija imunhu yakalile kimbugumbugu, wamgala kuwali Mafalisayo.
Zua dija Yesu diyatendile ditope na kumuhonya umbugumbugu wake ija imunhu dikala Zua da Mhumulo.
Avo Mafalisayo wamuuza ija imunhu kabili vija viyadahile kulola. Kawalongela, “Kanibaka mitope mmeso gangu, abaho, niisuluza kihanga changu, na sambi nolola.”
Mafalisayo wayagwe walonga, “Munhu yatendile vino halawile ha Mulungu, kwavija hadigoga Zua da Mhumulo.” Wayagwe walonga, “Kodahaze munhu yali na vilozo kutenda mizonza kamba ino?” Avo kukala na muhasanyo wenyego kwa wenyego.
Avo Mafalisayo wamuuza ija imunhu mwanza uyagwe, wolonga, “Kulonga kakuhonya umbugumbugu uukalile nao, avo gweye komulonga vilihi munhu ino?” Ija imunhu kalonga, “Nokona munhu ino muhokozi.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi hata avo hawalondile kutogola kamba kakala kimbugumbugu na sambi kolola, mbaka wawakema waja wamulelile,
na kuwauza, “Ino iyo mwanenu yummulonga kamba kavumbuka kimbugumbugu? Choni kitendeke mbaka sambi kodaha kulola?”
Waja wamulelile wawalongela, “Tuvitanga kamba ino iyo mwanetu, na kakala yavumbuke kimbugumbugu.
Ila hatukitangile kija kitendeke mbaka sambi kodaha kulola, vivija hatumtangile yamuhonyile umbugumbugu uyakalile nao. Muuzeni, kwavija heyo mwenyego mkulu, heyo mwenyego kodaha kuwalongela!”
Waja wamulelile walonga vino kwavija wakala wowadumba wakulu wa Wayahudi kwavija wakala walamule kamba munhu yoyose yamtogola Yesu kamba iyo Kilisto kowingigwa mng'anda ya nhambiko.
Kino kicho kilamso kiwatendile waja wamulelile walonge, “Heyo mwenyego mkulu, muuzeni!”
Mwanza wa ikabili wamkema ija imunhu yavumbuke kimbugumbugu, wamulongela, “Mulungu iyo yolondigwa kugweleligwa yenzi mmbuli ino, kwavija tweye tuvitanga kamba munhu ino kana vilozo.”
Ija imunhu kawalongela, “Nie sivitanga kamba kana vilozo ama kabule. Kinhu kimwe kinikitanga, nikala kimbugumbugu, na sambi nolola.”
Wamuuza, “Kakutendela kinhu chaki? Kakuhonyaze umbugumbugu uukalile nao?”
Kawedika, “Niwalongela nisha, na hamtegeleze. Habali mulonda kuhulika kabili? Na mweye molonda kuwa wanahina zake?”
Wamuliga, abaho, wamulongela, “Gweye iyo mwanahina wake munhu ija, ila tweye twa wanahina wa Musa.
Tukitangile tweye Mulungu kalonga na Musa, ila munhu ino hatukutangile hata koyolawa!”
Ija imunhu kawalongela, “Kino kicho kinhu cha mkanganyo! Hamumtangile koyolawa, ila nie kamhonya umbugumbugu unikalile nao!
Tuvimanya kamba Mulungu hawategeleza wanhu wali na vilozo, ila kowategeleza wanhu waja womuhulika na kutenda gaja goyolonda heyo wagatende.
Songela vuulumbigwe ulumwengu, haduhu munhu yoyose yamuhulike munhu yoyose yamtendile munhu yavumbuke kimbugumbugu yalole.
Kamba munhu ino halawile ha Mulungu, sambiyadahe kutenda kinhu chochose.”
Wamwidika wolonga, “Gweye kuvumbuka na kukula m'vilozo, abaho, konda kutufundiza tweye?” Avo wamuwinga kulawa mng'anda ya nhambiko.
Yesu viyagahulike gaja galawilile, kamzahila ija imunhu, viyamuwene kamulongela, “Gweye komtogola Mwana wa Munhu?”
Ija munhu kalonga, “Mndewa, nongela, iyo yalihi giladi nimtogole!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Kumona kwisha, na ayo yolonga nagwe iyo heyo.”
Ija imunhu kalonga, “Notogola, Mndewa,” abaho, kafugama mavindi kamtambikila.
Yesu kalonga, “Niza muulumwengu uno kutagusa, avo vimbugumbugu weze kulola, na awo wolola weze kuwa vimbugumbugu.”
Mafalisayo wakalile na heyo haja wamuhulika yolonga gano, wamuuza, “Gweye kolonga tweye twa vimbugumbugu?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Kamba muhawile vimbugumbugu, sambimuwe na vilozo. Ila kwavija mokiiyona molola, vilozo venu mogendelela kuwa navo.”
Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela ikweli, munhu yolema kwingila mulwigo lwa ng'hondolo mkubitila mulwivi, ila kozumha mkiwambaza, munhu hiyo m'bavi na m'bokonyi.
Munhu yokwingila mkubitila mulwivi iyo mchunga wa ng'hondolo.
Mwimilizi wa ulwivi kom'vugulila, na ng'hondolo wodihulika dizwi jake. Kowakema ng'hondolo zake na matwaga gao, na kuwalava hanze.
Yahamala kuwalava hanze, kolongola haulongozi wao, na iwang'hondolo womkweleleza kwavija waditanga dizwi jake.
Muhenza hawamkweleleza ila womkimbila, kwavija hawaditangile dizwi jake.”
Yesu kawalongela hala dino, ila hawaitangile nhegulo yake.
Avo Yesu kalonga kabili, “Nowalongela ikweli, nie iyo ulwivi lwa ng'hondolo.
Awo wayagwe wose wanilongole wabavi na mibokonyi, ila ng'hondolo hawawahulike.
Nie iyo ulwivi. Munhu yoyose yondayengile mkubitila nie kokomboligwa. Kokwingila na kulawa kuchola kuzahila mandia.
M'bavi kokwiza giladi yebe na kukoma na kubananga. Nie niza giladi muwe na ugima, na muwe nao bwando.”
“Nie iyo mchunga yanogile. Mchunga yanogile koulava ugima wake sama ya ng'hondolo.
Munhu wa kitumetume ayo yali sio mchunga, na ng'hondolo sio zake. Yahamona mbwizi yokwiza, kowaleka iwang'hondolo na kukimbila. Avo mbwizi kowagoga iwang'hondolo na wayagwe wopwililika.
Munhu wa kitumetume kokimbila kwavija munhu wa kitumetume hawagelegeza ng'hondolo, kwavija si ng'hondolo zake.
Nie iyo mchunga yanogile. Nowatanga ng'hondolo zangu na hewo wonitanga,
kamba vija Tataangu viyonitanga nie na nie vinimtanga Tataangu. Noulava ugima wangu sama ya ng'hondolo.
Hana ng'hondolo zangu wayagwe hawali mdikonhi dino. Vivija nolondigwa niwengize, woihulika nongelo yangu na kugaluka dale dimwe na mchunga imwe.
“Tata kaninogela nie kwavija noulava ugima wangu, giladi niubokele kabili.
Haduhu munhu yonisegezela ugima wangu. Noulava nene mwenyego. Nodaha kuulava na nodaha kuubweza kabili. Vino vivo Tataangu vayanilagize nitende.”
Wayahudi wakiigola kabili sama ya mbuli zino.
